recentChanges: Performance updates.
comments: Great app that tracks investments much better than Mint. Update: They fixed some UI issues with graphs. My only gripe is you can no longer use a pin number to get into the app. Now you have to type in your password, even though this doesn't make it any more secure. Please bring back the pin option!

Overall great way to consolidate all accounts into a single viewing tool, but poor execution/maintenance of the app - regularly now at least 2 of my accounts won't sync, and when I tried re-adding my Optum Bank accounts, they don't even have the correct Optum site as one of the options. Also no information on how to get help in the app.

Latest update makes me enter my password instead of PIN. Due to the nature of the data I have a very long and easy to mistype password. VERY ANNOYING. Also, Ally synchronization is constantly hit and miss. Leaving soon unless fixed.
Increased to 3 stars as it now syncs ally bank again. One problem is that now it requires a texted code every time it has to update... I use other trackers like mint and they still work fine.

at first glance, it looks simple/basic; that's what it turns out to be, data driven and no frills! i can view all the accounts with each of their breakdowns by scrolling down the screen. it's also one of the most accurate apps to extract transaction names (least amount of work for me to rename them, while still an option). compared to some other free apps with tons of distracting paid content/advertising, this is a breath of fresh air! (only complaint is that it doesn't budget)

title: M1 Finance: Smart Money Management
description:
Take control and personalize your finances. Invest, Borrow, and Spend seamlessly, all in one place. Sign up today.

BE INVESTED
You work hard for your money, so your money should work hard for you.
We’ve created next-generation, intelligent financial solutions so you can do exactly what you want with your personal finances.
The cherry on top? It’s free.

MAKE THE MOST OF YOUR MONEY
M1 Smart Money Management gives you the freedom to seamlessly build, invest, and optimize your money—the way you want.

INVEST
Smart investing:
- Create your portfolio with any stock and/or ETF, for free
- Invest your money with intelligent automation

BORROW
Smart borrowing:
- Unlock a flexible line of credit with just $10,000 invested
- Borrow money at one of the lowest rates in the market

SPEND
Smart cash management:
- Access your money instantly with your M1 checking account
- Move money between investments seamlessly

ENJOY M1 FOR FREE, OR UPGRADE TO M1 PLUS FOR MORE PERKS
Smartest perks:
- Get subscription level features and rewards
- 1% APY* checking (that’s 16x the national average APY for a checking account)
- 1% cash back on M1 Plus Visa™ debit card purchases
- 1.50% discount on M1 Borrow base rate
- Unlock a second daily trading window for more control over your investments

ACCOUNT PROTECTION
- Securities in M1 Invest accounts are insured up to $500,000 by the SIPC.
----------
- M1 Spend checking accounts may be insured up to $250,000 by the FDIC.
----------
- We are a technology-first company that utilizes the latest in information security.



DISCLAIMERS
M1 refers to M1 Holdings Inc., and its affiliates. M1 Holdings is a technology company offering a range of financial products and services through its wholly-owned, separate but affiliated operating subsidiaries, M1 Finance LLC and M1 Spend LLC.  

Brokerage products and services offered by M1 Finance LLC, an SEC registered broker-dealer and Member FINRA / SIPC. 

Brokerage products are: Not FDIC Insured  • No Bank Guarantee  • May Lose Value 

All investing involves risk, including the risk of losing the money you invest, and past performance does not guarantee future performance. Borrowing on margin can add to these risks. 

Find additional important information at https://m1finance.com/legal/disclosures/ 

---------------

M1 Spend checking accounts furnished by Lincoln Savings Bank, Member FDIC. M1 Visa™ Debit Card is issued by Lincoln Savings Bank, Member FDIC. 

No minimum balance to open account. No minimum balance to obtain APY (annual percentage yield). APY valid from account opening. Fees may reduce earnings. Rates may vary. 

---------------

© Copyright 2019 M1 Holdings Inc. 

App distributed by: M1 Finance LLC; 200 N LaSalle St., Ste. 800; Chicago, IL 60601-1030; United States

recentChanges:
- NEW: Get email and push notifications of account activity. Update your preferences in your account settings.

- Sign up for M1 Plus to get the smartest perks, including a new afternoon trade window and access to M1 Spend, the checking account that seamlessly integrates with your investments.

Let us know what you think by leaving a review or contacting us at hello@m1finance.com.
comments: It's a nice "set it and forget it" way to invest. Plus, I really like that you can set your account to automatically reinvest dividends. I had to change my review from 5 to 4 stars because the app is constantly logging me out.. so often that it's just really annoying. Also, if you edit a recurring transfer amount, I have come to find out that the date in which it is withdrawn from your account may also be changed so there's a friendly heads up on that small surprise.

Overall, I am enjoying this app and think it's a great tool. Once you figure them out, pies are a nice way of managing a group of investments. And fractional shares is great and works well with the pie system. What I don't like so far (and what made me put this at 3-stars): I've had a ticket open for a few days now to close out an account I don't need opened. I've never put anything in the account, etc... So it concerns me that customer service on that simple task hasn't progressed. The 9am trade window is limiting. I know you can get M+ for a 2nd window, but the whole window system is limiting. If I have money in my account and the market is open; I should be able to invest. I'm not trying to day trade or anything, but it's like a slow crawl waiting to see when your trades go through. Otherwise, I'm glad I'm using M1.

Overall I'm pleased with M1 finance and the app. Its responsive and the UI is easy to navigate. My only two complaints so far is the limited trading window that only allows you to trade once per day. Secondly creating multiple pies within pies takes some getting use to. Like all things with practice you can get the hang of it. Trading is actually free.

It's been two days since I haven't been able to access my account. They haven't responded to any of my emails for support. I have called the support phone number at least 5 times today and each time I have been disconnected without getting through after waiting. So far as I can tell, they have just stolen several thousand dollars from me. This company is completely unreliable. Do not trust them with your money. I plan on filing complaints with the BBB and and CFPB if I do not resolved asap

I use the app to get a quick glance at my portfolio. It will allow me to make quick changes if needed. But prefer the desktop for any real work that I may need to do. This app, company, is great for folks looking to build growth, cash and wealth over a long period of time. It is NOT for those into day trading. Perfect for those looking to park an IRA. M1 Finance, like any brokerage company, also provides and holds tax documents that you will need to provide your tax preparer or tax software.

title: EveryDollar: Budget Tool and Expense Tracker
description:
You need a tool that makes it easy to budget on the go. Because life is hectic—but budgeting shouldn’t be. 

Now you can easily manage your money with EveryDollar! Create a custom monthly budget to save money, pay off debt, build wealth, and give. Recommended by top personal money management expert Dave Ramsey, EveryDollar uses the zero-based budget approach that millions are already using to win with money. 

All new users receive a FREE trial of EveryDollar Plus, the premium version of EveryDollar! Access your trial and upgrade to EveryDollar Plus from the main menu. 

Whether you’re new to budgeting or a personal finance expert, you’ll love the simplicity and the power behind this personal budget app!

EveryDollar Free Features
Create Your Personal Budget: 
✔Create the best budget and fully customize it in minutes. 

✔ Access your budget through the mobile app or desktop browser. 

✔ Budget lines, spending, debt payments, notes, and more can be adjusted throughout the month. 


Monthly Expense Tracker: 
✔Manage money and track spending on the go. 

✔EveryDollar lets you split transactions across multiple budget lines. 

✔The spending tracker shows what you’ve spent and what’s remaining for the month. 


Connect with Money Management Experts:
✔Get financial planning with access to our HUGE Endorsed Local Providers program.

✔This personal budget app can connect you with real estate, insurance, and tax professionals.

✔No third-party advertisements that get in the way of your learning. 


Exclusive EveryDollar Plus Features:
✔Connect app to your bank to import transactions to quickly track spending.

✔Manage money and check account balances for connected financial accounts.

✔Gain priority support with our amazing customer success team. 

✔ Set up notifications when you have new transactions ready to track. 

✔ Score access to Financial Peace University—the class that starts you on your journey to never worry about money again and includes Debt Snowball Tool, Emergency Fund Tracker, Mortgage Calculator, Investment Calculator, and more (annual plan only). 
 

Upgrade to EveryDollar Plus from the main menu with In-App Purchases. 

Create a personal budget to stay on top of your finances. Start tracking expenses, paying off debt, and putting more into your savings each month with EveryDollar. 

Budgeting just got easy. Download now and manage money better with your personal monthly budget app. 


Privacy Policy: https://everydollar.com/privacy 

Terms of Use: https://everydollar.com/terms

summary: Budget planner and expense tracker that helps you win with personal finances.
recentChanges: - Minor background improvements.
comments: It's a good app. A little hard to navigate and could benefit from some kind of AI to walk you through the initial set up and maybe stick with you a few months to get you completely lined out. Then maybe greet you again periodically to let you know about updates and give you some tips. Also the plus version is too expensive in my opinion just to link bank accounts and drag and drop feature mostly. Anyway it's what I am using at the moment to supplement my pen and paper budget.

Waste of money. It worked seamlessly for the first month and now it does not sync with my bank unless i sign out, uninstall the app, sign back in, and put in a new security code every time. And now this week, even that doesnt work. The app freezes and stops working. Ive emailed the Ramsey solutions people and they flat out refuse to refund me my money. Update: Still a waste of money! Now my transactions sync again but 3x per one! So I get to manually delete 2/3 of the transactions! Yay me!

I really like most things about this app. I recommend it because it is a useful tool for planning and tracking spending. However, I do not like the way the line items called "funds" are accounted for. I love seeing that I have an "everydollar budget," but when I have a fund, it will still say EveryDollar Budget even if I went over in every category. There should be a popup that says "You just overspent your budget. Please adjust."

A great app! It would be greater if we could take a pic of receipt within the app. It's difficult for the user to confirm the budget category of each item if the user looses the receipt. Another idea: user scans the receipt and then app provides a recommended category for items, once the user confirms, the info gets placed into the current budget. It also needs percentage for each category. Budget categories based on percentage is at the core of the plan. Doesn't make sense to not have them.

I've been using this off and on to track my budget which helped, but I've never really followed it and didn't enjoy manually entering expenses. I recently upgraded to the plus version which links your bank account. This has been magical! I'm now staying on budget and can look at what is remaining in each category wherever I am. Thankful for this app since it has kept me on track for paying off debt!

title: USA Live Stock Markets
description:
The Finance app is the best stock market app to track US Stocks and stay on top of the global stock markets. 
- Easy to manage and track your money and stocks anytime and anywhere.

The app covers multiple assets from Dow Jones, NYSE & Nasdaq exchanges, so that you may track Indices & Sectoral Indices from US Exchange Market.
What makes The Market Edge Stock Quotes app different? 

■ Feature of Market Edge App :
- Get Real-time Prices of USStocks.
- Get Stocks Related News
- Streaming Price on Watchlist and Stock Detail Page.
- Get Global Finance Information.

Minor Changes

comments: Very useful market monitoring tool. UPDATE: the latest update of the app keeps crashing with Android 10. Not sure about other versions of Android. Also, they are very slow about addressing fixes. 2nd UPDATE: looks like they've finally fixed the frequent crashing. Going back to 4 stars.
When I tap on the Crypto currency tab the app shuts down and tells me that it isn't responding, i find this app to be very useful and I hope this error is fixed, thank you and have a nice day.
Do not like the new format. Adds every time you try to shut down. I will be going back to my old app for viewing stocks.
Always starts on news; can't configure to start on indices.
Up to date information is very helpful when you trading options

title: Monthly Budget Planner & Daily Expense Tracker
description:
Download iSaveMoney for FREE and start take control of your personal finance and monthly budget. iSaveMoney is the ultimate FREE budget app to track spending and expenses. iSaveMoney is a powerful budget maker and expense tracker for everyone. This is a very powerful finance software while user friendly so that everyone can use our app with ease. iSaveMoney has a lot of features and functions that will help you to plan your budget, record your transactions, and forecast your budget. 


If you have decided to take control of your financial situation you will need a powerful finance software that will let you create monthly budget, track spending, and present the data to you in a way that will allow you to have insights about your habit and know how to manage your money better.  iSaveMoney provides you with all of the necessary functions and you can get it for free. With just a touch of your finger you can access the core functionalities of this budget app such adding income, expense account, and category.  


Here are some iSaveMoney TOP features that make it such a powerful budgeting tool:

★ User friendly and intuitive navigation.

★ Powerful built in speech recognition. 

★ Autocomplete function based on your previous entries. 

★ Built in calculator to calculate your income and expense.

★ Built in budget maker templates of categories to create a new monthly budget.

★ Create your own budget planner templates. You can create as many templates as you want. 

★ Help calculating your debt and saving based on your income and expense information. 

★ Budget forecast. iSaveMoney will create a six month forecasts based on your previous transactions to see how you spend your money so far. 

★ Daily transactions monitoring. iSaveMoney will display a bar chart that shows the variation of the daily total expense.

★ Manage your account expense better with Automatic Draft payment function. This powerful expense tracker function will allow you to plan your daily, weekly, monthly or yearly recurring transactions.

★ Export your data in CSV format to your Dropbox or Google Drive account.  

★ iSaveMoney automatically backup your data to the cloud and restore it. 


These are just a few features you will get when you use iSaveMoney as your go to budgeting tool. As a powerful spending tracker, iSaveMoney has many more features that are very user friendly. You can see and add new transaction from one page.  Whenever you insert an expense transaction, this budget app will display the fields which you fill the data such as the transactions amount and payee. 


There are many people who spend more than they earn. They have problems with debt and not enough saving. They don’t track spending and they don’t plan their monthly budget better. There are a lot of transactions they forget because they don’t use expense tracker. They don’t know how to live off their income in responsible way. It is a path to a financial disaster that will land them in trouble in the future. 


Managing personal finance is not easy with so many things we spend money on every day. Sometimes we are not conscious on how much we are spending money on things that are not important. We often wonder why our income is never enough. It is time to take back control of our spending. Use iSaveMoney as your budget tracker and you can also plan your budget using our budget planner, and forecast your expense for the next 6 months based on your previous spending money habit. 


 iSaveMoney is very user friendly to everyone so you don’t need to worry you can’t use this it. This budget app is a really powerful spending tracker for people who are concerned about how they spend their money. This finance software will help you manage your saving and debt so that you will be responsible in financial matter and avoid unnecessary expense that will cause problems in your life. iSaveMoney your personal accounting software.

recentChanges:
- Fixes auto-backup issue
- Added more option to clone budget categories
- Fixed the shortcuts
- Others issue fixed
comments: My experience with this app has been pretty good, more than I expected. For a while I've needed to put myself on a budget. I took my time selecting an app that would fit my schedule and how I wanted to plan the disbursement of my monthly financials to adequately cover my living expenses. This app is extremely easy to use. You can take away, you can add, update your information on your budget effortlessly. I recommend this app.

This app should have an option whereby you can allocate SOME of your income to financial accounts... The option available right now takes all the income gained to the financial accounts if you enter the account name in the add income option.. Also the home pages must show the amount of income you've saved in the financial accounts then the matching concept should take be considered in this situation too... I wish I could send images to explain better

Good app, balance between function and simplicity. I rate 4 but since you guys so kind to open a lot of functionalities for free, it's 5 :). I have some suggestion: - The default value when clicking to budget should be add transaction, since we use it more often. - Add option to transfer the remain of budget to other budget. Sometime we know the budget is done and we can move all of it left fund to other categories. - calculator should show result in realtime

From a Pro user! What happened to bluethooth sync? Why its been deprecated? Why not fix it? On my understanding the part that fails was all data from Financial Accounts, that never pases to the updated device! Now we have only two options: DropBox (which I don't like) and GoogleDrive. The only problem (the worst tha makes the app a nightmare) is that when you restore/syns from your files in Drive, the updated device now has all Financial Accounts, but shows all transactions as accounts!

Hi, I have taken premium version of the app. It is a great application to use however there are apparent shortfalls. I would have loved to a section of loans apart from income and expense. Also, tracking of payees and payors is a bit confusing and can't be tracked at account level.

title: Invstr: Play. Learn. Invest.
description:
Invstr is an award-winning app that helps aspiring investors learn to invest. Learn with Academy and practice your skills by playing Fantasy Finance®. When you’re ready to trade for real, start investing from $1. 

“Turn Gaming into Investing” - FinTech Futures
 
“A game changer, demystifying the complicated trading markets” - Appnews.co.uk
 
LEARN WITH ACADEMY
Academy is a 10-module interactive course that teaches you everything you need to know about investing and the financial markets, including stocks, cryptos, and key strategies. Test your knowledge with quizzes and earn badges along the way to track your progress.
 
PLAY FANTASY FINANCE®
Build a portfolio with $1M in virtual cash. Compete with players around the world to win cash prizes. 
 
• Trade stocks to increase your portfolio’s value
• The higher the return on your investment, the higher you’ll place in the monthly Invstr Fantasy League
• Finish in the top 10 to win real cash prizes
• Earn rewards & unlock features
• Bite-sized stats & insights help you make the right call at the right time
• Follow other players to get tips and stay up-to-date
 
GO PREMIUM
Access game-changing features, all 10 Academy modules, and start each month with at least $1M of virtual cash.
 
• 10-module interactive investing course
• Extra trades
• An unlimited watchlist
• Double XP
• Flexible portfolio allocation
• Technical analysis charts
• Monthly capital insurance
• Private trading mode
 
PRIVATE LEAGUES
Start your own private league and challenge friends, family, colleagues, or classmates to a trade-off. Put your investment skills to the test and see who earns the bragging rights.
 
• Ideal for schools and investment clubs
• Quick & easy to set up and run
• A fun way to learn with friends
 
INVEST FOR REAL
When you’re ready to trade for real, start investing from just $1. 
 
• Invest from just $1 via fractional share trading of U.S. stocks
• Pay only $0.99 commission when trading part of a share, and from $2.99 for whole shares
• All accounts are protected by SIPC (The Securities Investor Protection Corporation) against losses in securities and cash due to brokerage bankruptcy
 
MONITOR THE MARKETS
Make smarter decisions with:
 
• Glance Cards for each instrument, with an Instrument Score calculated from key signals and Invstr community-based sentiment
• Live Interactive Charts for 2,500+ global stocks, bonds, commodities, currencies, futures, indices, and cryptocurrencies
• Personalized, up-to-the-minute market news from 50+ top financial publishers
 
VISIT US
https://invstr.com
 
FOLLOW US
twitter.com/invstreams
facebook.com/invstr
instagram.com/invstr
 
MORE INFO
T&Cs: https://invstr.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://invstr.com/privacy
 
Disclosures:
Invstr is a technology platform, not a registered broker-dealer or registered investment adviser, and does not provide investment advice. All investing carries risk. Past performance is not indicative of future returns, which may vary. US brokerage services, including fractional trading of US securities, are provided to Invstr users by DriveWealth LLC, an SEC registered broker-dealer and a regulated member of FINRA/SIPC.
Terms of use: http://bit.ly/2T8zGo0
Fees schedule: http://bit.ly/2T6KW4A
Fractional shares disclosure: http://bit.ly/2DAVODc
Due to Canadian and Australian regulations DriveWealth LLC, can’t on-board users from these countries.

summary: Learn to invest in stocks, crypto, ETFs, FX. Play the stock market & win prizes!
developerAddress: 17 Waterloo Pl, St. James's, London SW1Y 4AR, UK
recentChanges: UI tweaks, bug fixes & performance enhancements.
comments: Decent, wish I weren't limited on trades and could buy and sell incrementally, short stocks and utilize options but hey...it's a free version to learn the basics.

I love this app. I've learned so much about trading just by reading what others have said & from watching other traders. I do the modules in the Academy as well. Those are great as well & very informative. Thank you for an awsome learning app.
"We're sorry, Invstr is unable to verify that your device is Android compatible." That's not your job. I installed this through the play store, of course it's compatible.
Awesome game. Very helpful if you would like to learn how to invest. 1 thing though I wish there was an easy way to get trades.
Helps you learn investing before you put any money down. Helpful articles in the feed.

title: Robinhood: Invest. Save. Earn.
description:
Invest in stocks, options and ETFs (funds), all commission-free, for as little as $1- with the Robinhood app.

Our trading tools give everyone access to the financial market - whether you're a beginner in investing or a seasoned trading pro.

Save, invest in the stock market, and earn money: Here’s what you get when you join Robinhood:

Finance explained - We’ll help you understand financial markets so you can invest in the stock market and buy funds, shares and options, all commission-free. 

Trading tools - Before you buy funds, Bitcoin, or any other investment option, you can access real-time market data, read relevant finance news articles, and get notified about important events. And manage your portfolio on the go.

Stock market trends - Set up customized finance news and notifications to stay on top of your assets as casually or as relentlessly as you like. Controlling the flow of info is up to you.

Cash Management - Earn money with your uninvested cash and earn competitive APY with your brokerage account.

The Robinhood app gives you the trading tools, finance news and cash management products to make your money work harder. Whether you want to invest in the stock market, buy funds, save money or earn money, we’ve got the information to help you make smart decisions.


INVESTING MADE EASY
New to investing? Fear not. We have the trading tools and services to empower you to participate in the financial market. Learn how to invest and trade smartly, and get in-depth financial info in lingo that makes sense. 

STOCKS, FUNDS, OPTIONS AND CRYPTO
With Robinhood Financial, you can invest in stocks, funds, and options. You can also buy and sell cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Dogecoin (DOGE) with Robinhood Crypto.

EARN MONEY WITH CASH MANAGEMENT
Did you know that your uninvested cash can still work for you? Earn money with competitive interest* and get more flexibility with your brokerage account.

-----
*Cash Management is an added feature to your Robinhood Financial LLC brokerage account. The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) paid by program banks may  change at any time at the program banks’ discretion. Interest is earned on uninvested cash swept from the brokerage account to the program banks. Neither Robinhood Financial LLC nor any of its affiliates are banks. The debit card is issued by Sutton Bank, member FDIC, pursuant to license by Mastercard® International, Incorporated.

Securities trading offered through Robinhood Financial LLC, member SIPC and FINRA.

Cryptocurrency trading offered through Robinhood Crypto, LLC. Robinhood Crypto is licensed to engage in virtual currency business activity by the New York State Department of Financial Services and is not a member of FINRA or SIPC. Cryptocurrencies are not stocks and your cryptocurrency investments are not products protected by either the FDIC or SIPC.

The free stock offer valid only for selected individuals, subject to the terms and conditions at rbnhd.co/freestock- terms. Free stock randomly chosen as detailed on the website. Individuals must sign up through a promotional page to be eligible. Neither receipt of a share of stock through this program nor identification of a particular security in communications related to this program constitutes a solicitation of the security or a recommendation to buy, sell, or hold the security. Robinhood Financial does not provide investment advice and does not hereby recommend any security or transaction.

All investments involve risk and the past performance of a security, other financial product or cryptocurrency does not guarantee future results or returns. You can always lose money when you invest in securities, cryptocurrencies, or other financial products. Investors should consider their investment objectives and risks carefully before investing.

Robinhood Financial LLC and Robinhood Crypto, LLC are wholly-owned subsidiaries of Robinhood Markets, Inc.

comments: Like everyone else, losing money due to app issues. I went as far as to remove the app, download again, shut down, restart, and still having the same issue at this point. I can access any page on the app except the trade page, in till after 11:30 am. I attempt to go to the page and all that comes up is the green header bar and a blank white page.

It was great! Until it crashes. And then it crashes every morning. And then it crashes on the busiest, most volatile day of the market and doesnt open for the rest of the day, and refuses to let people view anything in the app thanks to a hot patch. Seems everyday is getting worse on this app and they seem to offer no statement. Many people thinking about a class action lawsuit for gross negligence

Takes forever for your transfer to come through; about 7 business days before your account sees the charge. Way too long! Then when it was supposed to complete, they say there was a problem with the transfer, that it was cancelled and I was charged a $9 fee. I checked my account in the day they sent that notification and had enough funds to complete the transfer. Opened a case and Eduardo said to get back to them in a month when my bank statement is generated so they can review. Ridiculous!

So I figured I would give this app a try. Not looking good. It kept telling me it's losing connection, and then its having a server issue. Right after I put ALL my information in. Wont let you look at stocks. Just sends you to a blank page. So far this has been a horrible experience. Not sure I would invest money into this if you cant even navigate the app properly.

Superb interface - Garbage Stability: This app is by far the most intuitive and beginner friendly option I've encountered. Unfortunately, the stability of the trading system is straight up garbage. Users were locked out of their account for the entire day of March 2nd, 2020; and the first half of March 3rd, 2020; during which the S&P 500 bounced up 8% from it's previous weeklong plummet. Do not trust this company with critical day to day trades, they have no qualms about shutting down the system

title: Truebill Budget Planner, Bill Tracker and Reminder
description:
TRACK EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
Truebill, the most convenient and big picture personal finance tracker, budget planner and bill reminder app.

Bill tracker app, Truebill’s user friendly interface lets you seamlessly track everything from expenses & spending to upcoming bills  - all while putting money back into your pocket! The budget planner and bill reminder keep track so you don’t have to.  

OVER A MILLION USERS TRUST TRUEBILL?
◉ NBC: This Startup Is Helping People Find Forgotten Money

◉ CNN: How To Shave Hundreds Off Your Credit Card Bill

◉ Fortune: There’s Now A Startup To Help You Cancel All Those Subscriptions

◉ TechCrunch: Truebill Wants To Help You Manage Your Online Subscriptions

◉ Chicago Tribune: 15-Minute Fixes For Your Family’s Finances

THE BUDGET PLANNER AND BILL REMINDER
Truebill, a budget planner and bill reminder app, evaluates your financial standing holistically, giving you a personal finance tracker & bill tracker app that balances automation and customization to make money saving as easy as possible.

Truebill is free to use and offers a wide array of tools all on one simple platform. Save money by managing your subscriptions and bills. Truebill, monthly bill organizer, will automatically detect and manage subscriptions, helping you to keep track of everything --even the ones you may have forgotten about! 

Truebill is a budget planner and bill reminder you can trust!

 THE BILL TRACKER THAT ACTUALLY HELPS YOU SAVE MONEY
Log-in to easily view your monthly bill organizer to stay on top of subscriptions, enjoy easy cancellation and bill negotiations handled by Truebill on your behalf. Having a personal finance tracker in your pocket to manage bills will put an end to late fees and overdraft charges.

Join the thousands using Truebill, expense tracker & spending tracker app to feel confident and in control of your finances. Users see savings of $512 per year by using the budget planner to track spending, manage subscriptions & lower bills. You can even receive credits for things like internet outages - automatically by using this simple expense tracker and spending tracker app.

Examples of how Truebill will save money automatically:

✓ Negotiating the best rates on cable, internet, and cell phone bills
✓ Getting you credits for service outages you may not even know about
✓ Manage subscriptions, cancel unwanted subscriptions, and keep track of recurring bills
✓ Track and manage bills with our monthly bill organizer
✓ Get bank fees refunded, automatically

 MANAGE BILLS & SUBSCRIPTIONS TOGETHER
Bill tracker app, Truebill, is easy to use and your next step towards taking back time and money lost on managing subscriptions, tracking expenses, spending, and budget planning. Truebill expense tracker is your free personal financial tracker and the only app designed to put money back into your pocket.

Truebill is an intuitive monthly bill organizer & bill tracker app created to save money automatically. Our proactive spending tracker & expense tracker tool highlights trends and subscriptions, keeping you in the loop with alerts from the budget planner.

Download our amazing spending tracker &  bill tracker app today and enjoy the best personal finance tracker in the play store!

By downloading and using Truebill, you agree to our current Terms of Use (truebill.com/terms) and Privacy Policy (truebill.com/privacy).

165 Jessie St.
Floor 2
San Francisco, CA 94105
recentChanges: We've added a bills toggle to your spending tab so you can see your spending pie chart without bills (which often eat up too much of the pie!). We've also fixed some bugs.
comments: I like it, but I would like it more if I could manually input my income from resources not listed in the financial institutions. Currently this doesn't give me an accurate read on my finances because most of my income isn't being recorded. Once I can do this I'll change my rating. I wish I had paid attention to that before buying in for a year.
Failure to receive code. Despite many attempts to receive the message that's supposed to be sent to my number, none have succeeded. I assure that the correct information is being put in.
Excellent app. Helps to show how I can save more and renegotiates bills with companies like cable to lower your bill. So you don't have to renegotiate it yourself.
I started out liking this app, everything was running smoothly, but it says I entered the wrong credentials for one of my bank accounts. This is my main account and I really need it available.

Continues to log out of all accounts and when you recertify it doesnt accept the credentials. Also won't allow you to add credit card bills with other Bill's on the budget so it doesnt give an accurate amount. Its not worth the hassel.

title: Possible Finance: Borrow Money Fast & Build Credit
description:
Possible provides installment loans up to $500* that build credit. Apply to borrow money, get approved, and receive cash within a few minutes! Join thousands of satisfied customers who are using a loan from Possible to avoid harmful overdraft fees, borrow money fast, and build credit. 

More cash than paycheck advance apps
A $100 cash advance isn’t always enough. Avoid overdraft fees, payday loan apps, and payday advance apps and borrow money up to $500* in minutes.

Get money fast
Don’t wait until payday and get hit by overdraft fees! Apply for a loan in a few simple steps. Once approved, money can be sent straight to your debit card so that you have immediate access to your loan.

Build credit
Get immediate cash help as well as an affordable way to build credit. We'll report to TransUnion, Equifax and Experian, making our loan a great way to repair your score! Payday advances and payday loans can’t do this!

Flexible repayments
A more adaptable cash option than other loans or payday advance alternatives, multiple repayments are spread out across the next few paychecks and rescheduling is easy.

Good credit not required
You don’t need good credit to get money! Our loan app links directly with your existing bank account to help make an intelligent decision.

“It’s like borrowing money from a good friend...Seriously the best experience I’ve ever had with a lender...I will not go anywhere else for installment loans from now on! 110% recommend!” -NellyVille1027 on August 25, 2018

Possible is currently available to California, Florida, Texas, Ohio, Washington, Idaho, and Utah residents. We're launching in additional states and you'll be added to the waitlist by registering for an account. 

Loan terms, fees, and APRs vary depending on state regulations. Our state licenses and fees can be found here: https://www.possiblefinance.com/licenses/. Our average loan term for paid-off loans is over 60 days. As an example, per Washington state law, ​a loan from Possible Finance has a max fee of 15% for every $100 borrowed.

*Max loan amounts vary by state and subject to lender approval

summary: Borrow money smarter than a payday loan or cash advance - and build credit fast!
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I'm impressed, I didn't expect to qualify and did immediately despite having a low credit score which I'm trying to improve thanks to Possible. My only minor complaint is the 4 payment option is really 2 because 2 of the payments are scheduled for the same day. Still one of if not the best loan apps available. Helps in a pinch and builds credit, thus far I'm absolutely satisfied. Great customer service too. Thanks for the opportunity!

Really easy process, and very quick response for my first loan. Had an emergency and needed to loan again, now I cannot view my loan or payment dates to make any changes. The app will load only partway and then I get an error message. This is so fustrating and I cannot reach customer service at all. There needs to be a better way to help customers!!!!

Thank you! Amazing app that makes me feel confident using. I was sick with longterm illness so my credit took a hit with medical bills & drop in income for few years. My wife has been trying to help get it up a bit & this app is definitely a Plus for both building credit & helping out when in a tight spot. To top it off? I found out the headquarters is in my state. Awesomely Awesome! Credit score is climbing!

Beware. Seems good to have access to borrow money with a reasonable bad credit interest rate. Unfortunately, when you have an issue they don't have a working customer service number and only email you back. The emails are somewhat generic; which happens often when you aren't talking directly to someone. I've wanted to pay off my defaulted loan for months now. I get emails telling me to do so in app and the suggestions aren't working.Don't deal with any company that doesn't have a customer serv#

I've been having the same issues it seems like a lot of people are having. I've paid off one loan and I'm trying to get another one but it keeps saying link bank error. It's been two days now. You email them it's like talking to a robot. I feel like it's done on purpose. I don't like getting loans but this okay for me, not anymore.

title: Mobills Budget and Bill Reminder
description:
With Mobills you can take control of your finances in a few minutes and have financial peace of mind every month. 

Mobills is a Budget app that allows you to create a custom monthly budget that will help you take control of your money. You are able to manage your money, track your spending, and achieve your financial goals all in one place.  

Budgeting just got easy Mobills helps you create a monthly budget.

When you create a plan for your money, you are then able to ensure that you will always have enough for the things you need and the things that are important to you. By using Mobills you can planner yours bills payments, you can also stay out of debt, and save money.

▸ Track your expenses and income
The app has an intuitive and easy to use interface so that you can track your budget hassle-free.

▸ Know where your money is going
Avoid scattered information in notes, statements, and expense spreadsheets. With Mobills, you can analyze your personal finances in a comprehensive manner, using graphs and reports.

▸ Budget Planner and Bill Reminder
You are able to plan your finances and goals by creating categories. Thus, creating a customized budget that works for you and your family, while tracking your expenses throughout the month.

▸ Credit card control 
Can manage all your credit cards in one place. Track your limit, total amount due, and never lose control of your  personal finances again with a built-in bill payment reminder.

▸ Learn how to save and keep your finances under control
When you take control and categorize your expenses, you will know exactly what you are spending and how you can avoid overspending. 

▸ Never miss a bill's due date
You will be alerted every time a bill needs to be paid. Which allows you to take control of due dates, and gives you financial tranquility.

Do you have difficulties save money? Think about saving and having budget planner? Are you in search of a personalized financial guide and the best finance app?

Mobills is a budget app with features created for you to replace your monthly spending spreadsheet.

Some Features

▸ Credit card manager
▸ Customized graphs and reports
▸ Advanced filters by bill, category, and tag
▸ Cloud synchronization (you can use it online and offline)
▸ Financial goals manager
▸ Expenses with geolocation (location permission)
▸ Store and save your receipts
▸ Exporting and importing of EXCEL, OFX and PDF spreadsheets (media permission)
▸ Bill payment alerts (notification by email)
▸ Monthly and Annual cash flow graphs
▸ Bill Reminder 

Mobills Free is personal finance app with some limitations. 
However, Premium Users have access to all the features described above.

recentChanges:
It's a new day, a new life and here's a list of improvements for this new version:

Redesign + dark mode of credit cards;
Sign-In and Sign-Up with Apple;
BUG fixes;
Performance improvements;
Reformulation of Credit Card Cards on the Dashboard;
Monthly credit card view.
comments: I loved this app!! It's really amazing!! You can control everything about your finances, cash, bank account, credit card and investiments. There's a really good chart to verify where your 💰 is going.

I have noticed that same expense showed under both February and March expenses list which is added on 2nd of March. When I changed the date into 6th of March, it showed only on March expenses list. Please check.

Impressive UI upgrade at first but not so user friendly. I was impressed initially but using the app to get the most out of it wasn't so easy. Just the ease of moving through the menus to edit transactions and stuff is not so easy. It is missing one prominent feature as well: multiple currency account support. I subscribed upon the new look and features but honestly, it's not so easy for me to navigate through.
Functional, need a bit more time to explore all features. The web desktop version is slow and crashes eventually when refreshing the page.

Im a premium user and I have been using this app for a month now and I've been facing multiple issues with the app features such as the alerts not working. One of the basic requirements of any budget app is to remind the user at a set time. However, this feature does not work. Moreover, I've contacted the support team multiple times but haven't received any response from them yet. So very disappointed with the app.

title: Dave Ramsey Show: Financial Advice Anytime
description:
The Dave Ramsey Show is your daily dose of real talk about life and money. Now you can get the show when and where you want it. 

Dave Ramsey is America’s trusted money expert. Get practical answers for life’s tough money questions. Join millions as they learn how to escape debt and build wealth. 

Listen and Watch Live
Join over 15 million people from coast to coast and find the hope and inspiration you need to take control of your life and money.
 
Download and Play Past Episodes
Find all the past episodes right here—anytime, anywhere. Keep track of where you left off and download episodes to play them offline!
 
Discover
Don’t miss your favorite moments, like Dave rants, debt-free screams, Millionaire Theme Hours and more.
 
Save Your Favorite Clips
With Clip Creator, you can capture your favorite sound bites and save them to your library.
 
My Library
Clips that you create from your favorite episodes or save from the Discover tab will show here.
 
See What's Coming Up
Dave often hosts special guests, like leadership experts, best-selling authors and celebrities. Plan ahead so you don’t miss any of the action.


* Android 6+ recommended

recentChanges:
• NEW! Audio Speed Control - 1x, 1.25, 1.5, Gazelle
• NEW! Audio Sleep Timer - listen to Dave as you fall asleep at night (you asked for it)
• NEW! Filters for 'Downloaded' and 'In Progress'
• NEW! See who was on past episodes!
• MAJOR stability improvements to the entire app
comments: Love this app. Multiple times he's live I can't listen to him due to work. So I can go on here and watch his show on my free time with my wife. Great content and several times he's covered topics that I was thinking about that day. No issues with the app so far, very solid platform. I have the Galaxy S9.

Excellent app. Obviously the content is great. What I enjoy about the app is that it's easy to listen to the hourly segments of each show. The hourly segments are also titled, giving you a clue as to what Dave might be discussing. Works well, have never had any issue with it. It's becoming my go to app and podcast to listen to on my morning runs.

So glad I gave this a try. I usually listen during work hours while I am working. The past few weeks, spotify has been having problems with their Windows app and mobile app which I usually use. This app has been working remarkably well for me. It has a modern UI design and has other useful perks as well. Will be listening to Dave's podcast using this from now on!

I am a Registered Nurse and I work night shift. I finally have found something exciting to listen to on my way home in the car that keeps me awake and prevents me from falling asleep at the wheel. Best of all, there is no subscription fee (unlike audible for ex.) and the show is consistent in its message of obtaining financial freedom and full of golden nuggets of facts that keeps things interesting. If you enjoy talk about finances and how to better your financial future, this show is for you.

Love the app. Love that you can download on Wi-Fi and then listen to it when not on Wi-Fi - important for someone like me who does not pay for mobile data on my phone. However, at times the app will say cannot connect to server and the app crashes. Would love to see this fixed. Also would love expansion of the categories the calls cover. Maybe there can be a special designation for "comprehensive" calls where the caller and Mr. Ramsey or the Ramsey personality cover something in depth.

title: Emma - Spending Tracker & Subscription Manager
description:
Download Emma to improve your personal finances with our free budget planner and expense tracker. Emma is a budgeting app and spending tracker that helps connect all your bank accounts in one place, track expenses, manage subscriptions, save money and avoid overdrafts by budgeting payday to payday.

Emma is a powerful budget planner tracker and money management app that can save you over $600 every year. We use state of the art technology to analyse your spending and transactions, giving you the power to make smarter decisions with your money. Take control of your finances, start budgeting with Emma.

FEATURES

● Manage all your accounts in one place
● Set monthly budgets and money goals
● Track expenses payday to payday
● Automatically categorise transactions
● Find and cancel paid subscriptions
● Identify wasteful bank fees
● Get daily balance notifications
● Avoid overdraft charges
● Get weekly reports on your spending
● Get notified when you get paid
● Save money every month

These are just some of the features you will get when using Emma as you go to budgeting tool. Want to visualise all your bank accounts, credit cards, savings, investments and pensions all in one place? Then Emma is the perfect budget app for you. Just download the app, link your bank accounts and get your free transactions report.

BANK LEVEL SECURITY

● Emma uses SSL 256-bit encryption - the same security protocol that banks use - to ensure that your sensitive personal information is fully encrypted and securely stored.
● Emma does not store your online banking credentials.
 
OUR MISSION

We believe anyone deserves a financial advocate. Someone who watches our back no matter who we are and where we come from. Emma doesn’t serve the interests of anyone. We think we can provide a great budgeting experience, which relies on a basic principle, caring about our customers’ financial well being. This is who we are and what we stand for.

Financial planning has never been that easy. Just link your accounts to Emma and let us do the heavy lifting. Whether you're looking to track expenses, manage debt repayments or budget your way to financial freedom, Emma can help with your daily needs. She'll let you know when you're spending too fast, notify you when you get paid and help you stay on track with your monthly budgets with weekly reports and budgeting tips.
 
We have received amazing feedback from the community and have been recommended by Forbes, Financial Times, Politico, The Sunday Times and CITY A.M.
 
MORE FEATURES? THAT’S A PRO

Upgrade to Emma Pro for access to premium features, including:
● Custom categories and unlimited budgeting, so you can track your finances like a ninja
● Rename transactions to edit how your transactions should look like
● Export data to understand your finances on excel
● Create manual Accounts to manage your cash expenses and any other accounts you might have
● Split your transactions into multiple categories for more flexibility
● Get access to priority support from our world class customer service team

developerAddress: PO Box GU18 5YS, 6 The Orchard, Lightwater, Surrey, United Kingdom, GU18 5YS
recentChanges: Bug fixes & performance improvements.
comments: Worked great at first. Good visuals and easy to navigate and understand. As soon as my payment for the 6 month subscription went through, it stopped syncing to my bank account and displayed the wrong information. It won't re-sync properly and I've sent multiple emails to the support team with no response. Very dissatisfied.

So far the app has been very helpful. I was able to spot that I was being charged by Amazon Prime incorrectly and could then put a stop to that. The UI is easy to use, if not a bit of an overload sometimes. Also, being able to set budgets for individual categories and having summaries of spending is great!

Great app! I don't have a problem with debt. However what this app has shown, quickly, is that I was quite wasteful. It's described by some as childish, other than the jellybaby I don't see how. It's basic yes. Once you've set up all your direct debits, payments into categories, set your budgets etc. You're all set. You can see where to save in no time. Easy to use, easy to save. No brainer! Highly recommended. Worth spending the time to set up correctly...

Expected way more ; UI : Wonderfull & beautifull. UX : Horrible, not intuitive except for budget. Cash : If you want to track your cash expenses you need pro and even there its not intuitive. Merchant & subscriptions : Really cool and work well, kind of a great idea. Missing sub-category, any analytic chart. Bugs : didn't detect bank fees, my cheking account was merge with my credit card as 1 account. There might be potential for the futur but right now "Wallet" from Budgetbakers is way better.

It's a very good way to keep an eye on all your accounts and cards in one place, they could even keep an eye on investments, pensions and savings accounts. I just wished more integrations would be available now with the advent of Open Banking, but some of them are being blocked by the banks/providers (e.g. couldn't get any savings accounts into Emma, although I had no problems with the current accounts from the same banks)

title: Money Pro - Personal Finance & Expense Tracker
description:
Expense tracker, budget planner & account manager - find them all in one app.
Money Pro® works great for personal expense tracking, family budget and even for business finance management. The app exists from 2010 on iOS/Mac (over 2.5 mln downloads worldwide) and now is available  on Android.

Money Pro is your finance manager to change your spending habits for good.

FEATURES:

⍌ Simple and secure
✓ widget for quick tracking on the go
✓ quick and easy entries whenever you like even in previous periods
✓ password & backups of your data

⍌ Income and Expense Tracker
✓ split transactions: split one cheque into multiple categories
✓ search by amount, category, description, payee, cheque number etc.
✓ recurring expenses with custom periodicity
✓ calendar for scheduling expenses for the whole year ahead
✓ notifications and alerts for bills due
✓ tracking expenses with other users and on different devices iOS, Android, Mac, Windows (PLUS subscription required)
✓ multiple profiles for separate tracking of personal and business finances
✓ attachment of receipt photos  

⍌ Budget Planner
✓ flexible structure of categories & subcategories with over 1,500 built-in icons
✓ custom periodicity: start your budget from any date
✓ visual indicators for budget spending
✓ transferring the leftover of the current period to the next budget period to limit your spending
✓ unique icons with your own photos

⍌ Account Manager
✓ easy management of unlimited number of accounts
✓ credit card tracking
✓ balance change history
✓ clearing transactions later on (reconcile)
✓ additional fields for organizing your records: payee, description, check #, class (personal/business travel expenses). 

⍌ Insightful Analytics
✓ visualize where your money goes
✓ use filters to look deeper into your spending
✓ projected balance and trend charts will help in planning

⍌ More
✓ сalculator and currency converter
✓ еxport to pdf, csv formats
✓ мultiple currencies & automatic update of exchange rates
✓ everyday reminders to get a habit of tracking expenses regularly
✓ support service (support@ibearsoft.com)


Give a try to Money Pro - a clear and complete personal finance management tool. DOWNLOAD NOW! 🎯

*You can unlock the full Money Pro experience with PLUS subscription (budget features, more reports, themes, sync across iOS, Android, Mac, Windows devices) or with a purchase of Pro version.

Terms & Privacy
- http://ibearsoft.com/privacy.html
- http://ibearsoft.com/terms.html

recentChanges:
Meet our new report "Debt Balance". Learn about your liabilities in the past and look at the debt projected balance for future periods. Control your debt even better!
Are you eager to compare your current expenses to those of the previous period? Or to the planned amounts? With a new report "Income/Expenses Comparison" you'll do it much easier.
comments: I have this installed on both Android and Apple, and when it syncs I'm getting duplicate transactions and they are not the same across both platforms. Now I understand they want to charge a yearly subscription. . I think I may go back. To expense IQ for Android.

Please read before installing. Many annoying bugs still after all these patch updates. Been using this app for about 5 years, got the pro version half way through, not much has improved, very disappointed.
Now a subscription is needed for Syncing? I purchased a full featured software before !!!! this is insulting, you should've made a different app for your subscription greed !!!!!
Overall amazing app. Recently I subscribed for year. And now I can't be happier. Easier to manage my family finances with an ease
Cannot download / Print Report & Android (Vivo) cannot Screenshot. Apps Restrict.

title: Family Budget Finance Tracking
description:
Family Budget Finance Tracking is a FREE download real time family and personal budget tool. Now you can manage your family and personal finance with easy by planning your home budget and tracking expenses. This online budgeting tool has many great features including the ability to invite family members or friends to share and edit your financial budget in real time, use date range, & many more! 

Save money and achieve financial freedom by carefully planning your personal finance. You can track expense and income using Family Budget Finance Tracking. It’s a good budget tool for individuals, family, and household.  Our feature rich financial budget tool is very user friendly and simple to use. We will guide you how to use our budget maker from start to finish with our in app tutorial. We will also display your cashflow in easy to understand format. You will gain insight about your personal finance and what are the expenses you should cut to save money.  

# FREE AND SIGN UP LATER
Family Budget Finance Tracking is free to download and use. You don’t even have to sign up now to use our budget maker app. We don’t want you to waste time signing up for a service you dislike. You can sign up later and all of your good budget data will be moved to your new account. 

# START BY CREATING YOUR MONTHLY PERSONAL BUDGET
When you first use our budget planner, we will ask you to create a monthly budget. You can choose to create Personal Budget, Family Budget, Household Budget, or a Blank one with the option to add the category later. Then put in your income and expenses in the right fields and enter the amount.

# GUIDE AND TUTORIAL WITHIN THE APP
Our budget planner app is very easy to use. From planning your income and expenses, expense track, to collaborating with family, household members, or friends. However, to make sure you will be able to take advantage of all the features, we will guide you in our app using a step by step in-app tutorial. 

# MODERN DESIGN WITH BEAUTIFUL GRAPHS
Our app has a nice design that fits all screen size. We display your data in beautiful graphics to make you understand your personal spending habit. Go to Analytics or Reports to see your data with the graphs. You can also configure your Skin on the Tools & Setting option. 

# CLOUD BACKUP AND SHARE FEATURES
Save and share your good budget with family or friends!  Use the Contributors section to Invite and Share the monthly budget you’ve created. 

# ONLINE BUDGETING
You can edit your home budget and expense tracking offline and when you’re online, our app will update your data to the cloud and your data will be shared to your family members and friends. 

# MULTIPLE CURRENCY, DATE, & TIME
Our budget planner supports many types of currency. You can configure the currency you want to use, your Time Format, and your Date Format, on Tools and Settings.
Why do you need to expense track and monitor your family’s spending habit? It’s important that everyone in the family or household understand the importance of good budget and financial planning. Use Family Budget Finance Tracking to share the financial budget with your wife, husband, and kids so they fully understand how you manage the household income and why it’s necessary for tracking expenses. You can also monitor your kids’ personal finance with this online budgeting tool and help them be responsible for their own cashflow. Let them know how they can save money by cutting down unnecessary expenses. 

Our budgeting tool is also good for projects. You can create a budget purposely for your project with our Date Range function. Invite your team members as collaborators. This way they can see the cashflow and know when to cut spending. Since everyone is up to date with the current financial data, there’s no need to ask questions about the cashflow. It saves time, money, and energy and it makes working together a breeze. 
So, what are you waiting for? Download Family Budget Finance Tracking for FREE NOW!

summary: A personal finance tool & home budget maker for tracking expenses & cashflow
recentChanges: Update in budget summary
comments: Great App. I have just started using but it is very user friendly and easy to use. Only disappointment is that we cannot take photos of our receipts and then the biggest is because in Australia we use date as day month year and there is no option to choose this format.

If you're a type A, this app is for you. Absolutely love it! Straight forward to use. Three best features would be: havng a budget for each catergory and seeing how much is left, cloning of budgets so you don't need to upgrade to use 're-occuring expences' and rolls over money left/'savings'. Literally does everything If i could chnge one thing- it would be to allow customisable colours, especialy for expenses. Would love it to be matchy matchy with my colour co-ordinated google calendar! 😍

Love this app. Would like to see a transfer from budget to budget option like on the regular " Isavemoney" app. Very elegant looking, simple but does what i need. Love the sync option, without having to save all the time between devices.

Love this app. It's just what I need without a whole lot of fuss. I can include both mine and my fiancée's income in one budget, which is nice. I would love the ability to share/sync with my partner though.
Free version is unusable. Doesn't have recurring event. Have to setup the same amounts each month. Forced currency. In other words, a sham.

title: Stash: Invest. Bank. Save.
description:
Join 4+ million people on Stash, a personal finance and investing app where you can buy stocks and funds with any dollar amount, experience banking with benefits, save and budget smarter, and learn as you go.

We offer three subscription plans: Stash Beginner, Stash Growth, and Stash+. Each plan is designed for a range of needs and goals and offers unique ways to save and invest. You can pick the plan that’s right for you, with the option to switch as your life changes.

--Transparent Pricing--

Stash Beginner ($1/mo.)**
• Includes: Personal investment account & bank account access

Stash Growth ($3/mo.)**
• Includes: Everything in Beginner + a retirement account

Stash+ ($9/mo.)**
• Includes: Everything in Growth + 2 custodial accounts, metal debit card†, 2x Stock-Back™ rewards#, & monthly market insights.

Get Your Pay Up to 2 Days Early§

All plans include access to the Stash debit card, which comes with our FDIC-insured banking account. You can get paid up to 2 days early with direct deposit. Plus, no overdraft‖, minimum balance, set-up, or hidden fees.¶

Earn Stocks & Funds As You Spend

You can use the Stash debit card to earn stocks and funds through our Stock-Back® rewards program, building a portfolio that reflects where you shop#.

Investing with any Dollar Amount

Unlike other apps, Stash lets you buy fractional shares of 200+ stocks, bonds, and ETFs—with no add-on trading commissions*. We offer personal, retirement, and custodial (for children under 18) investing accounts.

Unlimited Education

Stash Learn can help you become a finance whiz. Read investing learning guides, stay up to date on financial news, and get tips on saving, budgeting, and investing.

Automatic Saving & Investing

Auto-Stash is always included. Save spare change with Round-Ups. Save effortlessly with Smart-Stash. Or try investing regularly with Set Schedule.

*Promotion subject to T&C. Limit one cash reward per user. Promotion can't be combined w/ certain other promotions. Direct Deposit $300 in 30 day period to be eligible. See T&C: http://bit.ly/2Tedjjt 

**You’ll bear fees/expenses reflected in pricing of ETFs you invest in and may incur ancillary fees charged by Stash or its custodian not in monthly subscription price.

§ Early access to direct deposit depends on deposit verification & when Green Dot Bank gets notice from employer. May vary between pay periods.

‖ Transaction is declined. No fee charged.

¶ Other fees apply to the bank account.

# Stash Stock-Back™ Rewards is not sponsored or endorsed by Green Dot Bank, Green Dot Corporation, Visa U.S.A., or any respective affiliates. None of the foregoing has any responsibility to fulfill rewards earned in this program. T&C: https://bit.ly/2KLOqbN.

Disclosure

Debit Account Services provided by Green Dot Bank Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Investment products & services are offered by Stash Investments LLC, not Green Dot Bank, and are Not FDIC Insured, Not Bank Guaranteed, and May Lose Value. Securities offered through Apex Clearing Corporation, Member FINRA/SIPC.

For bonus offer, you accept T&C: bit.ly/2XyzcN1

Investing Involves Risk. Listed investments currently available but not representative of all. Full list: bit.ly/2XaZplv. Information shown is for illustrative/educational purposes & isn’t a recommendation. Product & company names are trademarks™ or registered® trademarks of the holder. Use does not imply affiliation with or endorsement by them. Preliminary information provided to prospective clients prior to Stash accepting a signed advisory agreement is not investment advice & should not be relied on as such. Stash Investments LLC ("Stash") is an SEC registered investment adviser. Must be 18+ to open a Stash account. Stash only available to US citizens, permanent residents & select visa types.

More:bit.ly/2XCMDM0

summary: Over 4 million Americans are building a financial future with Stash. Start now.
recentChanges:
Hey Stashers, thank you for weathering the storm with us during times of market volatility. Remember—keep following The Stash Way.

Some updates:
• Fixed issue with displaying cents in your portfolio
• Improvements to direct deposit
• Fixes to prevent app crashes

To stay healthy during COVID-19: Wash your hands. Sneeze into your elbow. Avoid touching your face.
Stay safe and healthy out there!
comments: IMPORTANT READ!!! Before you go and sign up make sure this is what you want to do. I created an account on 3/18/20 and during the process when you give your debit/credit they say they will not charge you but they do indeed even if you don't link your bank account to your profile so be forewarned this company's app is very deceptive it will charge you for whatever subscription you choose. I explained this to customer service that the charge was not authorized but they did not care or refund me

If you're a pro looking for a super streamlined investment app with all the bells and whistles, look elsewhere. Stash is a no-nonsense long haul investment tool with educational media for people who want to invest their money without having to invest their lives in chasing market statistics. I love their no-nonsense approach to simple investing, and I plan to stick with them for the long haul

It is true giving it 3 stars for now only because I don't see how you can withdraw the funds from your investments into your bank card if needed especially in these times unlike your competitor app (Acorns) just went to check it out and you could withdraw from your invested funds into your bank account with them. Do you think that is a wise financial option for the app user there's an obvious wall there to get to my funds if need be help me understand what is this overlooked fact please

Awesome app. Great for beginners wanting to learn about investing as well as seasoned vets. Their FB page group is one of the most respectful and helpful bunch of ppl I've met online thus far. The only reason I didn't rate five stars is there are still some small glitches myself and others are experiencing from time to time. So there is a little room for improvement, but these are minor compared to the extensive and expansive options this app offer's, along with a strong support FB group.

DON'T GET STASH!! They locked my already-existing account months ago for no reason. Made me jump through hoops to unlock it (uploading docs). The upload page didn't work. Support is awful; once they hung up on me. I was told to email the docs. I did. Nothing. When I call, they say they need more docs or more time to review them. (Why?) I just sent my ss card and they're saying the res is bad, but higher res won't email. Excuses! I still have no access to my portfolio at all and no recourse.

title: Financial Calculators
description:
For phone and tablet, this application includes the complete package of financial calculators by Bishinews:

  Finance and Investment Calculators

    * TVM Calculator
    * Currency Converter
    * Compound Interest Calculator
    * Return On Investment (ROI) Calculator
    * IRR NPV Calculator
    * MIRR Calculator
    * Bond Calculator
    * Tax Equivalent Yield Calculator
    * Rule of 72 Calculator
 
  Loan/Mortgage Calculators

    * Loan/Mortgage Calculator
    * Loan Comparison Calculator
    * Loan Refinance Calculator
    * APR Calculator
    * APR Advanced Calculator
    * Commercial Loan Calculator
    * Simple Loan Calculator
    * Loan Analysis Calculator
    * Home Affordability Calculator
    * Rent vs Buy Calculator
    * Mortgage Tax Saving Calculator
    * Discount Points Calculator
    * Adjustable Rate Calculator
    * Fixed vs Adjustable Rate Calculator
    * Bi-weekly Payment Calculator
    * Interest Only Calculator

  Retirement Calculators

    * Retirement Planner
    * 401k Contribution Calculator
    * Retirement Calculator
    * Retirement Savings Analysis
    * Retirement Income Analysis
    * Traditional IRA vs Roth IRA
    * Required Minimum Distribution
    * Social Security Estimator
    * Asset Allocation Calculator
    * 401k Save the Max Calculator
    * College Savings Calculator
 
  Stock Calculators

    * Stock Return Calculator
    * Stock Constant Growth Calculator
    * Stock Non-constant Growth Calculator
    * CAPM Calculator
    * Expected Return Calculator
    * Holding Period Return Calculator
    * Weighted Average Cost of Capital Calculator
    * Pivot Point Calculator
    * Fibonacci Calculator
    * Black-Scholes Option Calculator
 
  Credit Card Calculators

    * Credit Card Payoff Calculator
    * Credit Card Minimum Calculator
 
  Auto Loan and Lease Calculators

    * Auto Loan Calculator
    * Auto Lease Calculator

  Miscellaneous Calculators

    * Regular Calculator
    * Tip Calculator
    * Discount and Tax Calculator
    * Percentage Calculator
    * Date Calculator
    * Unit Conversion
    * US Inflation Calculator
    * Margin and Markup Calculator
    * Fuel Calculator
    * Salary Increase Calculator
    * US Paycheck Tax Calculator
    * US Health Savings Account Calculator
    * Net Distribution Calculator
    * Effective Rate Calculator
    * Mutual Fund Fee Calculator
    * Unit Price Compare Calculator
    * Balance Sheet and Income Statement Analysis
    * Financial Ratios
    * US Interest Rate
    * US Mortgage Rate
    * Commodities and Futures


User can send the calculation results to others via Email. Financial Professionals can email the quote to their clients.

The app allows you to edit and prioritize the list of calculators for easy access.

Only Currency Converter needs internet access to retrieve the latest currency exchange rate. The app works without internet connection.

100% FREE – full features, no hidden charges or in-app purchases

This app doesn't request any permission.

Please send question and suggestion to us at pfinanceapp@gmail.com. We actively support users.

* Balance Sheet and Income Statement Analysis
* Financial Ratios
* US Interest Rate
* US Mortgage Rate
* Commodities and Futures


User can send the calculation results to others via Email. Financial Professionals can email the quote to their clients.

The app allows you to edit and prioritize the list of calculators for easy access.

Only Currency Converter needs internet access to retrieve the latest currency exchange rate. The app works without internet connection.

100% FREE – full features, no hidden charges or in-app purchases

This app doesn't request any permission.

Please send question and suggestion to us at pfinanceapp@gmail.com. We actively support users.
summary: The most complete financial Calculator which can both save and make you money.
recentChanges:
- Add Interest Rate Data
- Add Mortgage Rate Data
- Add Commodity and Futures Data
- Add Mortgage Rates Data
- Add Health Savings Account Calculator
- Many Enhancements
- Bug Fixes
comments: Depreciation still wrong after so many requests for correction. Otherwise, a great app. If you are able to develop such a complete and great app, why would it be so hard for you to fix the depreciation in declining balance and sum of the years digits methods? At some point some business related person who needs to calculate depreciation will realize that it doesn't calculate correctly and is going to be very disappointed despite the positive quality of the app.
Great accurate and convenient app. Simple intersest amortization and grace period option should be added.
I'm actually rather mad, but I'm not sure who's to blame. Your app bypassed my update settings. I have it set to not auto update and only on WiFi. But your app still updated on its own
One of the best financial calculators, having almost all type of calculators.
Bond pricing always wrong . all else seems good otherwise lovely app

title: Prism Pay Bills, Money Tracker, Personal Finance
description:
Never miss bills or pay late fees again! Prism is the free personal finance app that automatically tracks bills & sends bill pay reminders. See your income, account balances, monthly expenses & spending together so that you can pay bills in seconds. 
 
★ NerdWallet’s 2018 “Best app for paying and tracking bills.” 
★ Over 14,000 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ reviews! 
★Over $1 billion in paid bills.
 
5 ways to use the #1 bill tracker app: 
• Pay bills on time 
• Track bills, monthly expenses, money & debt
• See account balances & available credit
• Manage personal finances
• View checking & savings accounts
 
Prism is magic for your bills! 💰
✔ More billers than any other app (over 11,000)!
✔ Automatic bill tracking: due dates, bill totals & payment history
✔ Free same-day bill pay
✔ Bill pay alerts and bill reminders 🗓
✔ Easy-to-understand graphs of your personal finances & expenses 📈
✔ Bill payment history 
✔ Exclusive payment options
✔ Bill calendar & payment calendar view
✔ Comprehensive bill list view 
 
Automatic Bill Reminders
We automatically track bills and send due date bill reminders. Save money by never paying bill late fees again.  
 
Pay bills in seconds, for free
Bill pay is quick, easy, and free. Schedule your bill payment same day or weeks out. You won’t forget to pay bills thanks to bill pay reminders. 
 
Bill Tracker 
Effortlessly track your money and bills at a glance. Prism organizes all of your financial accounts together in one app so you don’t waste time logging into multiple websites to check due dates, checking and savings account balances, or to pay your bill statements. 
 
Manage Debt, Bills & Money
Prism is the easiest way to manage debt. Track your bills, income, account balances, and monthly expenses with an easy-to-read graph. See all your debt in one place. You’ll always know which account to use for your next bill payment. 
 
More billers than any other app 
Prism has over 11,000 billers that you can connect to in the app, from national billers like USAA, Verizon, Ally Auto, and Navient, to smaller local utilities. We also cover larger mainstream banks and credit card providers, like Chase, Capital One and Wells Fargo, to community-oriented credit unions, like Boeing Employees Credit Union, Alliant Credit Union, and Suncoast Credit Union.
 
If you don’t see one of your billers in the app, keep your eyes peeled. We add new billers every month!
 
SECURITY
The security of your sensitive information is the foundation of our personal finance app. Our commitment to security has allowed us to process over $1 billion in bills during the last six years. 
• We never sell your sensitive information
• 256-bit AES encryption 
• Delete your account any time
• PIN/biometric authentication settings
 
To learn more about how we protect your data, please visit https://www.prismmoney.com/about/security.
 
Want to get in touch? Find us on Facebook or Twitter @PrismMoney, or message us in the app.
 
Thank you for all of your five-star reviews! It means a lot to us 😄
Questions/comments? Email us at info@prismmoney.com. We love hearing from you!
