recentChanges: We fixed some bugs and made the app better. Enjoy!
comments: LOVE THIS APP! I've used this app for about 2 years already, and it has helped me keep track of everything! I love that I can see mine and my husband's balances together (we don't have a joint account yet), so it helps with budgeting. I just had my mom download & use this app too! I'm always on top of bills, but this allows me to pay all of them ahead of time at once!

Ever since BillGo took over prism, this app has gone downhill. It used to update and work well with banks. Customer support used to be fast and efficient with any problems. That is no longer the case. Accounts no longer update. Capital One has not updated since 10/2019! Most accounts comment that bill payments are not reliable and should be paid outside of app to be reliable. The worst customer service is virtually non existent, nothing gets resolved. Prism was small team before. No excuses.

Great app to keep track of your bank accounts and bills. It allows to pay bills for free. Unfortunately, there are still unsupported banks and the app does not provide enough warning for extraordinary charges like late fees and interests....edited in Mar 2020.getting better and better. A well deserved 5 stars!

This app used to be so good, fast, responsive, collected all my bills, and showed me my balance at a glance. But it's all gone downhill in the past year or so. The app is slow, doesn't pull in all my bills, won't link some accounts, won't link to my bank account...it's really sad because the original developers were really good.

Pretty good It keeps all my bills. All are synced. The only default is that i used the app to pay my tv/phone from Spectrum once and it never paid it. I had to contact them to make sure they didnt take it because i had to go on my own online to pay it. Still uneasy about paying my bills with the app. But it does keep me on track on what is due.

title: Albert: Save and Spend Smarter
description:
YOUR FRIEND IN FINANCE
Combining human guidance with cutting-edge technology, Albert automates your financial life — so you can be free to enjoy it. Build savings, meet bills, end the overspending cycle and develop your financial IQ, right from the palm of your hand.

Download now to see why Forbes, Huffington Post, The New York Times and others have recommended Albert.

INVEST FROM ANYWHERE
Take your money to the next level with Albert Investments. Even if you have zero experience, you can put your money to work with commission-free investments.

Let Albert customize an automatic, diversified portfolio for you or mix and match to build your own.

SAVING GOALS IN REACH
Whether you want to pay off debt or book a dream vacation, Albert puts your goals in reach with automatic savings. We identify dollars you won't miss throughout the week, then set them aside for what's important.

GENIUS ADVICE + HUMAN WISDOM
Meet Albert Genius: a revolutionary feature offering guidance from our team of financial experts, or "geniuses."

Our geniuses are real people, not bots, with knowledge that covers most financial areas. They work alongside the app to improve your financial health and provide personalized advice.

Questions about investment plans? Meeting your bills? Paying off credit cards? Send us a text and we'll get to work.

Some topics our geniuses cover: Budgeting • Credit cards • College savings • Insurance • Investments • Debt • Retirement • Student loans

ALWAYS WORKING FOR YOU
We work in the background to spot unfamiliar charges, find extra savings and identify bills to lower. We send smart alerts in real-time, putting an end to financial surprises so you can stay on top of your money.

PRAISE FROM THE PRESS
⁃ “The Albert app provides a personalized savings account and can look at car insurance policies and credit cards to find better deals. Banks are racing to catch up with such digital advances." — NEW YORK TIMES

⁃ "Dying for an app that takes the math out of budgeting? Albert would be the best choice for you." — FORBES

⁃ "For a clear picture of where my spending is going, access to advice and suggestions for where to improve, I’ll definitely stick with Albert." — HUFFINGTON POST

FEATURES
• A custom financial plan
• Our on-demand support team of real financial geniuses
• Albert Savings: the cutting-edge feature created to help reach your goals faster
• Albert Investments: our commission-free service that helps anyone become an investor
• Smart alerts for rising bills, bank fees and new subscription charges
• Automatic account syncing puts all your finances in one clean interface
• Thousands of supported U.S. financial institutions
• 24-7 account monitoring for fraud and fees

SECURITY
• Your peace of mind is our highest priority.
• Albert uses cutting-edge technology to protect your most sensitive information.

INSURANCE
• Funds in your Albert Savings account are FDIC-insured. Should anything happen to the member bank or company holding your savings, you'll be insured for up to $250,000 of your money in the account.

• Funds in your Albert Investments account are SIPC-protected. This is a more limited protection against the loss of securities and cash held at a member firm up to $500,000 in the event the firm fails. This does not protect the securities you own from going down in value if the market changes.

Albert Investments, LLC is a Registered Investment Advisor. Albert can only offer investment services to clients where Albert and its representatives are properly licensed. The content posted is solely to inform. Investments are risky: you could lose money, and past performance is no guarantee of future returns. Albert is only available to U.S. residents who are 18+. For more information, see our Form ADV Part II and our Terms of Use at albert.com.

recentChanges:
Your Genius just got a bit smarter: introducing Albert Investments!
• No matter your budget or experience, put your money to work with our commission-free guided investing service.
• Select and manage your own funds. Or, tell us about your goals and receive a Genius portfolio customized to your profile in minutes.
• And, don’t miss the interactive Genius tab. Get help with the financial topics you care about most.
• As always, enjoy our latest handful of tweaks and bug fixes.
comments: So far, so good! I've received my advanced after being asked a bunch of questions including asking your SSN just letting you know. They do ask that you put back at least $1 for what they call a rainy day fund which is withdrawn from your account attached monthly as well. I have not however used the Gold feature of the app, which actually asks that you expend more money to interact with that and I don't need that feature anyway.

I have been using this app for about a year before deciding to rate it, and it definitely deserves a great rating. Using the app you have your own savings account accessible from your phone. You can set up multiple folders and decide which you want your money to go into and how much you want. You can set up an automatic transfer where Albert will pull a small portion of funds from your checking account and put it into your Albert account. Those are just 2 perks to this app, check it out.

It's been almost 2 weeks, and their apps' system has not updated my account to use instant. They keep saying "wait 2-3 business days". Whilst telling me that " our system usually fix this error in the timeframelisted above. But this situation is going to take a week. This happened right after they approved me for $75. The system somehow works when they charged my card the monthly fee 🤔🤔 . This app is doing some illegal stuff. And needs to be shut down. Until their system can work properly.

Albert is very straightforward and easy to understand and use. They have a lot of cool features that you can take advantage of, and some that you normally would have to pay for at traditional banks to be able to utilize, but are free with Albert. Very convenient and a great job creating it. On another note: Finally a competitor to Dave. Don't get me wrong, they are both incredibly apps, my thoughts are that competition drives innovation which means more awesome features for the users to enjoy.

I have had this app for a few months and I love it. It doesn't say it will advance me money I am not qualified for, like the other applications. It asks what my longterm goals are, it sets up a rainy day fund for me as requested, but they look at my paychecks and what bills are coming out and what I can spare and puts it in there for me which is nice. By far the best app of this nature I have used. Actually this is the first google app I think I have ever left a review for.

title: OneMain Financial - Personal Loans
description:
OneMain Financial is a personal and auto loan provider.  Get mobile access to your OneMain Financial account right at your fingertips. OneMain Financial customers can log in to get their loan account details.



The OneMain Financial mobile app can only be used by current customers to service their loans. We do not offer the ability to submit new loan applications through the Android mobile app.

Loans offered by OneMain Financial have a minimum repayment period of 24 months and a maximum repayment period of 60 months. The Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) for a personal loan is 35.99%. Minimum possible loan amount offered is $1,500 and maximum amount is $20,000.

Borrowers in these states are subject to these minimum loan sizes: Alabama: $2,100. California: $3,000. Georgia: Unless you are a present customer, $3,100 minimum loan amount. Ohio: $2,000. Virginia: $2,600.

Borrowers (other than present customers) in these states are subject to these maximum unsecured loan sizes: Florida: $8,000. Iowa: $8,500. Maine: $7,000. Mississippi: $7,500. North Carolina: $7,500. New York: $20,000. Texas: $8,000. West Virginia: $14,000. An unsecured loan is a loan which does not require you to provide collateral (such as a motor vehicle) to the lender.

OneMain Financial charges loan origination fees. Depending on the state where you open your loan, the origination fee may be either a flat amount or a percentage of your loan amount. Flat fee amounts vary by state, ranging from $30 to $150. Percentage-based fees vary by state ranging from 1% to 5% of your loan amount subject to certain state limits on the fee amount.

Example Loan: A $6,000 loan with a 24.99% APR that is repayable in 60 monthly installments would have monthly payments of $176.07.

comments: It's a fantastic way to manage my loans, pretty simple process overall. Rewards and credit score features are an added bonus which helps make the app feel worth it. Has room for some improvement, but overall pretty good app.
It's an easy and simple way to manage your loans make payment and that you like the biometric authentication. And I like that they let me sign in with biometric.

One main was quickly and easily able to get a personal loan done for me when no one else would give me a loan due to my credit score. Yes the interest rates and apr are a little higher but the process was easy and there were no prepayment penalties. Fast and quick service. I would recommend if you're in a pinch and trying to consolidate debt.

Garbage app, doesn't work half the time when you try to log in. So I just wait for them to call when a payment is late. I figure if they really wanted on time payments, they could at least offer a functional product since they won't take cash payments in their offices anymore.
Quick and Easy. Interest is a little high But thats Ok.

title: MoneyLion: Mobile Banking
description:
Discover 2019’s Best Digital Bank with 0% APR Instacash advances, zero bank fees, low-interest credit builder loans, managed investing, cash rewards, trivia, and more. Finally, finance is easy!
 
MoneyLion is an all-in-one mobile banking membership, where everyone can dream big, even if they start small. Get the premium financial tools you deserve without the fees and BS you’re used to from other banks. 
 
Signup takes minutes, and you’ll get benefits right away. Here’s some of what our 5 million members love about banking with us:
 
• 0% APR Instacash advances 
• Checking account with zero fees
• Credit builder loans (70% of members raise their credit 30+ points in 60 days)
• Managed investing with no minimums or management fees 
• Credit score tracking
• Personal loans 
• Financial Heartbeat: financial health monitor and advice 
• Cashback and rewards like $25 gift cards to Amazon & Target
 
“2019 Best Digital Bank” — Finovate Awards
“MoneyLion provides an all-in-one platform for anything finance related.”  — TechCrunch
“Here's the idea: bring the same methods that the big sharks use to build wealth, to everyone.” — CNNMoney
“MoneyLion brings better lending to Americans who might be struggling financially.”— Cheddar
“MoneyLion is making it easier to invest.” — Huffington Post
 
START ENJOYING AN EASIER FINANCIAL LIFE TODAY:

Sign up! Download the MoneyLion app and choose your membership to unlock features like:
 
MoneyLion Visa Debit Card & Checking Account: Enjoy absolutely zero fees, including no hidden fees, and fast transfers and tracking in the palm of your hand. So easy. 
 
0% APR Instacash with Banking: Get up to $250 in cash advances day or night, whether you want to ward off a late fee or have a fun night out. Afford to be spontaneous!

Credit builder loans: Get a Credit Builder Plus membership to unlock a low-APR loan with reporting to all three credit bureaus and exclusive perks like Lion’s Share payouts.
 
Managed investing: Invest the easy way! No minimums. No management fees. Just add funds to your Investment account, and we’ll put it to work in your personalized portfolio. 
 
Credit tracking: Check your score any time and get stats important to improving your credit like credit age and credit inquiries.



MoneyLion Core or MoneyLion Credit Builder Plus (paid) membership required to participate in certain programs, services, cash advances, checking account and/or loans. See website or app for terms, conditions and details. MoneyLion investment account is managed by affiliated, SEC-registered investment adviser ML Wealth, LLC. It is not FDIC insured or bank-guaranteed, and is subject to risk of loss, including loss of principal. For important information and disclaimers relating to the investment account, please go to http://www.moneylion.com/adv. MoneyLion Checking Account provided by, and MoneyLion Visa® Debit Card issued by, Lincoln Savings Bank, Member FDIC. Identity and account verification required. Loans are offered through MoneyLion affiliates or through First Electronic Bank, Member FDIC. View full terms and conditions at www.moneylion.com/terms-and-conditions.

All loans in the USA with an APR of 5.99% are made by state-licensed subsidiaries. Loan terms range from 6 - 18 months with 0% origination fees. An example of total amount paid on a personal loan of $500 for a term of 12 months at an APR of 5.99% with 0% origination fees, would be equivalent to $515.07 over the 12 month life of the loan.

See website or app for terms, conditions and details. MoneyLion investment account is managed by affiliated, SEC-registered investment adviser ML Wealth, LLC. It is not FDIC insured or bank-guaranteed, and is subject to risk of loss, including loss of principal. For important information and disclaimers relating to the investment account, please go to http://www.moneylion.com/adv. MoneyLion Checking Account provided by, and MoneyLion Visa® Debit Card issued by, Lincoln Savings Bank, Member FDIC. Identity and account verification required. Loans are offered through MoneyLion affiliates or through First Electronic Bank, Member FDIC. View full terms and conditions at www.moneylion.com/terms-and-conditions.

All loans in the USA with an APR of 5.99% are made by state-licensed subsidiaries. Loan terms range from 6 - 18 months with 0% origination fees. An example of total amount paid on a personal loan of $500 for a term of 12 months at an APR of 5.99% with 0% origination fees, would be equivalent to $515.07 over the 12 month life of the loan.
summary: Bank. Borrow. Invest. Grow!
recentChanges: This update was all about speed! We made a few tweaks so you can get interest-free cash even faster after you sign up for an Instacash with Banking membership. Plus, we made it easier to link external accounts when you want to transfer money.
comments: Extremely stupid app, with even stupider customer service. My bank account got hacked so I had to update it, and it's been several weeks now, and their lame customer service hasn't been able to do it. They literally can't update a f'ing bank account. This is their business! Bank accounts! At this point, I'm not so certain they're not the reason I got hacked in the first place. Edit2: I tried doing the phone call thing, and no one ever called me. Even that doesn't apparently work.

I give it that score because of the issue with the credit builder plus. I have tried both my accounts funded by my salary and none work. This opps message is annoying. I also have ask and called, they say the banks are communicating with the app, check passwords and check the app version. I have done it all, nothing. Why offer this if it does not work for some banks.

Customer Service is worthless but overall the app is good but in the same sense it's also bad. Won't let me add or update my credit/ debit card same card number just a different expiration date and security code. It says that the card has been added, but it never shows it. But other than that I'm somewhat satisfied with it. I wish they'd go back to the $1 a day login reward. Now I can't even switch banks, I wish you could just use a routing number and account number to add or setup a new bank.

Keep getting errors...says I need to link my bank for instacash but bank is linked...tried to sign up for credit builder and keep getting same msg that it's my internet...also everytime I try to connect my bank (although my bank is connected in my accounts) it knocks out the other connections to my other financial apps such as Dave and brigit...very strange...tried several times..always the same thing each time...guess it's a sign to stay away..

Not worth it all. If you use their Instacash feature Beware they will debit your account outside of your pay dates. I saw the date in the app was seven days before my pay date & reached out that the debit date was wrong. They told me everything was updated then a couple days later started taking out the exact amounts I had in my account leaving me with $0. They did this again the next day after 12 emails explaining this.They're response is it is automated and there is nothing they can do. AVOID

title: Instant Financial
description:
Only available at employers offering Instant.

For verified employees who are paid by Instant, the Instant Financial app gives you daily access to your earned wages and/or tips for free. Your employer must offer Instant as a pay disbursement option in order to receive your pay on Instant.

Connect your Instant card with your Instant account to receive your wages and/or tips, make in-store and online purchases, and withdraw cash from ATMs. Use the Instant app to receive important notifications, claim Instant Pay offers, check your real-time balance and view your recent activity, find the nearest ATM for free cash withdrawals, and transfer your money to another bank account. 

Instant puts you in control over how you get paid.

GETTING STARTED
1. Create an Instant account with your email address and password
2. Enter your personal information for verification purposes
3. Connect the Instant card you received from your manager by scanning the barcode to the right of your Instant card on your welcome letter (the paper your card was glued on)
4. Find your employer and add a job
5. Once you’re verified, you’ll receive your earned wages and/or tips right to your Instant card after your shift

FEATURES & BENEFITS
• Pair a new or replacement Instant card to your Instant account
• Get notified when Instant Pay offers are available
• Get notified when you’ve been paid your Instant Pay, the balance of your Net Pay, or Instant Tips
• Receive your daily wages and/or tips directly to your Instant card and have immediate access to your money
• Check your account balance and review your latest account activity
• Find the nearest ATM for free cash withdrawal across the MoneyPass ATM Network (US) or the Exchange ATM Network (Canada) 
• Freeze and unfreeze your card so your money cannot be spent or withdrawn in case your card is lost or stolen
• Transfer money to another bank account - one-time transfers and scheduled recurring transfers
• Receive support via email, chat, or phone call
• Update your personal information in the app
• Pay your bills (in Canada only, US coming soon)

NO USAGE FEES
At Instant, we don’t believe in charging you fees to receive, spend, or access your own hard earned money. We only charge avoidable fees, such as a 90-day account inactivity fee or an off-network ATM withdrawal fee. 

For a comprehensive list of fees, please refer to our US Cardholder Agreement (https://www.instant.co/us-cha/) or our Canadian Cardholder Agreement (https://www.instant.co/ca-cardholder-agreement/) 

PRE-AUTHORIZATIONS
Please be aware that some merchants, such as gas stations, restaurants, hotels, and car rental agencies, may place a temporary pre-authorization hold to ensure your card is valid and that there are sufficient funds on the card to cover the final amount. Holds are usually removed and released back to your card when the transaction is completed within 5 days or sooner. Some merchants, such as hotels and car rental agencies, have pre-authorization holds that can last up to 45 days.

BANK TRANSFERS
Please be aware that bank transfers made before 1PM ET can take an estimated 1 business day to process and appear in the destination bank account. 

Bank transfers made after 1PM ET will take an estimated 2 business days to process and appear in your destination bank account.

Need your money sooner? Visit an ATM to withdraw your cash and deposit it into your bank account the same day.

RESTRICTIONS
Please note, you can only load your Instant card through wages, tips, or reimbursements received from your employer.

SUPPORT
• FAQ: https://instant.zendesk.com/hc/en-us
• Chat Support: Tap on the menu icon, tap on “Help”, and tap on “Chat With Support”
• Phone Support: Call the number on the back of your card

summary: Instant gives you free access to your earned pay after your shift.
recentChanges: Android general reliability improvements
comments: Worst pay app ever!!!. might get paid on time but god forbid that you have any questions or need any help because their customer service is a sham. They always seem to understand your problem never once have they helped solve an issue, and ive had several especially when it comes to hidden fees, service charge fees, and missing money. Its always "i wish there was something i could do" or "we dont deal with that on our end". And when u wana speak to a supervisor or manager guess what? They are🤦

Seriously? My device just had a routine update & now Instant won't even open. I tried all of the usual things, restarting my device, uninstalling & reinstalling Instant & it continues to crash "instantly" when I attempt to access Instant. Based on the reviews I've read on your app, this sort of thing is consistent with the issues a lot of people are having. It would seem this app is in dire need of an overhaul. When do you think that I'll be able to access my money? Any ideas?

I haven't had this app for very long. However, I love how easy it is for me to receive and use the tips I get from work. I wish my instant card could be used online or/ and with Samsung Pay. One BIG problem that I have is that the "Real-Time" money transfer does not work. I put in my card info and press and card but nothing happens; this happens on the webpage as well. 5 stars if the "Real-Time" money transfer worked. How it gets fixed.

Instant financial another app. Yes Michael Ryan likes to respond to the software engineers and developers. That user time well. So remember to instant financial it all together when you sync it with Google's app I already offer. It's all free at least the apps in the Google play store. Just remember to pay for some of the score. And that's not funny it's not a joke. It takes a lot of time and effort. To help the world all come up together. So let's love. Your friend Michael's family 😊🙌😍. we

Fees for everything, compatible with very few atms. I you have to use one they aren't partnered with, not only do you get charged the atm fee, instant charges you also :( they even charge you to check your balance at non partner atms lol I wish my company would switch to something better ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

title: Goodbudget: Budget & Finance
description:
Goodbudget (formerly EEBA, the Easy Envelope Budget Aid) is a money manager and expense tracker that’s great for home budget planning. This personal finance manager is a virtual update on your grandma’s envelope system--a proactive budget planner that helps you stay on top of your bills and finances. Built for easy, real-time tracking. And, sync across Android, iPhone, and the web to share your budget with your budgeting partners. Keep everyone on the same page with household finances!


The best income and expense tracking tool. Ever. Yup.

Not yet convinced?

• Recommended by Experts. Google. The New York Times. Forbes. LifetimeTV. Boston Globe. About.com, Lifehacker, the Register, Verizon Wireless, Leave Debt Behind, yada yada yada.
• Top quality. Ranked #3 in App Quality across ALL finance apps in both major app stores. [1]
• Downloaded over 3,000,000 times

And loved by users everywhere
...which, after all, is what matters most…

CHOCK FULL OF FEATURES

SYNC ACROSS MULTIPLE DEVICES (AND WEB)
• Automagically syncs across Android, iPhone, and the web
• Stay on the same page about finances with loved ones
• Data is automatically and securely backed up to Goodbudget’s website

PERSONAL FINANCIAL MANAGER FOR LIFE ON-THE-GO
• Expense tracking optimized for speed!
• Check Envelope & Account balances
• Save for the future with Goal and Annual Envelopes
• Scheduled transactions and Envelope fills
• Split expense transactions
• Save time with smart payee and category suggestions
• Easily transfer funds between Envelopes and Accounts
• Search for transactions
• Add income
• Choose budget period to match real-life
• Add and edit Accounts
• Location-based widget! Enter common transactions in exactly 3 touches. Control in Settings. (Note: widget will not be available if you move app to SD due to Android limitation)
• Edit budget as needed!

INSIGHTFUL REPORTS
• Analyze spending with Spending by Envelope Report
• Monitor cashflow with Income vs. Spending Report

ALSO ON THE WEB
• Download transactions to CSV
• Bank account statement import in QFX (Quicken) and OFX (Microsoft Money) formats with auto-matching to manually entered transactions
• Clear/reconcile transactions
• Even more reports!

BASED ON PROVEN ENVELOPE SYSTEM
• No physical envelopes...only virtual ones!
• Roll unused funds over to the new month to reward your amazing self-control!
• Plan finances ahead of time to keep budget on track
• Live within your means
• A darn cute envelope mascot

Ad-free, Free Forever version includes 10 regular envelopes & 10 annual envelopes. Use envelope budgeting to plan your spending, not just track it!

SUBSCRIBERS GET MORE FEATURES!

• Unlimited Envelopes AND Accounts
• Sync up to 5 devices
• 7 years of transaction history
• Personal and friendly email support

Looking for a finance manager, money tracker, checkbook ledger, or household budget planner? Try us out!

Goodbudget: Budget well. Live life. Do good.

Features, bugs? Please email us at support@goodbudget.com! We're happy to help!

[1] https://goodbudget.com/2018/04/goodbudget-top-finance-app/

developerAddress:
1224 Fairfax Avenue
San Francisco, CA 94124
USA
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I really want to use this app with my partner, its exactly what we've been looking for - the problem is that while my partner, who uses an iphone, can set her envelopes' budget periods to be every two weeks, I dont have the same option on the android version of the app, only monthly and yearly! Its very annoying, and preventing me from using it effectively as my income is fortnightly - are there plans for this option to be added to the android version of the app too?

Best budgeting app I've used by far. Very quick to load data. Doesn't ask for all of my personal information. Doesn't allow all transaction types from the app (income, debt payments, envelope filling) which is a bummer, but I use them infrequently enough that I can use the desktop version. Much better experience than Mint overall.

Love the browser version but this App is seriously lacking. Can't see envelope balances when filling, splitting charges is a nightmare. The list goes on. It's like no one who developed the app ever actually tried to use it. It would be 1 star if I didn't like the browser version so much but seriously considering switching due to the app.

The desktop website is great. However, the Android app is sorely lacking in features. The app completely ignores envelope groups, unlike the website which groups the envelopes in both the reports and in the envelopes list and allows you to collapse groups you don't want to see temporarily. I wish I could filter the envelopes on groups and filter transactions on accounts in the app. If I click on an envelope in the reports, I wish to see the corresponding transactions in that time range.

Great app but I would like to know how to use it more effectively . I can't seem to tick off what I have paid in monthly expenses . So my income balance always shows a plus amount. It's not a realistic reflection of my money.

title: Stock Market Tracker
description:
Get real-time stock quotes and alerts with Uplift, the best stock market app for Android.

✓ Track US stock markets or international stock markets
✓ Stock market news feed for each stock quote
✓ Stock portfolios for NASDAQ, NYSE, Dow Jones, ETFs, Indices, S&P 500
✓ Stock market live quotes, to monitor your stock portfolio and investments easily

Our stocks tracker pulls in real-time stock market quotes so you're always up-to-date. You can watch stocks and follow market news, view your portfolio, get stock alerts, and follow the major stock exchanges. You can also set stock price notifications, so that when a stock you're watching reaches your target price you'll get a stock price alert.

Top features
★ Real-time stock quotes, easy to track portfolios, and up-to-the-minute data to help you stay on top of the markets. We aim to be the best stock quote app with real-time stocks.

★ Build your own portfolio and monitor your favorite stocks, indexes, mutual funds, and ETFs

★ Set alerts and get push notifications for stocks on your watch list

★ Multiple portfolios to keep track of your stock trading and investments

★ Financial data including open price, close price, daily high/low, 52-week high/low, gain/loss, aftermarket and premarket, end-of-day quote, EPS, P/E ratio, dividend, and dividend yield

★ Stock charts and including daily and intraday charts, plus weekly, monthly, and yearly historical charts

★ Stock market news for tickers listed in US stock markets

★ Advanced features including ROA, ROE, cash flow including FCF and OCF per share, revenue growth, P/B, asset turnover, leverage, stocks tracker, forward P/E, and PEG ratio

Investing and monitoring the financial markets doesn't have to be hard! Whether you're looking to buy, sell, or just keep track of your portfolio, Uplift will help you get stock quotes and stock alerts to react to market news in real time.

Supports thousands of stock tickers and companies to invest in. 

Questions or comments? Let us know: uplifthelp@gmail.com. We aim to be the best stock market app for Android 🚀

comments: Don't know how good this is overall, stopped short and uninstalled due to graphing control. Once you tap into zoom/scroll mode, you can't get back to curser mode. And doesn't have screen rotation or full screen graphs.

This is a great simple app and I am happy I got the paid version, it would be really great if app would also some visuals on company's revenue and profit over the past several years from their earning calls.

I would say this app is just okay it provides very basic minimal information for free I would expect to see a percentage as a rationalized value in any free product however you have to buy the premium to actually understand percentage

the info in the paid service are not impressive enough. at least it should show the 52 week low price. or even let the user, choose to show 2 year low, 3 year low price, or whatever time span. these are info the info service provider could easily provide. that would save much effort to the end users
It is simple to use. It quick if ur just wanting a update. I like it because I can set a alarm when a price is close to my limit order.

title: Wealthfront
description:
Save. Plan. Invest.
Earn more on your cash, get advice on how to manage your savings, and automate your investments at a low cost.

Grow your cash faster
Open a Wealthfront Cash Account right in the app and earn more than 19x the national average interest according to FDIC.gov*. Your cash is covered by FDIC Insurance up to $1 million through our partner banks so you can feel confident that your money is safe. No fees, zero market risk, and unlimited free transfers. 

Free financial guidance tailored to you
After linking your financial accounts, find out if you’re on track. We’ll give you insights into how early you can retire or in what neighborhood you can buy a home. Plan for both your short and long-term goals, and we’ll give you guidance on how to make it all happen.

Invest while keeping fees & taxes low
Through our software-only approach, we invest your money in a globally diversified portfolio of low-cost index funds, and our tax-loss harvesting strategies help lower the taxes you pay.

Borrow quickly & easily with a Portfolio Line of Credit
Portfolio Line of Credit is the fast, easy and convenient way to access cash. No application, no credit check, and you get the cash you need without selling investments and disrupting your strategy.

*Source: FDIC.gov as of January 13, 2020. National rates are calculated based on a simple average of rates paid (uses annual percentage yield) by all insured depository institutions and branches for which data are available. Savings and interest checking account rates are based on the $2,500 product tier.

The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) for the Cash Account may change at any time. Wealthfront Brokerage conveys Cash Account funds to depository institutions that accept and maintain such deposits. The cash balance in the Cash Account is swept to one or more banks (the “Program Banks”) where it earns a variable rate of interest and is eligible for FDIC insurance. FDIC insurance is not provided until the funds arrive at the Program Banks. While funds are at Wealthfront, before they are swept to the program banks, they are subject to SIPC’s protection limit of $250,000 for cash. FDIC insurance coverage is limited to $250,000 per qualified customer account per banking institution. Wealthfront Brokerage uses more than one Program Bank to ensure FDIC coverage of up to $1 million for your cash deposits. For more information on FDIC insurance coverage, please visit www.FDIC.gov. Customers are responsible for monitoring their total assets at each of the Program Banks to determine the extent of available FDIC insurance coverage in accordance with FDIC rules. The deposits at Program Banks are not covered by SIPC.

Portfolio Line of Credit is a margin lending product offered exclusively to clients of Wealthfront Advisers by Wealthfront Brokerage LLC. You should consider the risks and benefits specific to margin when evaluating your options. Learn more about these risks in the Margin Handbook (www.wealthfront.com/static/documents/wbc/margin_handbook.pdf)

Investment management and advisory services are provided by Wealthfront Advisers LLC (“Wealthfront Advisers”), an SEC registered investment adviser, and financial planning tools are provided by Wealthfront Software LLC (“Wealthfront”). All investing involves risk, including the possible loss of money you invest, and past performance does not guarantee future performance. Nothing in this communication should be construed as an offer, recommendation, or solicitation to buy or sell any security or a financial product. Please see www.wealthfront.com/legal/disclosure for important details. 

Wealthfront, Wealthfront Advisers and Wealthfront Brokerage are wholly owned subsidiaries of Wealthfront Corporation.

© 2020 Wealthfront Corporation. All rights reserved.

FDIC insurance coverage is limited to $250,000 per qualified customer account per banking institution. Wealthfront Brokerage uses more than one Program Bank to ensure FDIC coverage of up to $1 million for your cash deposits. For more information on FDIC insurance coverage, please visit www.FDIC.gov. Customers are responsible for monitoring their total assets at each of the Program Banks to determine the extent of available FDIC insurance coverage in accordance with FDIC rules. The deposits at Program Banks are not covered by SIPC.

Portfolio Line of Credit is a margin lending product offered exclusively to clients of Wealthfront Advisers by Wealthfront Brokerage LLC. You should consider the risks and benefits specific to margin when evaluating your options. Learn more about these risks in the Margin Handbook (www.wealthfront.com/static/documents/wbc/margin_handbook.pdf)

Investment management and advisory services are provided by Wealthfront Advisers LLC (“Wealthfront Advisers”), an SEC registered investment adviser, and financial planning tools are provided by Wealthfront Software LLC (“Wealthfront”). All investing involves risk, including the possible loss of money you invest, and past performance does not guarantee future performance. Nothing in this communication should be construed as an offer, recommendation, or solicitation to buy or sell any security or a financial product. Please see www.wealthfront.com/legal/disclosure for important details.

Wealthfront, Wealthfront Advisers and Wealthfront Brokerage are wholly owned subsidiaries of Wealthfront Corporation.

© 2020 Wealthfront Corporation. All rights reserved.
summary: Wealthfront - High-Interest Cash & Investing
recentChanges:
v4.0.427
Login redesign and forgot password page

Previously:
- Added native joint account for investment and cash opening
- Added support for face unlock
- Roth Conversion with existing traditional ira account
- Open additional Taxable/IRA accounts on mobile app
- Account transfer: transfer an investment account
- Lock app with pin or fingerprint
- Borrow with Portfolio Line of Credit
- Shake to Share
- Invite friends to get money managed for free
comments: The app works as well as the website for Wealthfront. My problem is with the company. I changed banks and then got into a situation where I needed money out of my account. If you transfer any money out to any account you didn't initially fund a Wealthfront account with then the transfer must be reviewed by a team to determine if it is okay. I've even used the new account to transfer money in. They'll keep my money as long as they want.

The app takes a while to get used too and you kind of have to play around with it a little bit. The linking portion is a bit slow and shows the wrong numbers sometimes. Over all the cash account really is the reason I use wealthfront and that is easy enough! So, if you're looking for some decent interest or tracking your financials it's pretty good.

Very good app. Easy to use. Easy to get all of your accounts linked. Problems so far: 1) When I first signed up and invested into my account, they gave me an option for monthly payments then showed me what the projected account balance would be in 46 years. I clicked not now, and now it gives me the option to deposit but I dont get thay useful projected account balance bar anymore. 2) I have an HSA, the bank they use is Optum. You guys have an optum (Eflex?). Its not the right bank that I have.

This app I been using for almost a year and I am pleased to say it's a easy way to have control of your money. I would love to have the option to have fractions buying and an individual investment account that I can add my self. But I love the simplicity of the app.

Excellent planning tool (free to anybody), easy fund transfers, several investment choices, fantastic email customer service, Burton Malkiel is the CIO, app is intuitive, low cost. Not much to dislike.

title: Bills Reminder, Budget & Expense Manager App
description:
Simple & Secure Money Manager App

Never miss bills and due dates with Free TimelyBills App, which helps you pay your bills on time, and avoid paying extra money towards late payment fee, Use TimelyBills App to track your income & expenses, and save more.  

TimelyBills App is completely secure with bank-grade two level data security.


FIVE AMAZING FEATURES:

➢  Manage your Bills and never pay late fee again.
➢  Manage your Income & Expenses and save more.
➢  Manage your Budget and receive alerts for over spending.
➢  Useful reports to give you actual view of your money & spending  📊📈.
➢  Generate Excel or PDF based statement/reports.
➢  Sync data across all your devices Android, iPhone and Computer.


MORE FEATURES
➢ Automatic reminders for Upcoming and Overdue bills.
➢ Bills calendar widget for home screen to show bills for current week.
➢ Monthly view of your spending trends.
➢ Category wise spending trends to see how you spend over a period.
➢ Consolidated expense report for month and yearly basis.
➢ Attach bill receipts with expenses for future reference.
➢ Two step data security using a password and security PIN.
➢ Support for worldwide currencies.


For more details visit us
 https://timelybills.app/ 


App requires following permissions for best user experience:

SHOW NOTIFICATIONS
→ Required to show bill reminders and over spending alerts.
WRITE/READ STORAGE (USB or EXTERNAL)
→ Required for local backup/restore of app data.
INTERNET ACCESS
→ Required for online bill payment feature.
START AT BOOT
→ Required to configure and display app notifications.

comments: This app is very simple and very well put together. However, I am giving one star due to the fact that when observing your annual savings chart, the app only factors in expenses (non-recurring) and not bills (recurring). This is a big problem due to the fact that a vast portion of everyones monthly expenses stems from bills. If this feature could be implemented, I would gladly return and give this 5 stars.

I typically don't review apps however I found this one especially helpful. It has a good ui/ux and most of the functionality that is needed to quickly track and log expenses. I gave it 4 stars not bc a lack of quality but because I think that it could use abit of tweaking on the yearly/monthly savings overview. It would be nice if it showed a monthly breakdown of expected savings based on the bills/expenses that are recurring minus the recurring income. Other then that, timelybills is fantastic.

Great app, really easy to use and track your expenses. Only downside is it only seems to summarise and report on a calender month. If you are paid any other way than on the last day of the month, the great charts are not much use. If you could set a start and end date for the period you wish to track, I would give this five stars and pay for the upgrade to ignore ads.

I am about 80-90% satisfied with this app. It is the only one I was able to find that does NOT connect to any of my bank or credit card accounts. I am just NOT ready for any apps to have direct contact to any of my personal business as there are a lot of them that does. I rather enter any information manually. The only other thing I would like to see with this app is the ability to see my running balance as to how much I have left to spend on the home screen. This is very important to me!

Very nice and neat app, love it! Paid for the ads-free version on third day of use , totally worth it. Potential enhancements: finger print or facial login, allow to backup at google cloud, after upgrade to ads free version show more features on dashboard, like budget and settings, since there is more screen real estate, also after ads free upgrade push some useful articles on dashboard, such as good money habit.. Bug: top right 3 dots -> settings -> any option -> go back, it goes to main dash

title: Security Finance℠
description:
*New Update - Version 4.2.1*
We discovered an issue with certain Android devices and worked to resolve it as quickly as possible. Please update to 4.2.1 and your issues should be resolved.  

Make account management easier than ever with the Security Finance℠  Mobile App. Easily make a secure payment, check your next due date, call your local branch, and so much more — all right within the app! Plus, receive notification reminders so that you never have to worry about making a late payment.

The Security Finance℠  Mobile App makes it easy to:
•	Make payments
•	Receive notification reminders
•	Check your next payment amount & due date
•	Verify your loan balance
•	View your last payment & amount
•	Find a branch near you
•	Call to renew your loan
•	Contact your local branch easily

Security Finance is here to provide fast financial solutions when you need them most — even if that means making a payment when you’re on the go.

In fact, for more than 60 years, Security Finance has proudly provided easy and safe installment loans to our fellow community members. Thanks to our conveniently located branches, you are able to receive personal service from people you know you can trust. And now, you can get the account information you need and make fast, secure payments — all right at your fingertips.

If you are not currently a customer with Security Finance, you can log in as a guest and see store locations, contact information and more. Once you have opened a loan account, you will be able to enjoy the app’s full functionality.

Security Finance is licensed to offer traditional installment loans, which vary in amounts, terms, and available ancillary products based on the states of operation.

Any account activity processed on a given day will not be reflected until the next business day.

All Rights Reserved 2019

Privacy Policy, Privacy Notice, and Security Finance℠  Mobile App Terms of Use are available at www.securityfinance.com.

Security Finance is affiliated with the following Brands: A & A Finance, Bond Finance, Canyon Finance, Continental Credit, Continental Loans, Friendly Finance, Hometown Finance, Maverick Finance, Merit Finance, Money Tree, Sunbelt Credit, Time Finance and Zia Finance.

recentChanges:
Improved login process.
Technical enhancements.
Bug fixes.
comments: Crappy. It will not let me log back in since I got a new phone and that's how I make my payments is the app. Yall needs to fix the bugs in your app...... its annoying that I can just pay my loan really fast without calling..
Worked great in the beginning. Recent update broke the app it seems. If fixed would be 5 stars. It's a shame too... The app made payments so convenient.

Updated the app but it won't log in. Keeps saying all info is wrong. I also tried changing password. It will not accept phone number. I know i need to change it but thats the number I signed up with. I have been trying to make my payment for 2 weeks now. Haven't answered when they called because of needeing to change number. Email I signed up with wont work neither. That has not changed.

I had this app before and it worked perfectly and now that I have it back it does not want to work I fill out all the information it needs and every time I try to put in a password is telling me that I have an error and I have all the right stuff for it is there anyway you can fix the app or upgrade a app so that way people can do what they need to do

The first day I got it it worked but now it won't even open; it just keeps crashing. I've tried uninstalling and downloading it again but still doesn't work. Update. It's not letting me log in no matter how many times I change my password

title: Money Lover: Money Manager, Budget Expense Tracker
description:
★ Best of 2017 Android App
★ Google Top Developer
★ Editors' Choice App since 2016

Money Lover was developed by a group of millennials to first solve their personal finance issues. After earning and spending almost all of our first salaries, we realized that there needed to be a convenient tool to see where our money was going and how we can spend it better.

Thus Money Lover was born - made by young professionals and for young professionals.

KEY FEATURES

✔ Money Manager: Track expenses and incomes by categories (food, fuel, etc.).
✔ Budget Planner: Set a limit on how much to spend in a category; get alerted when close to limit. 
✔ Goal Wallet: Set a saving goal; automatically update your balances as you progress towards your goal
✔ Reporting: Financial reports give you overview of your spending, income by date or group. 
✔ Linked Wallet: Connect with bank accounts and get automatic bank feed. Security: Data encrypted by RSA-1024 bit; support PIN code & Fingerprint to unlock. 
✔ Credit Wallet: Manage credit cards and get reminded when repayments are due

Note: We support 17 countries. Please go to Connect to bank and check the availability.


With Premium account, you have:

✔ Unlimited number of budgets, savings, wallets, events. 
✔ Export to CSV, Excel 
✔ Picture attachment
✔ Ad-free

--
Clarification for Access Permissions:
- Network Communication (Internet Access) is for syncing data and getting money exchange rate. 
- Social Information (Read Contact) is for suggesting “With Who” to tag your people in your contact list.
- Your Location is for identifying your location of the transaction.
- Storage (modify or delete contents on your USB storage) is for creating and storing backup data to the USB storage.

recentChanges:
In this version, we fixed bugs that result from software acting up.
If you need any support, please email to contact@moneylover.me, we're always ready to support!
comments: It's great app that has all of functions that I want. I'm happy with it and have been using it for a couple of years. But there're some bugs along the way of usage. Eg. App delayed synchronizing with my bank account and eventually stopped synchronzing, sometimes when I tried to edit my wallets the app pulled me back to the previous menu. And there's one time weired incident which is the most frustrating one is all of my records had gone away which I'm not sure whether I did something wrong.

I don't know what the issue is, I can sign in but the first sync always failed. 'unfortunately, we are unable to fully download your data. please try again later.' Need to several trial of sign in to success. Then after minutes using it suddenly I signed out and need to sign in again. And the issue repeat. I plan to try this app because there's interesting feature such as web sync. But I think I'll stick with my app that I havd been using for now because of this issue

Better than others.... Debt manager is one unique feature.... But, one DRAWBACK is when I add transaction as transfer from x acc y acc, tha transfered amount is considered as EXPENSE in x acc... And due to which it shows monthly expense higher by including all transfer amount... In case this will be fixed, then this is the best app to track daily, monthly expenses.... Because of that one drawback I left this app.

I paid for a premium user. Now I have problem with App synchronisation. Most data recorded was mixed up and all of the sudden it it was all gone. Okay, I decide to adjust the balance again to start over again but.....again the App start synchronizing again. Can you please fix this problem. It's so annoying! I have paid for this.

From a premium users view: For the amount you pay the app looks outdated, No materialistic design, Not enough icons to choose from, No dark mode, Looks dull. Important features that's missing: * When expenses is added to 'A' wallet & later u want to move it to 'B' wallet that not possible. * Credit cards are considered completely separate from the main wallet. This should not be it because at the end of the day. Credit card bill is payed from the main wallet. With correction it's a 5* app

title: Honeydue: Budget, Bills & Money for Couples
description:
Honeydue is the best personal finance app for couples. Track your bills, bank balances and spending together, and engage in meaningful dialogue about your goals and habits.

EXCITING NEWS
• Introducing Joint Banking, a modern bank account designed for modern couples. Each of you and your partner gets your own account number and debit card on top of a shared balance. Track your budget in real time and get on the same page. Reserve your cards today.

WHY HONEYDUE?
• Choose how much you share with your partner.
• See all of your bank account balances in one place, neatly organized.
• Set monthly household spending limits on each category, and get notified when you and your partner are nearing it.
• Add your own custom categories
• Get reminded you when it's time to pay your bills.
• Send a thumbs up to encourage your partner's spending habits, or choose from 6 other emojis
• Ask your partner if that mysterious purchase was theirs
• Divvy up expenses, and square up balances with your partner when the time is right
• Automatic categorization of all your spending
• Support for over 10,000+ banks (US, Canada, UK, Spain & France)
• Bank level security for your peace of mind: 
Your data is encrypted in storage and in transit.
• SSL/TLS, passcode & TouchID, and multi-factor authentication.
• See the big picture and argue less about the little things
• Free up your time from financial chores and go enjoy your day!
• It's FREE!

Any questions or feedback? Reach out to us at
support@honeydue.com

Thanks for using Honeydue :)

comments: Almost perfect. One missing feature that would bring it to 5 stars would be the ability to have recurring bills auto deduct or at least have scheduled bills deduct when the calendar reminds you, after confirming the amount of course. Love having the ability to share this appp with my wife so we both always know what's in the account.

This is the first app my husband and I have LOVED while budgeting together. It offers the perfect amount of information, notifies us of bills, and tracks our individual card changes. My only critique is that we're unable to adjust the way the calendar counts a "week" currently it's Sunday to Saturday, however, and option to start our week on payday would make or budgeting more simple.

great to stay organize and budget with your partner! this is the only budget app that really works with my partner and I. I have tried other budgeting apps for couples and it just doesn't seem to work as great as this one. I find myself keep coming back to this one!

There is no search option when looking for paid bills I can see after a year or so that I would want to see what I paid for a bill to compare. Shoukd have a search box to find the bill. Also I should be able to interact with the bill calendar by tapping on a date to see what's due.

At first it accepted all banks but one. Then after a few weeks I would have to reauthorize the accounts. If you have a bank account that makes you enter a security question when you log into the bank, it won't sync with Honeydue, from my experience. And now it won't ever log into the one I need to see the most...

title: Discover Mobile
description:
Discover card app is ranked highest in Customer Satisfaction by J.D Power among Mobile Credit Card Apps and Credit Card Websites and is #1 in:
 - Navigation
 - Availability of Key Information
 - Range of Services
 - Clarity of Information 

You can manage your Discover credit card and bank accounts conveniently and securely from anywhere, using Discover’s Mobile App. Check your account balance, view your account info, make and edit payments, manage your rewards, and more - all from your mobile device.

FAST ACCOUNT ACCESS
• Log in quickly with a 4-digit Passcode
• Enable Quick View to view account information without logging in 

MANAGE YOUR DISCOVER CREDIT CARD ACCOUNT
• Check your balance and available credit, and view or download monthly statements
• View and search transaction activity
• Make payments and edit or cancel pending payments
• Redeem rewards for statement credit or direct deposit in  any amount
• Redeem rewards for Partner gift cards and eCertificates starting at $20 Cashback Bonus
• View your FICO® Credit Score* for free and learn what it means to lenders
*See FICO® Credit Score terms at Discover.com/FICO
• Freeze or unfreeze your account to prevent new purchases, cash advances, and balance transfers 
• Send and receive messages with Discover Customer Service 
• View and edit your account profile 
• Activate a new card or report a current card as lost, stolen or misplaced
• Use the Travel Notification feature to help ensure uninterrupted use of your card while traveling
• Sign up to receive alerts about your account

MANAGE YOUR DISCOVER BANK DEPOSIT ACCOUNT AND PERSONAL LOAN ACCOUNT

• Transfer money

• Find ATMs - Nationwide ATMs available to use your Discover debit card

recentChanges: - Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: The app is easy to navigate. I love the products they offer and their customer service, but the app is down to do routine maintenance more often than I'd like, leaving you to have to call in. I also don't like how long it can take for pending transactions to be posted. App can be a tad bit slow when navigating from screen to screen, but generally straightforward and easy to understand. Love it 9/10 times.

I love everything about Discover. This app is really user friendly and makes it easy to do pretty much anything you might need to do. Additionally, Discover is, by far, my favorite credit card. Their customer service is unrivaled. And they have a savings account available to cardholders with an exceptionally good interest rate -- I think it's around 1.7% compared to the 0.36% offered by BofA. I don't have a single complaint about any of the services Discover has to offer.

'Our services are temporarily unavailable' probably 3 out of 4 times I try to pay a bill or do anything else on this app. Can't set up my fingerprint login either for the same reason. If I have to set a reminder or calendar event for when I MIGHT be home in order to drag out my laptop to use the website through there.... then this company is not worth doing business with. Chase card .... here I come.

Easy to use, with all information you may need in menus that are easy to find and pretty intuitive. Never had it crash. Never had issues with security. Virtual assistants are very helpful to answer general questions pretty much immediately. No complaints with this app or my experience with the company. Very appreciative customer 😊

It was working fine and then there are errors. I waited for the error to be fixed but it still doesn't take my payments and I couldn't message help on the app. And I am currently abroad now. Also, I changed my password twice and I still cant login to get in my credit card account like I normally did before;I have to reset and reverify over.. If this not get fixed, I may have to consider canceling Discover.

title: Spendee - Budget and Expense Tracker & Planner
description:
Thanks to Spendee you will be able to track your money (both expense and income) automatically through bank sync 💳 or manually so that you can analyze 📊, organize and budget 💰 them for the future. DOWNLOAD NOW

Invite others to manage your shared family or household budgets. Manage your money in multiple currencies and across multiple bank accounts.   

 
 THE MOST FAVORITE FEATURES OF SPENDEE

1/ All your money in one place 

💳 Connect securely your bank accounts so that all your incomes and expenses are added 
     and categorize automatically. Save time on what is really important.
👆   Add your cash expenses manually in only 7 seconds
📊 Easily track where all your money goes at the end of the month
📅 Ultimate bill tracker, never forget to pay for gas, water, loan etc.

 2/ Save money by sticking to your budgets 

💰 Adding budget goal is quick and easy, as well as adding your spending & savings
💸 Create budget for every category or have one overall budget

 3/ Track money during special event such as traveling or wedding planning 

💱 Multiple currencies, making it perfect for traveling or vacations

 4/ Manage your finances with unlimited number of people 

 👫  Create shared wallets with your friends and family
🏡 Comprehensive household budget planner & manager

 WHO IS SPENDEE FOR 

It's for everyone! It's great household budget planner for the family to control income and expenses. Also It's useful spending and savings tracker for students and adults. This money manager app will save you money and prepare your finances for the future!

DOWNLOAD OUR BUDGETING APP TODAY AND HAVE YOUR INCOME & EXPENSES UNDER CONTROL WITH A FINANCE MANAGER.

Best of all, the more you use Spendee, the more valuable it gets, by rewarding you with attractive charts that show you where your money is going and how your costs are matching up with your income. Sync your bank account with Spendee and start track your savings today.

Spendee really makes managing personal finances as easy as possible!
Download now!
 
Follow us on https://facebook.com/spendeeapp and https://twitter.com/spendeeapp
Email us at hello@spendee.com

summary: Get your money under control with easy-to-use finance manager in your pocket.
developerAddress: Namesti I.P. Pavlova 5, 120 00, Prague, Czech Republic
recentChanges: Bug fixes and minor improvements.
comments: I have been using the app for a few days now. Quite interesting the way the report of my spending and savings is showed. I do like the app so far, however, there's one big mistake in my opinion. What is the purpose of the password/finger lock option if when I go to the manage apps screen I can still see some personal information (as if I were on the main screen before switching apps for example)? I wish the screen was blank on the app manager screen just like Google Chrome do when you're using incognito windows. If the developers could add this to the next update would be great :)

Love using this app. It it very user friendly and you can categorize everything to your liking. I chose to pay extra for the "Plus" plan which allows more budgets... I like that I can have multiple budgets for different things like bills, vehicle, groceries etc. The notifications it gives me when im getting close to my budget or went over budget helps me keep on track. Wish there was a way to set up something other than a wallet for a credit card for example.

I have started my free trial but have yet to be able to connect to my bank to even give this app a try. Everytime I try it gives me a screen after my password that says "please select the contact information you want to use to log in". Then a line, like I'm supposed to know what that is. I've tried entering "text, "mobile" my phone #, " "cell". Until I try a few times & it wont even let me connect again. I'd like to try it but cant even get past the 1st part

Overall - nice but very buggy. I am using Spendee Plus plan and at some point it stopped synchronizing shared wallets. Every new transaction or edit causes an uninformative error message to pop up. Tapping on "Contact customer support" offers you to send a message to one of your contacts via any available messenger, the message is "Need your help". Seems like the users are supposed to help themselves...

Tried Premium, but it wouldn't reconnect to my bank account with Halifax after the first day of setting up the app. I tried contacting technical support but never got a reply, only loads of spam emails. Can't understand how this is a paid subscription when the app doesn't work and there is no attempt to fix the connection issues. Edit- thanks for the quick response, I sent the email through the help button on your Web app. I also filled in a form sent to me by email about bank connection issues

title: E*TRADE: Invest. Trade. Save.
description:
Welcome to E*TRADE. No matter your level of experience, we help simplify investing and trading. With our mobile experience, you have everything you need in the palm of your hand—including investing, banking, trading, research, and more. It’s all here on our award-winning app. Download now to get started!

INVEST WITH CONFIDENCE
• Enjoy commission-free online stock, ETF, and options trades
• Trade mutual funds
• Get help from real people whenever you need it  

SEIZE OPPORTUNITIES
• Get streaming quotes, charts, and portfolio information
• Set alerts and create watchlists for the investments you’re interested in 
• Use comprehensive research, tools, and screeners to spot opportunities

BANK AND SAVE
• Deposit checks, pay bills, transfer money, + more
• Get unlimited ATM fee refunds with your E*TRADE debit card
• Get rates 15x the national average from E*TRADE Bank Premium Savings Account

STAY IN THE KNOW
• Breaking news, independent research, and live Bloomberg video
• Chat with customer service in the app
• Access education to help you along the way

FEEL SAFE AND SECURE
• Fraud protection—you're not liable for unauthorized use of your account

DISCLOSURES 
Investing in securities products involves risk, including possible loss of principal. 

Read more about the awards E*TRADE received in Stockbrokers.com 2018 Online Broker Review at https://etradefinancialcorporation.gcs-web.com/.

With Max-Rate Checking, E*TRADE Bank will not charge you a fee for withdrawing funds from any institution's ATM nationwide but the owner/operator of the ATM may. These fees will automatically be credited to your account. E*TRADE Bank does impose a charge equal to 1% of the transaction amount (including credits and reversals) for non-U.S. currency transactions. In the event E*TRADE Bank in its sole discretion determines that there has been either fraudulent or excessive use of the feature on a given account, E*TRADE Bank reserves the right to remove this feature and not refund the ATM fees. For additional information and important details about how the ATM fee refund will be applied, please visit www.etrade.com/atmrefundpolicy.

National average for savings annual percentage yield (APY) courtesy of Bankrate.com, as of 10/3/18.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions. 

The E*TRADE Financial family of companies provides financial services including trading, investing and banking products and services to retail customers. 

Securities products and services offered by E*TRADE Securities LLC, Member FINRA/SIPC, are not insured by the FDIC, are not guaranteed deposits or obligations of E*TRADE Bank, and are subject to investment risk, including the possible loss of the principal invested. 

Banking products and services are offered by E*TRADE Bank, a federal savings bank, Member FDIC, or its subsidiaries. 

E*TRADE Securities LLC and E*TRADE Bank are separate but affiliated companies. 

View End-User License Agreement: https://mobile.etrade.com/etmobile/EULA_2.0.html

System response and account access times may vary due to a variety of factors, including trading volumes, market conditions, system performance, and other factors.

© 2018 E*TRADE Financial Corporation. All rights reserved.

summary: Connect to the markets from anywhere with our award-winning app.
recentChanges:
Thanks for choosing E*TRADE! We update our app regularly to improve your mobile experience.
In this release, we’ve fixed some bugs and made minor improvements.
comments: Lot of issues with this app lately. Extended hours does not update properly, either shows 0.00 or last closing price. Loading charts is equally as iffy. Etrade needs to fix this app, it used to work fine. Too many technical issues now that can cost you in trading. This is on the latest version 7.9.

Lags horribly. Very unresponsive, it's cost us a good bit of money at times. TD app and platform was much better. Crashes often, specifically when you go to sell and try to delete the number if shares.

This app is beyond broken. It crashes every time you open the "Help" menu, it takes almost two weeks for money to transfer from yoyr bank account to the trading account, what money you do transfer over will randomly disappear, and the layout of the app itself is beyond inept, which requires needing to use the "Help" menu, thus causing the cycle of frustration to begin anew. Nothing makes sense, and if you are a first-time investor like myself I would absolutely NOT recommend. 0/10

App worked great when I could actually log in. Problem is that I have to enter my VIP token, a separate app, and when I switch back from the VIP app, my user name and password disappear. So no copying and pasting. And since the token expires after 30 seconds (vs 60 like every other token) , there is not enough time for me to reenter the information before it expires. Hence the app is now quite useless.

Nothing but problems right now!!! Everytime I launch the App I get an error message that states none of my data loaded. I cannot see any of my account, can do nothing! Obviously other users are having the same issue. I cannot understand how a major financial company like E*Trade cannot keep there app running. Super frustrating!

title: PocketGuard: Personal Finance, Money & Budget
description:
PocketGuard is one of the leading, easiest to use personal finance apps in the US and Canada. This handy tool can finally make money management and budgeting trouble-free. Paying bills, managing multiple accounts, staying on top of your spending habits — all of this is now available in one place.

Money management in one place
● Manage your bank accounts, credit and debit cards in one place — even if you are using different banks
● Sync your loans, savings, and investment data — get an actual, transparent picture of your finances 
● Connect all of your financial accounts in one place and see what’s really going on with your money 

Spending tracker with a clear picture of your finances
● Track your income and expenses 
● See exactly how much is in your pocket
● Compare your spending habits month by month 
● Create spending limits and get timely notifications when the balance is low
● Establish saving goals and reach them with the spending tracker
● Stay on top of your spending habits — see exactly how much money is spent and where exactly it goes

Lower your bills
Certain you’re getting the best deal with all of your monthly payments? Cut your regular bills for Comcast, AT&T and many other providers by up to 25% without leaving the app.

Timely notifications and alerts
● Receive timely reminders about credit card bills and loan payments
● Get alerted when a bank fee or any unwanted charge hits your account

Security and data protection
● 256-bit SSL encoding protects all of your sensitive data 
● Additional 4-digit PIN ensures no one can access your financial data if the phone is lost or stolen 
● Read-only connection with your bank makes it impossible for anyone (you included) to move money from your bank account via PocketGuard; for all of the bank transactions, you will have to use a dedicated online banking app

Simplicity and intuitive navigation
Despite its vast functionality, PocketGuard is simple and user-friendly! Visual, intuitive navigation makes personal finance management a walk in the park! 

Share your feedback to make the app even better!
PocketGuard is an app designed to help people easily manage their finances. So, no one but you can help make the app even better. If you have any questions, or simply want to suggest a new feature — drop a line at hello@pocketguard.com — make no mistake, our developers will listen!

summary: Stay on top of your money, budget and bills from one secure personal finance app
developerAddress:
1906 EL CAMINO REAL
SUITE 201
MENLO PARK, CA 94027
recentChanges:
New charts in the category details show you how your spending has changed over time. The category details also incorporate "Spending limits" to let you adjust your spending plan right from the "Insights".

We've also revamped the "Bills" and the "Income" sections to make everything cleaner and easier to navigate.
comments: I use this app to track categorized spending. In that way it's really good at keeping me within limits. The 'In Your Pocket' feature is helpful. Not very intuitive to find previous months spending but not hard either Edit: after months of more use its done quite poorly and is glitchy at pulling in transactions. The support team was consistent and friendly in following up but really did nothing to fix the issue. The features make it a potential 5 star app but they have a lot to fix first

Good for a baseline idea but not easy to keep going. Does not do well with consistent synchronization of income which constantly gives alerts as if ur not paid changing overview report into giving you bad data. Most likely will cancel my premium subscription if this cannot be resolved. Otherwise its pointless to keep using app.

Easy to setup and shows me what I need to see: After bills, how much I can spend that month. I've tried every other budget tool and they are complicated and time consuming to manage. This one is really easy to setup and use and so far I'm loving it.

The ideas behind the app are sound and the simplicity is really nice, but upgrading adds little to no additional features. It took several months to not require manually reconnecting banking information, there was a bug that caused some duplication of transactions (that has yet to be cleaned up) and generally a lack of some basic features make this app little better than a spreadsheet. The main reason I am deleting is due to the horriblely non responsive customer service.

So far, I'm loving this app. I've downloaded and deleted at least 4 other budget apps. All I wanted was a simple, organized look at my bills and spending habits. Every other app complicated the process, so it took me hours just to link my accounts and set up my profile, only to find irreconcilable issues and being at square one again. I haven't had those problems, this app is easy and straightforward, takes you step-by-step through the process so you understand each function.

title: EasyBudget
description:
Let’s face it: Most budget apps are too complicated and their design looks like it come straight from... 1994. If you are looking for a clean and easy-to-use app to manage your money then here's the good news: With EasyBudget you just found what you need!

A list of what EasyBudget does NOT do:

• Manage multiple accounts: 1 account is all you need (and probably all you got)
• Classify expenses into categories: Ain't nobody got time for that!
• Show charts and statistics: What for? Check your balance in 1 second and go on with your life!

This app is simple, seriously simple. Exactly what you expect your budget management to be. Oh and.. It's free!
