recentChanges:
• Credit Karma Tax® - Filing your state and federal tax return is 100% free from start to finish. Enjoy a streamlined, personalized filing process with Smart File and 24/7 live product support. Ready to say hooray for tax season?
• This update also fixes bugs and improves performance.
comments: Fast friendly accurate!!! I just wanted to try Credit Karma to check my credit score, now I get updates, notified when my score goes up or down. I had to dispute something on my credit information and the site is so easy to follow and again they keep you up to date with it. If theres a problem with the app you can call them. Again, Fast, Friendly, Free, Accurate and Dependable

Credit Karma is great! I've never had any issues with them. The app is great! They truly monitor my credit and notify me if needed. Filing my taxes is totally free! Upon filing my taxes I made an honest mistake. Credit Karma immediately sent me an email letting me know that it was rejected by the IRS and the reason why. I was able to fix it right away and resent my taxes. Then I was notified by email from Credit Karma that my tax filing was accepted by the IRS. I'm totally pleased!

Really helpful, tells you what cards you're more likely to get approved for when trying to build your credit so you don't get hit with lowering your credit for not getting approved. Tells you pretty easy step by step on how to build your credit the fastest. Really good at keeping you informed on what's going on with your credit. Give you day by day notifications on new loans and cards you can qualify.

I love how straight forward all the information is and how easy it is to use the app to monitor my credit score. I also love the additional features like the debt tracking (credit card, personal, auto, and car loans) and the suggested actions to improve my scores. And the best part: it's all for free!

Credit Karma is an AWESOME tool to help you get your credit back on track, or even to get great advice on loan or credit cards that would be a good taylored fit especially for you. And you can count on them giving great advice, as well as being able to get your FREE credit score without jumping through hoops first. I'm so very thankful for their advice; never leading me down a wrong path or giving bad advice. They give you CHOICES for things that fit you best. Then it's up to you.

title: Acorns - Invest Spare Change
description:
Acorns is your guide to financial wellness. We’ll help you invest, save and spend responsibly for just $1, $2 or $3 per month. No surprise fees, just surprise upgrades. Join over 7 million investors and start investing your spare change for the future. Supported by leading investors, innovators and press like BlackRock, PayPal, Ashton Kutcher and CNBC.

CNBC recommends Acorns as a “simple, low-stress way to start investing.” (1)

Invest for your future
• Automatically invest your spare change from everyday purchases
• Learn how to get more from your money with easy-to-understand articles and videos from financial experts
• Add or withdraw your money whenever you need to
• Just answer a few simple questions to get your own investment portfolio built by experts and personalized to fit your goals

“Acorns takes saving to the next level by helping you automatically invest.” -Forbes(2)

Spend smarter
• The only checking account with a debit card that saves and invests for you
• No low-balance or overdraft fees and free or fee-reimbursed ATMs nationwide
• A sleek, tungsten metal debit card in signature Acorns green
• Earn up to 10% extra bonus investments from select local restaurants and businesses

“You think you need thousands of dollars to invest...not the case anymore because there’s an app called Acorns.” -Good Morning America(3)

Earn bonus investments with Found Money
• 350+ top brands that invest in you when you shop
• Earn even more from side gigs with Airbnb, Uber, Lyft and more

“Acorns is my favorite money app, because it makes it simple and cheap to make small investments.” -Business Insider(4)

Grow your knowledge
• Learn how to get more from your money with easy-to-understand articles and videos from financial experts

Security that’s strong as oak
• All your information is protected by bank level security, 256-bit encryption and never stored on your devices.
• Acorns Securities, LLC is a member of the Securities Investor Protection Corporation (SIPC). Your investments are protected up to $500,000.
• Acorns Spend is an FDIC-insured checking account all the way to $250,000, plus fraud protection and instant, all-digital card lock
• Continuous fraud monitoring

Acorns offers simple, subscription pricing at three tiers of $1, $2 or $3 per month until you have $1 million invested.

“With the help of Acorns, investing is now made for everyone.” -Forbes(5)

Sources
1. https://cnb.cx/2s4QPmf
2. https://bit.ly/2At32Gh
3. https://abcn.ws/2VoOX5y
4. https://read.bi/2VoP94M
5. https://bit.ly/2R2U9gX

Investing involves risk including loss of principal. Image is for illustrative purposes only and shows hypothetical account balance growth of an account and does not represent an actual or typical client experience.  For important disclosure regarding this graph, please carefully review the information found on the in-app 'potential' screen.

This app is operated by Acorns Advisers, LLC, an SEC Registered Investment Advisor. Brokerage services are provided to clients of Acorns by Acorns Securities, an SEC registered broker-dealer and member FINRA/SIPC. Investments are not FDIC insured and may lose value. Investing involves risk and investments may lose value, including the loss of principal. Please consider your objectives and Acorns fees before investing. Past performance does not guarantee future results. "Acorns", the Acorns logo and "Invest the Change" are registered trademarks of Acorns Grow Incorporated. Copyright © 2019 Acorns and/or its affiliates.

Information about FINRA is available at www.finra.org. Explanatory brochures about SIPC protection are available upon request or at www.sipc.org.

recentChanges: To help your 2020 get started right, we made some enhancements and fixed a few bugs, because we believe small change adds up. Happy New Year! Grow your oak!
comments: I use Acorns as my main checking account. Infinitely better than the bank I had before (Chase). I like that it immediately subtracts spent funds from your account so you don't end up in the negative when a transaction takes a while to go through. You can choose how aggressive you want your investment portfolio to be and how much you want your round ups to be. Anytime I've had to call them, they answer almost immediately and support is knowledgeable and helpful. I definitely recommend them.

The app is great I just can't login and it keeps asking me to verify my account when I already have . I keep getting a server error message telling me my info is safe but to wait a few minutes . I have been getting this message close to two weeks now and I still have not been able to login. I really need help please some contact me .

I like the whole idea of being in control of my retirement account at a young age and getting started learning how to make good decisions with my money 💵 👍 However the checking account has not been so easy to use. It's almost impossible to successfully change a funding source or to transfer any funds into the checking account. I've sent them numerous pictures of statements and even my debit cards but they refuse to accept them.

This app has terrible customer service and doesnt bother helping or emailing back! ive been trying for months and it takes forever for my debit cards to be verified. They also take 1$ subscription every month without letting you know! I want to uninstall this app but I cant do that with my money still in the account which they won't let me! Its a scam.THE PHONE NUMBER DOESN'T WORK. Update: This app is still terrible. I still haven't gotten my money. Thank you for taking my money.

excellent app. Love the time & energy spent on providing u with the education & advice u need 2 make what would be the right portfolio for yourself. Also, I like the found money aspect of it. Really enjoy the learning experiences that are actually taught in ways easy to understand, which, in turn, makes it easy to make the right moves & decisions. Making the right move & decisions are what is going 2 b the main thing involved in being able 2 make profit & have a great retirement ready for you.

title: Spending Tracker
description:
Spending Tracker is the easiest and most user friendly expense manager app in the store. The simple fact is, by tracking your spending you will be able to stick to a budget and therefore SAVE MONEY. So download it for free, enter your expenses and income, and have instant control over your spending!

★ Features ★ 
---------------
✔ Simple and intuitive user interface 
- helps you to easily manage your spending
- super fast expense entry

✔ Flexible Time Periods 
- choose to track Weekly, Monthly or Yearly 

✔ Budget Mode 
- optionally set a fixed budget amount to help you meet your spending targets 
- carry over any remaining budget to the next month or week 

✔ Summary View 
- overview of your current balance along with expense and income totals
- see your main areas of spending

✔ Log Expense and Income 
- repeat transactions daily, weekly or monthly
- export to CSV for use in a spreadsheet
- export to PDF for viewing and printing (Pro Upgrade required)

✔ Multiple Accounts
- create separate personal, business and savings accounts for example

✔ Reports 
- beautiful and interactive charts allow easy visualisation of where your money goes
- view spending grouped by category 
- see your history so you can track your progress

✔ Categories 
- editable expense and income categories 
- choose a quality icon for each category

✔ Syncing (Pro Upgrade required)
- automatically sync your data to other Android devices
- you can also sync to iOS and Windows versions of Spending Tracker, which will require a separate upgrade on these platforms

✔ Backups
- keep your data safe by backing up to Dropbox
- the auto backups feature will take care of it for you

✔ Widget
- put the widget on your home screen for easy access
- quick add buttons

✔ Local Tips
- optionally receive tips when you enter participating local venues (requires location and bluetooth permissions)
- this could include money saving offers

✔ Special design layout for tablets
- optimal use of larger screen size makes it even better for managing your money

developerAddress: Solo House The Courtyard, London Road, Horsham, RH12 1AT
recentChanges:
Version 2.3.1 of Spending Tracker
============================
* Startup performance improvement
* Spending can now be tracked on a 'Daily' basis
* Many new category icons have been added, and icons are now organised into groups
* Choose whether to show 'Outline' or 'Filled' icons under 'Settings -> Category Icon Style'
* Option to remove a category's icon (useful if using a colour 'emoji' in the category name instead)
comments: great way of tracking what you spend!!

LOVE this app, I paid for the full version within 24 hours as it's so useful, I love the way you can configure icons and categories exactly to what you use small things like cute little icons for each category keep me interested! I enjoy roll over budgets and detail each spend, it's helped me so much to arrest over spending as I put everything in instantly.

Easy to use and gets the job done. Which is good. However i don't like the idea of everything that happened in 2019 and before to become irrelevant because of their yearly/monthly filters. Would be nice if we can view "last 6 months" or last year. To include data from previous months. Also we can only filter one category at a time, which seems an easy fix. Would be nice if we can filter 2 or more categories for a comparison. Etc

Awesome so far. I'm finally getting all my finances in order. While it's amazing what you spend If you keep track it. So far very few ads and the app is running perfectly not a single hitch. So after one month I am deeply impressed. I never a take the time to read an app.. This time I am making an exception. Good job.

It does what it says - it helps me track my spending. Easy to use. Functionally useful. MS Money it is not but for day to day tracking and cash flow monitoring it fits my bill. Had a couple of queries early on but received prompt responses which sorted me out. Would recommend it.

title: Self - Build Credit While You Save
description:
The Self credit app (formerly known as Self Lender) is a way to build credit history while you save*. Build credit with Self, even if you have a low credit score (or no credit score!)

Over 500,000 people have used Self’s Credit Builder Account to build credit and save more than $300 million. With the Self Visa® Secured Credit Card, you have even more opportunities to build credit after you get started.

How does it work? Think of it as a plan that builds credit while you save, starting at $25** per month.

1. Apply for a Credit Builder Account. Your money is safe and secure in a bank account.***
2. Pay off your Credit Builder Account in 12-24 months.** You can choose the payment term and dollar amount that best fits your budget.
3. Each on-time monthly payment builds credit history and adds to your savings*. Your monthly payments are reported to all three credit bureaus while the principal gets saved in a bank account.***
4. Unlock your savings. Once you’ve paid off your Credit Builder Account, your money unlocks and comes back to you (minus fees and interest).

BUILD CREDIT. SAVE MONEY*
With an active Credit Builder Account, your payments are reported to all three credit bureaus.
 
CREDIT SCORE MONITORING INCLUDED****
With the Self credit app, you can check your credit score at no cost. The mobile credit tracker!
 
NO HARD CREDIT PULL
Self does not do a “hard pull” credit check when you create an account. In fact, no credit score is required at all!
 
SECURE ACCOUNTS
All accounts use two-factor authentication, 256-bit encryption, and fraud detection to protect your money and private information.
 
UNLOCK THE SELF VISA® SECURED CREDIT CARD
Have an active Credit Builder Account in good standing, make at least 3 credit builder account monthly payments in full and have $100 or more in savings progress and you could unlock access to a secured credit card – no extra deposit and no hard credit check needed.
 
WHY PEOPLE LOVE SELF
“Love love love this program and this app! In eight months my credit went up a hundred and nine points Super happy and can't wait to renew once the first year is up” - customer Debbie G. Individual results may vary.
 
Featured on ABC News, USA Today, Newsweek, TechCrunch and NerdWallet
 
TERMS
When you download and use Self, you agree to the Terms of Service at: https://www.self.inc/terms-of-service

PRIVACY POLICY
You may review Self’s privacy policy at: https://www.self.inc/privacy-policy
 
*Savings are minus fees and interest. Results are not guaranteed. Improvement in your credit score is dependent on your specific situation and financial behavior. Failure to make monthly minimum payments by the payment due date each month may result in delinquent payment reporting to credit bureaus which may negatively impact your credit score. This product will not remove negative credit history from your credit report.
 
**Sample products are $25 monthly loan payment at a $520 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 24 month term and 15.92% Annual Percentage Rate; $150 monthly loan payment at a $1663 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 12 month term and 15.91% Annual Percentage Rate. Please check the pricing page in the Self mobile app or www.self.inc for current pricing.
 
***Credit Builder Account — proceeds are held in a deposit account until maturity
 
****Credit scores will only be available to customers who our third-party vendor is able to validate.

All Credit Builder Accounts are issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender, Sunrise Banks, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender or Atlantic Capital Bank, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender. Subject to ID Verification. Individual borrowers must be a U.S. Citizen or permanent resident and at least 18 years old. Valid bank account and Social Security Number are required. All loans are subject to ID verification. All loans subject to approval.

The Self Visa® Credit Card is issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender.

recentChanges:
Thank you for using Self! This app update includes:
- Improved handling for unstable internet connections
comments: Awesome app. Definitely helps that stupid loophole of " to have good credit, you have to have credit already in order to build credit". This app and many others alike help young people like me get started on building credit out of nothing. Very happy with it. The credit card though, is there anyway to increase the credit without paying off the balance just yet? The whole point is keep paying over the year or two to build said credit, but a higher credit limit would be nice.

My score has gone up 90 points in the last 3-4 months with this. I love how simple it is and I've told so many people about it. I recommend this if you're looking for a low-cost payment to increase your credit. It's not so much about how much you pay, it's the history of on time payments that help. I chose to pay the lowest amount for 2 years, by the end I'll have 2 years of on time payments.

This is the most amazing app ever for anyone who needs to build/rebuild their credit. I had filled ch. 7 bankruptcy and been discharged about a year ago now. Needless to say, my credit was looking rough. Now, after 2 months of payments, credit is up 136 points! I don't know how it works, but it works and that's all I care about. Amazing service being provided here with equal opportunities for all.

Since I was already working on my credit prior to getting the CD (Dec 19) and CC (Feb 20) thru them, I can't say for sure which did what or anything at all but my credit has gone up at the minimum 50 points already! But the app is very useful and user friendly. Has an answer for pretty much everything I had a question regarding. I have the $150 12 month loan!

My credit went up a couple points after opening account. The thing that i do not like is the daily withdrawls that come out if my account. It is only pennies daily but after a year this will add up. I am sure it is some kind of interest or fees. I will finish off the term of the loan and will most likely be done with it but anything can happen. I have only had this account for two months. So a little early to tell

title: Turbo: Financial Score & Free Credit Report
description:
Turbo Key Features:
 
●	*New* Goals: Set your goals and get actionable advice to help you save, reduce your debt, and improve your credit score. 

●	*New* Streaks: See your credit & financial health progress over time. Keep track of the little things that can have a big impact.

●	Refund Tracker: See your TurboTax filing status and refund date estimate

●	Free Credit Score: Check your credit for free with Turbo. Learn your VantageScore credit score, directly pulled from TransUnion. Quickly see changes in your score, celebrate with Turbo when it increases, and monitor credit streaks as you achieve them. Checking your credit report won’t affect your scores.

●	Free Credit Report: Sign up and get a free credit check with the touch of a button; we’ll provide you with your credit report instantly. Turbo pulls together three important numbers to provide you with further insight into your financial health: verified income, credit score, and debt-to-income ratio. Examine your payment history, credit utilization, types of credit, derogatory marks, and more.

●	24/7 Credit Monitoring: Turbo can help you spot identity theft with 24/7 credit monitoring*. Access your free credit report instantly to determine what’s changed.

●	View Verified Income and Debt in One Place: Turbo is more than a credit score app. Import your taxes from TurboTax to see where you stand with your verified income, debt-to-income ratio, and credit score in a single account dashboard.

●	Let Smart Tools Do the Math for You: Get insights to help you reach your financial goals. You can see what you may qualify for today and what you might be able to afford in the future on different types of loans.

●	Totally Free: Turbo is completely free to use. We won’t upsell you or ask for any credit card info. Check your credit score for free, with just the click of a button.

●	We value your security: Turbo works hard to safeguard your information by encrypting all of your data stored in our systems.


Turbo is the financial tool you’ve been waiting for. With up-to-date data and expert knowledge, your credit report may be able to provide you important insights into your financial health. Run a free credit check with Turbo and discover your financial potential.

*Credit reporting provided by TransUnion. There are various types of credit scores, and lenders use a variety of scores to make lending decisions. The credit score provided by Turbo may not be the specific credit score used by your lender.

recentChanges: Track your TurboTax refund, set your financial goals, and get actionable advice to help you save, reduce your debt, and improve your credit score!
comments: Very disappointed in this app. And Turbo Tax in general. I have used this service for the last 5 years, but this year just seems to be nothing but problems. It's been 5 weeks and I'm still waiting for my state refund. I can't seem to even find anywhere to speak to soneone about it Very very frustrating.

I have been using turbo tax for about 4 years now. I love the easy steps and I especially love that I get consistent credit score updates. I am a huge fan that it shows me all the debt I have and organized methods for me to pay them off. Thank you for such an awesome app!!

I really like this app. Having this has helped me get my credit score up steadily and I'm saving better for a house. If you're looking to improve your financial situation then downloading this will be like having a personal financial coach pointing you in the right direction.

Turbo has organized my credit info for me very well. It answers the vital questions you may have about your credit score without you even asking, and always gives me timely updates! My credit score is up 33 pts in 1 month, and I know that thanks to Turbo!!

I have been using Turbo tax for several years now and it hasnt let me down. Im smart enough to do my own taxes but this app makes it easier and helps with any unexpected sircumstances. It makes it easier to post my taxes also. Through out the year it gives me updates and notificarions on all kinds of helpful tax and credit ideas.

title: Financisto - Personal Finance Tracker
description:
Open-source personal finance tracker.

- Multiple accounts, multiple currencies 
- Home currency and exchange rates
- Transfers with downloadable rates
- Scheduled & recurring transactions
- Split transactions
- Hierarchical categories with custom attributes
- Recurring budgets
- Projects and payees
- Filtering and reporting
- Cloud backup (Dropbox, Google Docs)
- Automatic daily backups
- QIF/CSV import/export

*WARNING*

Please DO BACKUP before upgrade!

Please DO NOT move Financisto to SD card if you're using the widget and/or scheduled transactions. 

*PERMISSIONS*

GET_ACCOUNTS/USE_CREDENTIALS - For backup on Google Drive

INTERNET - for downloading currency rates in multi-currency transfer; to do online backup to Dropbox and Google Docs;

CAMERA - to attach pictures to transactions.

*FAQ*

Q: Why currency XYZ is missing? 
A: You can add any currency manually. Go to Menu -> Entities -> Currencies -> [+]

Q: How to delete account/transaction/balance etc?
A: Long tap on an item in the list to bring up popup menu

Q: Shortcuts do not work on Home screen
A: Try to restart your phone, it helps with most of the launchers out there

1.8.2
[+] Release new features and bug-fixes from the open-source contributors.
[*] Option for payee/project/location selector.

comments: I was used this app long back. But now i forget my password or something happend in password. I try to recover, but there is no option for recover. It is a very useful app and user friendly. I tried with some another app still i am not satisfied. Please can you help me to solve this issue ? Thank you for your cooperation.

I've been using this for years and it's worked out great for me, until I upgraded to a Moto G7 with Pie. The widgets are taking up 2 vertical spaces instead of 1 (a 2x1 widget is taking 2x2 spaces) and I can't fit more icons around it. Please fix.

I've been using it for years. It made my revenue and expenses transparent. Simple look and great features. I like it except the new payee selector that debuted in version 1.8.2. I use this app among all day for all my expenses, for example: after shopping. The new selector is hard to use for me, too slowly. Now I have to touch the funnel icon to type everytime when I add a new transaction. Please let us to set default payee input method in the settings. I prefer old style input with autofocus.

I've been using the app for years. But the new Payee selector is a pain. I thought I had the process down to just hit the filter button first then type the payee. That works for Payees you already have but if you try to type in a new Payee in that box it just comes up as blank unless you add the payee with the plus button. It would be great if it had the option to go back to the old payee box.

I have been using this app for more than 3 yrs now. I am a licensed CPA and finance professional and I can say that of all the dozens of tracking apps out there, this is the cleanest, simplest, most accurate and tiny in size money managing app I have ever used. I employ it for both personal and business and when I file my own taxes each year it is the easiest thing in the world pulling reports and various filters to get the info I need. Highly recommended & reasonably priced!

title: Simple - Mobile Banking and Budgeting App
description:
Simple is one of the first mobile banking apps that has helped customers budget and save since 2012.

Budget and save with no hidden bank fees, with balances in Protected Goals Accounts earning a competitive interest rate. 

Every aspect of a Simple checking account is optimized for branchless online banking, budgeting, and saving, so you can track spending and manage your money wherever you happen to be. Simple is personal finance made easy.

Without setting foot in a branch (or a bank stuffed into an ill-fitting mobile app), you have access to:
* Built-in budgeting and saving tools
* Visa® Debit Card
* Photo Check Deposit
* FDIC-Insurance up to the legal limit
* Direct Deposit
* External Account Linking
* Instant Transfers to Other Simple Customers
* Third-Party Payment services like Square, Venmo, and Paypal
* Block your card online if it's been lost or stolen

Simple Goals
Use Goals for saving money: Stash away money for the unexpected, or automate saving for things you want. From a trip to Italy to a new bike. Open a separate Protected Goals Account to keep money tucked away from spending while earning a competitive interest rate. 

Simple Expenses
Set up your Expenses one time and going forward, we'll do the rest. When you pay your rent, your Expense is already saving money for next month's bill. Yep, it's our job now. (You can even split Expenses with a partner when using a Shared Account).

Safe-to-Spend®
Spend money spontaneously, without derailing your budget or bills (or doing the math on the spot...). We take your account balance, subtract your Expenses and Goals, and tell you exactly how much money you have left over to spend on whatever you want. (Buy the shoes!)

Shared Accounts
Earn interest with whoever you're interested in: Let your money earn 25x (1) the national average with a Shared Protected Goals Account. And when it comes to shared bills and savings goals, two paychecks are better than one! Open a Simple Shared account to tackle budgeting and save money together.

Round-up Rules 
Start saving money effortlessly with Round-up Rules. Whenever you make a purchase, what you spend will be rounded up to the next whole dollar amount, and when those round-ups reach or exceed $5, that balance will be tucked away into your Protected Goals Account. It’s like a digital change jar...one that adds up to real money in the bank.

Tax Refund
Your tax refund is your money, and the IRS has been hanging onto it all year! So when you finally get it back, put it to work! Commit to saving a portion of your return before you even receive it, and when it hits your account, it’ll automatically transfer into your Protected Goals Account to build your savings and earn interest.

(1) Check it out for yourself (based on the February 10, 2020 National Rate):https://www.fdic.gov/regulations/resources/rates/

Banking Services provided by BBVA USA, Member FDIC. The Simple Visa® Card is issued by BBVA USA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

Hello smooth(er) sailing!
comments: My first transaction from Postmates was completely lost and the company gives you the run around by asking you for a trace number that you can't provide. It happened the second time today and I had the check stub along with the deposit date and they did it again. During these challenging times it is obvious what they're doing. They are taking hard working Americans money and buying up the stock market. Money is the root of all evil and this company is just that evil

Overall, I love this bank and app. The way in which they cover expenses and goals makes it really easy to understand where my money is, what bills are covered, and where various goals are. using all of the advantages the app provides has really helped my family improve our financial standing. They add features in that are really helpful in planning out finances and I'm excited about future offerings like rules, CDs, etc. So why not 5 stars? Tech support. By and large their support team is great, but when you come across a big problem (like I have) there does not seem to be any way to escalate to Tier 2 or 3 support, you always stay at the same level. If they get that fixed, it is 5 stars all the way.

I've been banking with Simple for 6 years now, and I have ZERO complaints. Their support is always helpful and friendly. I enjoy the fee-FREE banking and easy access and control to my debit card and account. They also have industry-leading savings options and more. LOVE Simple! I recommend it to anyone!

Awesome. App has helped me to save better than ever before. Tracks spending, budget for expenses, and little to no fees. In the short time I've been using this I've probably tripled the money I have in my account by better budgeting

I've used Simple for several years and have had no issues. I can use it in stores and on-line. It connects to Google Pay. Adding money to the account has always been easy. And I really like that you can set up your expenses so you always know what money is safe to spend.

title: Qapital: Spending Tracker & Payday Savings Manager
description:
Save effortlessly, spend guilt-free, and invest confidently with Qapital, your new mobile banking and investing solution. Discover a smart personal finance manager with intuitive tools that make it easy to take control of your money. We’re committed to making money management accessible, and with more than 8,000 five-star reviews, we’re pretty sure we’re on the right track. Last year, our spending tracker and savings manager tools helped our members save an average of $1,500*, making Qapital the ideal app for emergency savings.

5 reasons to download Qapital:

- Automated savings: with personalized Goals and automated savings Rules, our savings manager allows you to save money without thinking about it. Start saving money right on payday!
- Checking account without traditional bank fees: forget about low balance, overdraft or foreign transaction fees. Instead, get a brand new Qapital Visa® Debit Card** with your checking account to help you save while you spend.
- Invest confidently: start to invest, and get personalized recommendations based on your risk profile. We’ll monitor your investment account, reinvest dividends and rebalance your portfolio for you.
- Budget easily: a pillar of personal finance is "pay yourself first". Set up automatic transfers from your checking account to your savings Goals on payday and allow yourself to forget about it entirely.
- Spending tracker: check out our Spending Sweet Spot feature - a smart money manager that helps you decrypt your spending habits. Discover how you spend, and you'll learn where to save.

Qapital is a new banking experience, which offers tools anchored in behavioral economic principles. Find money happiness by using Qapital to help you save more and reach your goals faster. Join our community, and find yourself among people dedicated to becoming their best financial selves.

Our spending tracker will help you discover your habits when it comes to personal finance. The savings manager allows you to set your Goals and Rules, save money without thinking about it, and watch your savings grow in real-time. You could save money automatically every time you spend! Choose from any number of free in-app savings Rules, take advantage of our Apple Health integration, or customize your own Rules with our IFTTT integration. Before you know it, your Facebook fixation and Uber usage could be saving you money!

Investing in the stock market can be intimidating, but it's a great tool to have in your personal finance arsenal. We'll start investing for you with Qapital Invest. You can earn more toward your long-term goals with personalized portfolio recommendations based on your risk profile. We monitor your account, keep investing dividends, and rebalance your portfolio based on changing market conditions so that you don’t have to.

Transfer funds between accounts in an instant, and enjoy these in-app features:

- Direct deposit
- Interest on your checking account, savings accounts, and all others
- Weekly Insights
- Pay bills
- Send checks
- Purchase notifications
- In-app temporary card lock
- Google Pay
- More to come!


QAPITAL, the QAPITAL and Q logos, and SAVE SMALL. LIVE LARGE. are all registered trademarks of Qapital, Inc. Copyright © 2018 Qapital, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
* Average amount saved by Qapital users during 2017
** Qapital Visa® Debit Card issued by Lincoln Savings Bank, Member FDIC
descriptionHTML:
Save effortlessly, spend guilt-free, and invest confidently with Qapital, your new mobile banking and investing solution. Discover a smart personal finance manager with intuitive tools that make it easy to take control of your money. We’re committed to making money management accessible, and with more than 8,000 five-star reviews, we’re pretty sure we’re on the right track. Last year, our spending tracker and savings manager tools helped our members save an average of $1,500*, making Qapital the ideal app for emergency savings.

5 reasons to download Qapital:

- Automated savings: with personalized Goals and automated savings Rules, our savings manager allows you to save money without thinking about it. Start saving money right on payday!
- Checking account without traditional bank fees: forget about low balance, overdraft or foreign transaction fees. Instead, get a brand new Qapital Visa® Debit Card** with your checking account to help you save while you spend.
- Invest confidently: start to invest, and get personalized recommendations based on your risk profile. We’ll monitor your investment account, reinvest dividends and rebalance your portfolio for you.
- Budget easily: a pillar of personal finance is "pay yourself first". Set up automatic transfers from your checking account to your savings Goals on payday and allow yourself to forget about it entirely.
- Spending tracker: check out our Spending Sweet Spot feature - a smart money manager that helps you decrypt your spending habits. Discover how you spend, and you'll learn where to save.

Qapital is a new banking experience, which offers tools anchored in behavioral economic principles. Find money happiness by using Qapital to help you save more and reach your goals faster. Join our community, and find yourself among people dedicated to becoming their best financial selves.

Our spending tracker will help you discover your habits when it comes to personal finance. The savings manager allows you to set your Goals and Rules, save money without thinking about it, and watch your savings grow in real-time. You could save money automatically every time you spend! Choose from any number of free in-app savings Rules, take advantage of our Apple Health integration, or customize your own Rules with our IFTTT integration. Before you know it, your Facebook fixation and Uber usage could be saving you money!

Investing in the stock market can be intimidating, but it's a great tool to have in your personal finance arsenal. We'll start investing for you with Qapital Invest. You can earn more toward your long-term goals with personalized portfolio recommendations based on your risk profile. We monitor your account, keep investing dividends, and rebalance your portfolio based on changing market conditions so that you don’t have to.

Transfer funds between accounts in an instant, and enjoy these in-app features:

- Direct deposit
- Interest on your checking account, savings accounts, and all others
- Weekly Insights
- Pay bills
- Send checks
- Purchase notifications
- In-app temporary card lock
- Google Pay
- More to come!


QAPITAL, the QAPITAL and Q logos, and SAVE SMALL. LIVE LARGE. are all registered trademarks of Qapital, Inc. Copyright © 2018 Qapital, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
* Average amount saved by Qapital users during 2017
** Qapital Visa® Debit Card issued by Lincoln Savings Bank, Member FDIC
summary: Your finance manager helps you track spending, invest & save money every payday
recentChanges: We aim to keep you saving, so we’ll now let you know when one of your Rules has become inactive or requires attention. If you open a Goal and see that there’s an issue with one of your Rules, you can tap it and follow the relevant steps to repair it. We’ve also fixed a few bugs and performed some general app maintenance.
comments: Great app! Quapital helps me save unconsciously by letting me set the terms on when to save and how much when I am paid. Without having it done in a way that I don't notice it, I wouldn't typically save very much or anything at all. The support team is also very helpful and quick to respond and resolve any issue or questions. Highly recommend!

Great way to save, I've used for like 7 months and i love how it help in saving money. Then I decided to take break and later on I downloaded the app again I tried to link my bank account again and it kept telling me error. I was so disappointed.

They say they won't charge after you've reached under $100 in your bank account. But they've continuously did it to me. And refuse to take responsibility for it. Maybe they need to upgrade whatever system they're using to check balance before transferring money because of the rules you have in place.
This app has made saving possible for me! I don't even notice the money coming out and it stops if my funds are low. I greatly recommend this!

NO human customer support, STUCK with NO money! - $5648 I CAN'T GET to becuase I'm getting a "error contact customer support." - Send you to an AI messaging support app that is garbage at understanding what you need. - Can't add a different bank because I'm getting a connection error. -Any app dealing with your money should have 24/7 call support. - Charge you a fee for nothing at all. No free option any longer. Thanks for the extremely stressful 4 days, Qapital!

title: Dollarbird - Personal finance calendar
description:
***New Year's sale! 50% off on all new Pro subscriptions for the first year.
Offer ends on the 1st of Jan 2019!***


Track and forecast your money as easily as adding events to a calendar! It helps you make sense of your financial situation, plan ahead and manage your money together with those who matter.

“It’s a delight to use.” - The Next Web 

“Dollarbird makes sense for anyone who wants to keep a closer eye on their cash flow for better financial planning purposes.” - TechCrunch 

Also featured in Mashable, Lifehacker, The Guardian, iMore, TUAW etc. 

It comes with:
• A simple calendar-based interface where you can add, keep track and visualize your transactions.
• Auto-categorization with a hint of AI that helps you classify your entries instantly. 
• Automatic balance calculation for each day or month and a transparent breakdown of your past and planned transactions.
• Option to collaborate with your partner, family or friends to manage your finances and stay up to date on common money matters.
• Your data stored in the cloud, available on all your devices regardless of the platform you’re rocking on.

summary: Collaborative smart calendar for your finances with a spark of AI.
developerAddress: Str. Garii nr. 21, Liberty Tech Park, 400267 Cluj-Napoca, jud. Cluj, Romania
recentChanges: • Fixed a bug where the app wouldn't refresh the data for some users.
comments: I LOVED this app....until I had to reinstall and now I not only lost all my transactions, but cannot add anything or do anything in the app. The "add" button is missing and I keep getting a "Something went wrong." error message. I have not heard anything back from developers yet, though I've sent in two emails now. Please help!

This app is a great way to get ahold of your finances. Set up your recurring credits and debits to your account, and schedule any anticipated payments you know about. You'll be able to accurately predict what your account will look like at any given future date. I personally use it to schedule credit card payments, so that I can meet utilization goals in 2020. As a tip, try setting a daily "allowance" transaction for things like food, that way you can factor that estimate into your budget. A+

Ok so this was exactly what is was looking for when I wanted to replace my quicken checkbook program and just use my cellphone to track my bills and income to project my balances. But this app is buggy.. it is duplicating my bills and after I have loaded in recurring transactions it is not keeping them marked as confirmed and that is confusing me on why not?? And with duplication..? I really need to be able to trust the program I use for spending ☹️ bummed !!!!

I absolutely love this app. I've tried other finance apps like Mint, but this is by far better in my opinion. I really enjoy how you can do so many customizations to accounts. I've been logging my transactions in this for over a year and a half now.
Easy to use, very useful. An improvement would be to have the option to see statistic on specific dates

title: VectorVest Stock Advisory
description:
Welcome to the VectorVest Stock Advisory app. It puts all the information you need to make faster, smarter, better investing decisions at your fingertips.
VectorVest is the only service that analyzes, sorts and ranks over 8,000 stocks every day for Value, Safety and Timing. It tells you when to buy, what to buy and when to sell.  And, it is the only service that combines the power of fundamental valuation with the insight of technical analysis.  VectorVest provides answers, not just data, for you to analyze on your own.  We do the work.  You reap the profits.  

PROVEN MARKET TIMING 
It’s not just what you buy, it’s when you buy. 

VectorVest’s 30-year history as a leader in the financial industry has resulted in a real-world tested and proven Market Timing System that is unlike any other. Instead of the wild, ratings-driven predictions spouted by “experts,” you get simple and effective, rule-based signals that help you keep your portfolio on the right side of the market.

The Market Timing Gauge gives you an at-a-glance summary that shows you when to buy…and when to stop, while in-depth, expert guidance with a personal touch is delivered by VectorVest’s Market Guidance Daily Video Report.
DYNAMIC STOCK SCREENER
Pick tomorrow’s winners today with the VectorVest Stock Screener! Whether you are conservative and focused on safety and dividend income, or aggressive and crave the action of a volatile stock, we have a screen for you. 

With just one tap, we will instantly scan through thousands of stocks to deliver the best potential picks for your portfolio.

PREMIUM STOCK WATCHLISTS
Where do you turn to find stocks? The internet? TV? Newsletters? 
They usually only cover a handful of stocks and can’t keep up with live, intraday market action.
Now, you have access to a better source.

TRADENOW
Trade directly from the VectorVest Mobile App with TRADENOW. TRADENOW is integrated with Ally Invest, Interactive Brokers and TradeStation in the U.S. and with Questrade in Canada.

EXCLUSIVE STOCK CHARTS
A picture is worth a lot more than words. 

VectorVest’s charts are simple, yet powerful. Display the buy/sell/hold ratings for any stock or add VectorVest’s unique Relative Timing Momentum Indicator to spot potential reversals before they happen.



Available Monthly Subscriptions include:
Free
Premium $19.99 USD


http://www.vectorvest.com/legal-information
http://www.vectorvest.com/privacy-policy

recentChanges:
- Premium users are now able to see the details of the Color Guard right on the Market Overview page!
- New and improved login experience.

Thank you for your feedback!
comments: This is a very good app to monitor what's going on in the market it could be improved in the research to be made more like the computer program if you input what you already have in stocks it's a good way to watch what's going on with your stocks to end your wishlist
I love this app very accurate and user friendly. I recommend it to anyone, it sure makes trading alot easier.

Legit app. Gives you a quick break down at a glance of any stock you are looking into. Weather it's undervalued or overvalued. Upside potential meter, running meter, safety. I always check stocks on this app before I make a trade.
Very great App. I am very pleased with their stock analysis.
I like getting the colorguard updates on my phone instaed of bothering with computer. Great product. 20 year subscriber.

title: Earnin - Get paid today
description:
Earnin is a community-supported app with a mission to build a financial system that works for people. Access up to $500 between paychecks, explore savings options on medical bills, help avoid unnecessary overdraft fees, and earn cash back on your purchases.
 
Four financial tools in one simple, easy-to-use app. With Earnin, there are no hidden fees. Just pay what you think is fair.

THREE SIMPLE STEPS TO CASH OUT:
---------------------------------------------------------
1. Connect your bank and tell us where you work.
2. We’ll verify your bank and confirm your hours worked; you cash out up to $100 per day and tip what you think is fair, between $0-14*.
3. On payday, we’ll debit your account for the money you cashed out plus any tip.
 
FAST FACTS:
---------------------
• 75%: 75% of members say Earnin has increased their ability to pay for gas and get to work.
 
• 15M: Community members have tipped extra to cover a fellow member’s tip over 15 million times.
 
• $133: Health Aid has found average negotiated savings of $133 per community member. (Results not guaranteed)
 
• $100M:  If members made the same purchases without accessing their pay using Earnin, they would have incurred over $100M in additional overdraft fees in June 2019.
 
OUR TOOLS:
--------------------
+ Cash Out 
Get paid when you want. Up to $100 per day, and up to $500 per pay period.
 
+ Health Aid
Send us your medical bill and we will negotiate with your medical provider to try to reduce your balance and/or find you a more affordable payment plan.
 
+ Balance Shield
Balance Shield Alerts notify you when your bank balance is getting low. Balance Shield Cash Outs send up to $100 of your earnings directly into your account to help avoid the chance of overdrafts.*
 
+ Cash Back Rewards:
Earn up to 10% cash back when you shop at 1000’s of participating local and national businesses.
 
OTHER FEATURES:
------------------------------
+ Lightning Speed
Connect your debit card to your Earnin account and receive your money in less time, with no additional charge!

+ Live Chat Support
If you have any questions or issues with the app, our Live Chat team is available 24/7, including all holidays.

+ 256-Bit Bank-Level Data Encryption
Earnin uses bank-level encryption to protect and secure your data.

+ Financial Calendar
A handy tool that informs you of any upcoming payments.
 

*Note that tipping options will vary between tools.
*Once Balance Shield is activated, it must be reset after each use.

Love the app? Leave a review! Your feedback helps us improve your experience.

recentChanges: To create a better experience for our community, we made bug fixes and performance enhancements in the app. Love Earnin? Rate us! Providing feedback is one way our community looks out for one another.
comments: A little tricky to get things set up properly. Needs work to streamline things. "Lightning speed" doesn't work with all banks (example: my bank placed a 3 day "check hold" on transactions through debit). Once setup is done though, it works really well. Pretty accurate daily logging and cash outs happen exactly when promised. Hands down, it's worlds better than taking out payday loans. If you're in a cycle of payday loan debt, do yourself a favor and try this app. (not a sponsored post).

3/19/2020 - Just wanted to give an update. This app was working great....for a while. But earlier this month it just stopped working. Now I dont know whether it is on their end or something with my bank, but I find certain things funny and annoying. They keep raising my max - yet I cant even withdraw. They cant access my bank info -- but they will gladly take money out even without knowing my balance. This needs to be fixed soon because it is very frustrating. They will cause me to overdraw.

Complete garbage! Used to work well, saved me a few times. I started having bank update/screenshot issues every single time I tried to use the app. Asked for help, at first someone could manually accept my screenshot, fixed my problem quickly, after this happened a few times, they decided to delete my banking info "to fix the problem on their end" asked me to redo my banking account info through the app. I have tried 100s of times have cont. to reach out for help and still won't work. Trash app.

It started off great! Then every pay period started experiencing Bank connectivity issue. I spoke to a number of reps about the situation and They keep giving me the same info about the app. I tried restarting it. Tried putting Bank info again. Nothing would allow me to connect. Im 5 days into the NEW pay period. Was able to Cash out once. Still havent gotten back to me about the problem. This app is great at time. But sucks alot more.

This app has helped me more than a few times. Recently it's getting harder to want to use it anymore. I don't mind the tip because it does help, but here recently it's taking longer for the funds to hit, and it is 10:37 Mar 10th and the app still thinks it's Mar 9th. Would just consider it a minor inconvenience but it's all the time now.

title: 1Money - Expense Tracker, Money Manager, Budget
description:
The app will show you where your money is going. Keeping track of your finances frequently isn't the most pleasant thing in the world, and it requires specific skills and knowledge. That's why we've developed a program that will make it easy for you to track your expenses on the go.

• ADD TRANSACTIONS INSTANTLY
Add a new transaction with a single tap. All you have to enter is the amount.

• EXPENSES AT A GLANCE
Log every expenditure over the course of your day, and the app will show you where your money went on an informative chart.

• BUDGET
You can quickly and easily plan your income and expenses, which will help you avoid making accidental purchases.

• TRACK DEBTS AND SAVINGS
Keep an eye on the balances of all your accounts and reach your financial goals efficiently.

• USE MULTIPLE CURRENCIES
Automatically updated exchange rates allow you to keep your finances up to date.

• SYNCHRONIZATION
Track your finances on all of your devices simultaneously using cloud-based data synchronization.

summary: 💰 An easy way to keep track of expenses. Quick budget. Personal finance manager
recentChanges:
+ Account filter – filter to display data for individual accounts (tap at the top of the screen)
+ Budget: Fixes for Savings
+ Refund transactions: Expenses/Income transactions with negative value
+ bug fixes...
comments: I loved it so much I bought the Premium version, which says a lot as I never pay for apps! I love the ability to customise categories, the pretty layout. One cool thing is that within a category, you can create subcategories, e.g."flights", "accomodation" in "travel" - that way, you don't have to type it every time, and you can also see how much is spent on what. There are lots of features that I'm not using, like being able to save your monthly records and print them. 100% 👍!

Nice application with attractive design, simple input and a great widget. However, there are 4 issues. (1) It lacks recurrence end date (2) the transaction has no time (hours & minutes), specially when it is required to sort transactions according to time during the same day (3) it will be great if each transaction shows the total balance along with each input for each account (not from starting & projected balance). (4) refund is reflected in the account not in categories amount or in overview.

Overall, I'm satisfied with the app, although I would like the developers to add a feature with which we can have a description added to the expense, for example the list of groceries, the destination, etc. We are able to add the descriptions, but they are not saved when the app is closed. For the time being I'm giving it four stars because of its functionality. I will give it five stars once the feature has been added. Keep up the good work!

Really really love this cool app! It covers all of my need in terms of tracking expense and salary. Obviously willing to subscribe. Easy to use, cool interface, and the experience fulfill my expectation. Cannot wait to use all of the functions. Great job team, keep going!

Love the flexibility of this app (particularly with the lifetime upgrade which was really inexpensive and totally worth it). I REALLY wish it had a web version so I could pull it up on my computer when I really need to dig into things. My favorite part might be the ability to customize the colors and pictures. It makes budgeting and tracking more enjoyable!

title: Expense IQ Money Manager
description:
Expense IQ (formerly EasyMoney) is your ultimate money manager app that combines an expense tracker, a budget planner, a checkbook register, integrated bills reminder and more rolled into one powerful personal finance app!

The only money manager that grows with you!

As Featured:
★ Google Play: "New Year New You", "Golden Egg Lunar New Year 2017" Collections
★ Android Police: "If you're looking for a good financial tool, Expense IQ should definitely be on your list of apps to check out."
★ Android Authority: "Polished budget app that has Material Design and gives you a lot of information."
★ Tom's Guide: Best Budgeting and Personal Finance Apps
★ hvg.hu: "Got your salary? Track with a great expense app!"

Find out why Expense IQ is trusted by hundreds of thousands of users:

Bring your finances together
▶　Know where EVERY cent of your money goes. 
▶　Track your daily expenses quickly and easily! Takes only seconds to enter your personal or business expenses.
▶　Repeating transactions: save the hassle of entering your bills every time!
▶　The more you use, the more convenient and quicker it gets! Smart predictive engine helps fill in transaction details so you can add records in just 2 taps!
▶　Attach photos/images to each transaction!
▶　Create Projects to group related expenses like travelling or occasions

Stay out of debts for life with effective budget planning
Spend less, save more by keeping to your budgets easily. Set monthly budgets to accounts categories and check at one glance from the color-coded health bars. Get warnings when you overspend/exceed your budget!

Never pay late fees again with timely bill reminders
Remember to pay all your bills with reminders. Optionally, take a photo of your bills/invoices to keep records.

Clear in-depth reports
Analyze your spending pattern with rich, detailed & fully customizable reports. 12+ reports and charts including: Expenses by Category, Monthly Cash Flow, Income vs Expense, Daily/Monthly Expense & more...

Easy-to-use advanced features
▶　Split transactions with transfers for multi-categories in one transaction like when shopping at supermarkets (Eg Walmart)
▶　Convenient and intuitive design - get things done quickly
▶　Secure Cloud Sync and backup across your devices, or share an account with family
▶　Add favorite transactions card to add frequent items
▶　Widgets to be on top of your finances any time
▶　Multi-currency support for travel, business and investments

List of smart features users love:
・ Smart Overview with handy shortcuts, account balances, expense reports, upcoming/overdue bill reminders, budget warnings etc
・ Repeating Transactions Manager
・ Detailed & Interactive Reports with ability to drill deep into each item
・ Multi-account with currency conversion
・ Transfers between Accounts
・ Split Transactions
・ Budget Planner with smart color-coded Budget Health indicators at a glance!
・ Integrated Checkbook Register
・ Unlimited customizable categories and payees
・ Take photos of bills/receipts
・ Encrypted backup offline or on a private Google Cloud
・ Import & export to/from formats like QIF & CSV (works with Quicken, Excel etc)
・ Cloud Sync (Unlimited devices)
・ Tablet-optimized
・ 3 themes!
・ Homescreen Widget - Quick adding of entries/transactions with shortcuts
・ Secure access with a PIN lock
・ 30+ languages and 150+ currencies!

Permissions
GET_ACCOUNTS: Obtain Google Accounts on device for Cloud Sync
READ/WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For daily backup, import/export QIF/CSV, store attached photos etc
We are dedicated to your data privacy and do not take any of your personal data.

Follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/expenseiq/)
For support, guides and more, check out http://www.expense-iq.com

Expense IQ Money Manager is proudly brought to you by Handy Apps.

Spend less, save more by keeping to your budgets easily. Set monthly budgets to accounts categories and check at one glance from the color-coded health bars. Get warnings when you overspend/exceed your budget!

Never pay late fees again with timely bill reminders
Remember to pay all your bills with reminders. Optionally, take a photo of your bills/invoices to keep records.

Clear in-depth reports
Analyze your spending pattern with rich, detailed & fully customizable reports. 12+ reports and charts including: Expenses by Category, Monthly Cash Flow, Income vs Expense, Daily/Monthly Expense & more...

Easy-to-use advanced features
▶　Split transactions with transfers for multi-categories in one transaction like when shopping at supermarkets (Eg Walmart)
▶　Convenient and intuitive design - get things done quickly
▶　Secure Cloud Sync and backup across your devices, or share an account with family
▶　Add favorite transactions card to add frequent items
▶　Widgets to be on top of your finances any time
▶　Multi-currency support for travel, business and investments

List of smart features users love:
・ Smart Overview with handy shortcuts, account balances, expense reports, upcoming/overdue bill reminders, budget warnings etc
・ Repeating Transactions Manager
・ Detailed & Interactive Reports with ability to drill deep into each item
・ Multi-account with currency conversion
・ Transfers between Accounts
・ Split Transactions
・ Budget Planner with smart color-coded Budget Health indicators at a glance!
・ Integrated Checkbook Register
・ Unlimited customizable categories and payees
・ Take photos of bills/receipts
・ Encrypted backup offline or on a private Google Cloud
・ Import & export to/from formats like QIF & CSV (works with Quicken, Excel etc)
・ Cloud Sync (Unlimited devices)
・ Tablet-optimized
・ 3 themes!
・ Homescreen Widget - Quick adding of entries/transactions with shortcuts
・ Secure access with a PIN lock
・ 30+ languages and 150+ currencies!

Permissions
GET_ACCOUNTS: Obtain Google Accounts on device for Cloud Sync
READ/WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For daily backup, import/export QIF/CSV, store attached photos etc
We are dedicated to your data privacy and do not take any of your personal data.

Follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/expenseiq/)
For support, guides and more, check out http://www.expense-iq.com

Expense IQ Money Manager is proudly brought to you by Handy Apps.
summary: All in one money manager with expense tracker, budget planner & bills reminder!

comments: Great app, but my reporting period is 25th to 25th, so month by month doesn't help me. I need to report, especially budget wise, from the 25th to the 25th. I'm sure a lot of users might have similar "non standard" reporting periods. Can you guys maybe look at incorporating this as far as budgets are concerned? For example, the majority of my expenses for February will take place from the 26th to the 31st January, but they're allocated to January which skews the reporting.

Bought the lifetime membership and been using it for about 4 years. Their backend service is great as I encountered some hiccups when I switch my phone cos I backup the data with the older version. They are very helpful to send me the file of the previous version in order for me to retrieve my backup data and update the data to the latest version without me losing any of my past data. Keep up the great work! Thanks.

The devs are absent. Been waiting a couple of months for an email I've sent and no answer whatsoever, communication is something I find essential especially for an app that you pay a subscription (or buy the lifetime version since it has the option). The app is good, not great, and definitely not bad, but there are some things that they should work on. And if there is no communication from them it's safe to assume they just moved on and they will no longer respond or will make any mayor updates

The best budget app ever in the app store 👌👍. I found a bit unprofessionalism from the developer. They simply disregard of your expectation from the app. I had the request of adding option of choosing any photo from gallery to be set as custom icon. They simply reject to be satisfied with the built in icons. Another request was to make any account to be excluded from total (there surely has the option but not working actually) so that I might use my office account in parallel but in vain.

The app is beautiful but only in English. With arabic usage, I can't be able to add data as a new entry or new expense. I hope to develop the application in Arabic like the other languages that work in the application correctly.

title: StockMarkets - investment news, quotes, watchlists
description:
All your US & international market information needs covered in one innovative app. Get access to free live quotes and push prices from markets around the world, including quality news from our newsroom, company profiles, full screen real-time charts, stock screener, currency converter and much more. Full personalization possible with custom watchlists, portfolios and price-based push alerts.

REAL-TIME DATA & LIVE SEARCH
- Live quotes with push prices - no manual reloading of the data is necessary!
- Powerful live search featuring our huge data universe - look up your individual symbols
- Current news updates for global events
- Covers markets around the world (stocks, futures, indices, commodities, currencies…)

PRE-DEFINED MARKET OVERVIEWS & EXTENSIVE DETAIL PAGES
- Overviews of most popular symbols for Markets, Commodities, Indices, Currencies, Interest Rates, Hot Stocks
- Extensive detail view for each symbol based on symbol type (stock, commodity, currency etc.)
- Arbitrage lists: View a symbol on different markets
- Company profiles & company news for stocks
- Related futures/options for a symbol

PORTFOLIO
- Create multiple personal portfolios to keep track of your gains and losses
- Define the starting capital, portfolio currency,  fees, deposits and redemptions
- Add / remove symbols with simulated buy/sell transactions (incl. fees & comments)
- Show profit/loss per position and for complete portfolio
- Share your portfolio with our other mobile apps (e.g. for iPad)

PERSONAL WATCHLISTS
- Customizable price lists for monitoring your assets
- Real-time prices with many display options (Last & Change%, Performance View, QuoteBoard, Chart View and more)

REAL-TIME PUSH ALERTS
- Automatically triggered price-based notifications (upper/lower price limit)
- Daily e-mail notifications about a customised list of securities
- Alerts sent automatically by Apple Push to your home screen
- E-mail alerts and text messages (free sign-in required) also available

ADVANCED REAL-TIME CHARTING & TECHNICAL ANALYSIS
- Track price movements on our interactive full screen charts
- Candlesticks, OHLC Bars, Mountain or Line charts (incl. Volume)
- Timeframes: Daily, Weekly, Monthly or Intraday (1 / 5 / 10 / 15 / 30 / 60 Minutes)
- Linear, percentage or logarithmic scaling available
- Additional features like zooming, crosshair, chart templates, comparison of a security with its benchmark
- Supports the most popular indicators for technical analysis, like Moving Average, ADX, Average True Range, Bollinger Bands, CCI, Directional Movement Plus/Minus, DM System, Envelopes, Highest High, Lowest Low, Ichimoku, MACD, Momentum, Money Flow Index, OBV, Price Change, Parabolic SAR, ROC, TRIX, Volatility, RSI and many more

STOCK SCREENER
- Easy picking of the most promising securities out of thousands
- Covering the world's major stock exchanges
- Performance filters (Change %, Performance 1 Week, 1 Month, 3 Months, 6 Months,1 Year, 3 Years, 5 Years, 10 Years)
- Fundamental filters like market cap, EBIT, EBITDA, net income & turnover

CURRENCY CONVERTER
- Easy-to-use calculator using current rates from major world currencies (also includes Bitcoin Currency Converter)
- Can be used online and offline

MARKET COVERAGE
- Major Stock markets & Indices, like Nasdaq, Dow Jones, S&P 500, S&P 100, FTSE 100, DAX, EuroStoxx 50, Nikkei 225 etc.
- Commodities markets, incl. precious metals (gold, silver, platinum, palladium, copper), energy, agricultural and livestock products
- Futures / Options markets, for example CME, CBOT etc.
- Major Currency pairs, such as EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY etc. as well as Bitcoin rates (BTC/USD)
-  Interest Rates, Bonds, ETFs
-  Financial News from our innovative Newsroom
-  Free real-time data (where available) and delayed/EOD data
-  Additional real-time data packages from your TeleTrader Terminal accounts

comments: This app is high quality and functions at a professional level. It is the best I have found for quotes, charts, news and broad market overview. I use their app on my android phones and tablets and I use their website counterpart on my desktop computers. So far, all functions are free. The only criticism I have is that I would like to discover if I can pay them for services such as using it as an actual trading platform/broker but this company seems to be too busy to answer my inquiries.

Use this app everyday. Useful for timely news keeping track of my watchlist, and the economy. News for individual stocks could be better, but still a great app. EDIT: The news portion of the app is one of my favourite things. The notifications are so timely and useful. Thank you!!

Very good and useful app. The charts, news and performance overviews are very handy to use. It also includes a multichart function. So a whole portfolio can be charted in once with the help of small charts. I feel better informed with this app.

Latency is a big problem for this app. It has lots of great functions but if you wanna use it for actual trading remember it's always about 1-2 minutes behind. I think your developers need really to work on this issue.

For the most part a good app. Points are off by 1 or 2 but better than most. The constant reminder of something going up or down is annoying. But I think I can change that in settings. Besides that better than most.

title: Penny Stocks
description:
Penny Stocks App for android is use to find hot penny stocks ideas and top penny stocks today.

Penny Stock Screener allows a trader to find daily top penny stocks gainers and losers, with stocks under $1, $2 and $5. This penny stocks app does not suggest which penny stocks to buy, it lists penny stocks to watch. You will need to decide for your own which are the best penny stocks to buy or trade.

Penny Stocks list are stocks that are trading on the NYSE, AMEX and NASDAQ penny stocks. 
This Penny Stocks app does not include stocks from the OTCBB penny stocks.

You can filter penny stocks by stock price and volume.

You can search for stocks under $1, $2 and $5, and you can filter for penny stocks by volume.
You will see the biggest penny stock gainers and losers of the day.
You will find the top 100 most active penny stocks each day with our penny stocks app.

Traders will see penny stock news for each stock symbol and penny stock charts.
The penny stock app uses stock charts from Finviz.  

NOTE: Penny Stocks App is based on end of day data, not live data. 
The data is updated at 6:30PM EST on every trading day.

This is not a penny stock alert app, so you won't get any stock alert from us. You will use our penny stocks app to do research and manually add stocks to your watchlist. Majority of the stocks are from nasdaq exchange because they have the most penny stocks available other than OTC stocks. 

Please keep in mind penny stocks are risky stocks to trade, as they can go up or down very quickly.
You can make a lot money trading penny stocks when you do it right. It is much easier for a $2 stock to go up to $4 than for a $200 stock to go up to $400. However, there are a lot of risk involved when you trade penny stocks as they are very volatile. A stock that you buy for $2, may go up to $4, but it can also go bankrupt.

Disclaimer: Our Penny Stock App does not endorse or suggest any of the securities which are returned in any of the searches or filters. They are provided purely for informational and research purposes. Our Penny Stock App does not recommend particular securities. Our Penny Stock App shall not be liable for any errors or delays in the data, or for any actions taken based on the data. Users should always conduct their own research and due diligence and obtain professional advice before making any investment decision. Our Penny Stocks App will not be liable for any loss or damage caused by a user reliance on information obtained in the App.

comments: Overall I have learned so much with this app. I find it easy to understand. And because of this it keeps my interest, and I find that that is half the battle.... Very good and I'm taking it tips. when I'm ready to make some money for sure...... I know I can't go wrong I've seen it......... Come along for the ride and make some money............ With me...... If I can understand it so can you.......!!!! 💲💲💲💲4🌈🌈

I love the fact that this app gives you the details though the one thing this app lacks is time ... I would of given 5 stars if it didnt seem to lag a day behind so i miss out to some standpoint but i also know what stocks to look at 4 out of 5 stars legit
This is a very awesome app. Especially if you're mildly a beginner. The first two times I used it it helped me with a lot of info. I end up doubling my money... awesome thanks...
Fantastic app! The format makes it very easy to view different stocks and how they are performing.
Good app, but wish it updated more than once a day. Needs a search function to look up symbols that can actually find a stock. I put in a stock I currently hold and it can't find a chart.

title: Chase Mobile
description:
Bank from almost anywhere with the Chase Mobile® app. Manage your accounts, pay bills, pay people, deposit checks, even transfer money. And do it all safely and securely with your device.
 
Manage Your Accounts

[+] View your account balance at Sign in using Account Preview.
[+] Monitor your checking, savings, credit card or J.P. Morgan investment activities.
[+] Set up travel notifications for your debit and credit cards.
[+] Set up Account Alerts and adjust your preferences.
[+] Use Chase QuickDeposit® to deposit a check just by taking a photo.
[+] Check and get updates on your credit score.
[+] Access your personal Chase Home Lending dashboard for ways to make the most of homeownership.

Make Payments and Transfer   

[+] Schedule, edit or cancel payments for your Chase credit card and your other bills.
[+] Send and request money using Chase QuickPay® with Zelle® 
[+] Transfer money between your Chase accounts.
[+] Reload your Chase Liquid® prepaid card.
[+] Send wire transfers.

Offers and Deals 

[+] Track and redeem your rewards with Chase Ultimate Rewards®.  
[+] Send friends and family a digital gift card.
[+] Earn statement credit by using Chase Offers with your eligible credit and debit cards. 
[+] Grow your savings automatically with Autosave.

Manage Your Investments with J.P. Morgan 

[+] Trade stocks, bonds, mutual funds and exchange-traded funds (ETFs) with a You Invest℠ by JPMorgan Trade account.
[+] Let the expertise and technology of J.P. Morgan design and manage a portfolio for you with a You Invest℠ Portfolios account.  

Connect with Chase 

[+] Find the nearest Chase branches and ATMs. 
[+] Speak with a service representative 24/7. 

Disclosure

[+] Some features are available for eligible customers and accounts only. Any time you review your balance, keep in mind it may not reflect all transactions including recent debit card transactions or checks you have written. A qualifying Chase transfer account is required to transfer funds via text. 
[+] There is no charge from Chase, but message and data rates may apply. Such charges include those from your communications service provider. Delivery of alerts may be delayed for various reasons, including service outages affecting your phone, wireless or internet provider; technology failures; and system capacity limitations. 
[+] You Invest℠ is a business of J.P. Morgan Securities LLC offering self-directed brokerage (You Invest Trade) and investment advisory services (You Invest Portfolios). Investment products and services, including brokerage and advisory accounts, are offered through J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, member FINRA and SIPC. J.P. Morgan Securities LLC and JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. are affiliate companies under the common control of JPMorgan Chase & Co.

INVESTMENT PRODUCTS:

  • NOT A DEPOSIT
  • NOT FDIC INSURED
  • NO BANK GUARANTEE
  • MAY LOSE VALUE

[+] Android is a registered trademark of Google Inc. 
[+] Deposit products provided by JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. Member FDIC
[+] Equal Opportunity Lender

comments: It's convenient, however, it constantly tells me it doesn't recognize my device and frequently tells me my payment is made but then takes over three days to post, making it late. When I check to see what happened and why a delay, the function is conveniently unavailable. This has only happened when there seems to be an unexplainable delay that adds a late charge.

Great card to have if you have established some credit and are trying to build it up more. I like that they give you the first year with no interest so you can buy what you need and have time to pay it off get your credit score to go higher and then be more careful in year two with your spending and paying it off because you'll have interest rates at that time.

It's been a great app, but recently the rewards, credit journey, even feedback pages do not load. The screen remains white. I tried clearing cache, deleting data, but it didn't work. I then tried deleting and reinstalling the app, it worked once, but now it is back to a blank white screen. Please fix your app! And please don't tell me to send a secure message by logging into the site. This is an app problem, period.

Use to love this app, but for the past few months it won't let me log in. It either says "unable to connect to chase at the moment" or "we do not recognize that username or password". I've uninstalled and reinstalled, still no luck. If I go online on my laptop or desktop, I can log on, but the app won't work. I see lots of other reviews with the same issue. If Chase fixes the issue, I will change my raiting.

This app has been useful until March of 2020 when the Make A Payment page stopped working. Clicking on anything on that page is futile. No keyboard opens up to type in an amount. Payments cannot be made. This app has no purpose if one still must open your website,for a transaction. How do I should give this app negative 5 stars?

title: Fidelity Investments
description:
Put 70 years of Fidelity’s financial experience in the palm of your hand with the Fidelity Investments app. Quickly review news about your investments and interests with your customized Feed. Then trade, manage your money, deposit checks, and pay bills in just a few taps. You’ll stay ahead of the game using our in-depth market research—including Zack’s Bull & Bear of the Day—combined with timely, customizable notifications.

Stay connected to every aspect of the financial world so you can learn, track, and trade anytime—anywhere. 

Cutting Edge Design 
• New look and feel with simplified navigation 

Customized Feed Just for You
• Industry-first dynamic experience
• Timely portfolio, market, and research information 
• Customized news and tailored content

Manage Your Money 
• Manage your Orders, History, and Pending Transactions under Activity in Accounts
• Trade, Transfer, Deposit Checks, and Pay Bills under Trade + Transact 

View More Information in Your Watch List

Markets + Research

News + Video

Accessibility

Alerts and Push Notifications

Call a Rep

To learn more, go to fidelity.com/android.
