• Timely portfolio, market, and research information
• Customized news and tailored content

Manage Your Money
• Manage your Orders, History, and Pending Transactions under Activity in Accounts
• Trade, Transfer, Deposit Checks, and Pay Bills under Trade + Transact

View More Information in Your Watch List
• View your watch list in grid view or as a heat map
• Field options include: 52- week range, P/E, EPS, earnings date, div date, div ex-date, div $, and div yield

Markets + Research
• Stay ahead of the game by gaining insights on: International Markets and Zack’s Bull & Bear of the Day

News + Video
• Access Fidelity Viewpoints and view Live Bloomberg streaming videos

Accessibility
• Enhanced TalkBack experience

Alerts and Push Notifications
• Receive timely, customizable alerts via push notifications or the message center

Call a Rep
• Tap to connect with a Fidelity representative in an instant

 
To learn more, go to fidelity.com/android.

summary: Fidelity Investments
recentChanges:
Thank you for using the Fidelity Mobile® App. The latest version includes:

Fidelity Private Client Group℠ and Fidelity Premium Services℠ clients working with an advisor can now access their advisor’s Calendar to self-schedule an appointment, Digital Bio, Phone number, Email address, and Support team number for immediate 24/7 service help.
Set Fidelity Watchlist as a screensaver to monitor the markets! Enable it under app Settings + Profile.
Bug Fixes and Performance Enhancements
comments: Until a recent update in March, which happened right around the market crash, the app was working great. Now, I can not set any of my feed settings. I have set all of the parameters to show nothing, yet nothing changes. I have certain markets I was watching but decided I didn't want to see them every day, and I can't get rid of them now. Very frustrating. It WAS a great app. Now it take more of my time than I prefer.

Very limited in setting up push alerts. As someone who has had their account compromised before, would like to be able to set up push alerts so that any money both in and out of my accounts are pushed to my phone as soon as it is seen. Especially accounts with physical debit cards. As far as I can tell, I can only set up those alerts as email alerts in the web portal, and push alerts are limited to trading...

There are no 'Push Notifications' for Fidelity credit card or debit card or Cash Management transactions. There are no 'Push Notification' settings for these accounts. There used to be, but they are gone. The only notification setting is for trades. This problem has persisted since Version update 3.40. Recent update to 3.46 did not fix. Telephone calls and emails have not resulted in a fix.

My phone just upgraded to Android 10. Once it's upgraded, this app cannot start any more. I uninstalled and reinstalled again. It worked for once in the beginning, and then when launch next time it stopped on the first screen. And freeze there. It seems cannot start anymore. It worked perfectly fine with Android 9 but not after upgrade. I am a heavy user of the app, and need it fixed asap. Thanks.

Great app. I liked it better with the news and market stuff on the front page above account summary. Lot more colorful and interesting. Would be great if it showed daily info for 401k shares too. They seem to have pre loaded pages it fetches based on how good or bad the market is doing, and it seems to change throughout the week for reasons unknown. It can be a pain in the ass and frustrating because it's always changing where I have to look for the info im looking for.

title: Investmate - Learn to trade shares and derivatives
description:
Do you have friends in finance? No? Well, now you do. Meet Investmate: a reliable and helpful education app with comprehensive knowledge of CFD trading. 
Investmate has a lot to offer for beginners: courses, tips, quizzes, a glossary of terms and thought-provoking financial content. With all this handy stuff in one education app, you can start from the very fundamentals and progress to the ins and outs of investing: you’ll learn what a CFD is, how CFDs on stocks, commodities and indices are traded, how to interpret charts and build your own trading strategy.

Investmate is:

●	Professional. All of our comprehensive courses, with real-world case studies, have been developed by experts in finance to make an expert of you.

●	Personalised. The in-app feed provides you with tailored courses, engaging quizzes, helpful glossary categories, curiosity piquing educational videos to meet the needs and skills of a fresh investor. 

●	Fast. It takes as little as 3 minutes to complete one lesson and there are short interactive quizzes to check your progress.

●	Mobile. Learn to trade on the go. Wherever you are, whenever you chose, the mobile app enables learning the market at a time and place to suit you.

●	Comprehensive. The detailed, jargon-free financial glossary makes complicated concepts easy. 

●	Straightforward. Clear and plain interface with all info presented in cards. The app features a handy pin option to remember and get back to the material you most need. 

Download the Investmate app for free and dive into learning finance right away.

Trading is risky and you may lose all of your invested capital.

Authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN 793714).
Regulated by the CySEC, license #319/18.

summary: Investmate is an engaging education app. Learn how to invest and become a pro.
developerAddress: Lophitis Business Centre II, 237 28th October Street, Limassol 3035 Cyprus
recentChanges:
We are happy to roll out a fresh update with a slew of new features. In addition to minor bug fixing, the app saw a nice improvement – now you can share interesting courses, videos and lesson with your friends on Facebook.
Try it and please share your feedback with us.
comments: This app seriously focusses well on learning for beginners. Lots of jargon is explained very simply, examples are given, things are repeated sometimes so it stays in your head easier and after some information you get a short quiz about what you read. Its structured well and easy to look back at things. I wish more educational stuff was made like this.

This app has been wonderful in terms of breaking it all down. The way everything is worded for you, as well as the examples given, really help you to fully grasp & catch on to what they're saying the first time. You won't have to keep reading things over & over, confused as hell... they've done an excellent job of making knowledge that the normal consumer has access to but typically doesn't understand, understandable! I really appreciate this app.
Just started using this app and I am happy to have found this. The explanations are easy to understand, with highlighted key points to learn certain terms used in the finance world.

The app is okay for understanding basic financial terms. The quizzes need to be overhauled as the answers appear in the wrong order and often have more than one correct answer, when selected it will display as incorrect.
Easy to read. Like the quiz and the prediction. I would do more predictions with explanations. Even an prediction mode to just learn by doing that. Nice graphics too.

title: Progressive Leasing Mobile
description:
Progressive Leasing provides a NO CREDIT NEEDED lease purchase option for credit challenged consumers. Our program provides an alternate solution so you can acquire the items you want or need today.

Progressive Leasing also allows you to save money with our 90 day payment option as well as other early buyout options.

Progressive's mobile app makes it easy to apply or manage your lease!

APPLY AND GET APPROVED INSTANTLY
Our application process is simple! It only takes minutes to apply, and you will know if you’re approved instantly.

NEVER MISS A PAYMENT
See your payment schedule and transactions anytime. View your current amount due, your balance, and future payments.

MAKE PAYMENTS ON THE GO
Now it’s easier than ever to manage your payments. The Progressive app allows you to see your transactions, exercise your 90 day payment option, pay with a new credit card, and more.

REAPPLY IN SECONDS
Ready to shop again? Simply update your profile and apply.

summary: Get what you need with our lease-purchase option (NO CREDIT NEEDED).
recentChanges: We’re adding helpful descriptions to the payment activity page to keep you in the know. You may not see these changes right away.
comments: Its a great program. Just make sure you read and understand everything before you sign up. Because the best buy person who signed me up completely explained everything wrong to me. So do youre research. Other than that, this program is excellent!

Terrible app and online login. I can almost never login to check my balance. Will not use the service again. I want to payoff with the 3 month option they offer but it's always extremely difficult to check balance. Maybe this is a strategy they use to keep ppl on the lease long term so they get double the money. Anyway needs a major upgrade.

The app is amazing and easy to use but I had major issues with the company towards the end where they take money out of my account and then refund the money a couple days later. I got emails telling me my lease was paid in full and then almost a month later saying it actually wasn't. I will never use progressive again.

Not only is the app great but the company itself is absolutely wonderful!! In the time I have been doing business with progressive leasing I have had to call customer service three times to be exact. And all three times I received the absolute best customer service! My third call was today and not only did the gentlemen take care of my request but went even further and was able to help me out even more with my situation! Keep it up! Unfortunately great service like that is very rare !

Very cold and unfriendly unless they feel there is little risk for them and of course they can cash in on your inability to obtain traditional financing for something...AT THIS MOMENT I STAND BY THIS GRADING AND EVALUATION...IF ANYTHING HAPPENS TO CHG I WILL ALTER THIS ACCORDINLY...GOOGLE IF U STIFLE THIS OPINION...IT WILL BE THE LAST EVAL I WILL PUBLISH...EVER

title: Rocket Mortgage
description:
Ready to start your mortgage?
- Tap to e-sign your entire mortgage application
- Message us directly with the in-app message board
- See your full to do list to track what we need from you and what we're working on

Already have a mortgage with us?
- Easily manage your payments, bank account and autopay
- Get customizable push notifications so you know when your payment is due or when there's a change to your escrow account
- Access all of your loan documents at any time, including statements and tax forms.

This is the first app of its kind and we want to make sure it works for you. If you have feedback, let us know! Send your comments, questions or ideas to AppFeedback@QuickenLoans.com or reach out to @QuickenLoans on Twitter.

*** NMLS #3030. Equal housing lender. Licensed in all 50 states. For our licensing and disclosure information, please visit: http://www.quickenloans.com/about/legal/disclosures-licenses ***

summary: Now you can manage your entire mortgage all from our comprehensive app.
recentChanges: We’ve made some enhancements to our app. We’re always making improvements for a better mobile mortgage experience.
comments: App loads promptly, is very clear and simple to use, allows me access to multiple accounts of my mortgage information and best of all allows me to make my mortgage payments. I can log on and make a payment and log off in 1-2 minutes. Awesome!
The app is very useful and convenient. I'm able to view my accounts, make payments and download documents with ease. The app layout is simple to navigate thru to find what you need.
Great! I had all kinds of technical problems to prevent me from closing on time Steven Carden assist me with all my network issues and answer all my concerns in a timely manner.👍👍👍💯💯
In refinance my home using the Rocket Mortgage app made everything go smoothly and easy. This is an excellent app, kept you informed on what they need and what you had to do.
Easy to use. Very user friendly. Also has some cool additional features to help with calculating payments and such.

title: Venmo
description:
Why use Venmo?

Because it’s the money app for splitting the cost of almost anything—right then, right there.
Because it makes settling up feel like catching up. 
Because you can add a note to each payment to remember the moments, not the money. 

What do people use Venmo for? Plenty of things, like:

Meals
Split the group dinner tab without the napkin math.

Rent
Transfer money to roomies for your share of rent and utilities.

Activities
Settle up for fun stuff like concert tix and road trips.

Surprises
Send a penny to say hi, or 5 bucks for good luck.

Still reading? We’ll let you in on a little secret: we’re more than just a way to pay friends.
- We offer Venmo card, so you can shop with your Venmo balance everywhere Mastercard® is accepted in the U.S., plus earn cash back rewards at select retailers. Terms apply: https://venmo.com/rewards/
- Get your Venmo money in the bank, fast. Use Instant Transfer to get your cash in minutes using an eligible debit card or bank account. 
- Check out with Venmo on some of your favorite apps, like Uber, StockX, Grubhub, and Zola. 
- We’ve got your back—security is very important to us, and we prioritize making you feel safe and secure by taking security measures to protect your account. Plus, we’ve got a stellar customer support team, ready to solve any issues.


Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC. Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circles design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated.

summary: Venmo is the fun and easy way to pay and get paid.
recentChanges: Animated stickers are here! Enhance your payment notes with animated stickers from Holler
comments: This app is terrible. Their security is awful. Their response on trouble tickets is even worse. It also leaves you hanging to where you don't know if they even got your message. They can't do anything right. A couple months after I listed the comments above I tried to request funds from somebody and instead venmo sent them funds putting my account in the negative. I can not warn you enough, so not use this app it's terrible.

I like the ease and convenience of using the Venmo app and the Venmo card. I do have a few improvement suggestions: 1) It would be nice to get a notification in the app confirming others received $, similar to when one uses it as a Mastercard (other than the recipient responding if they feel like it.) 2) There needs to be a better was to recall money accidently sent to the wrong person. 3) It takes too many days to transfer money to and from bank accounts.

Needs to have: 1. More than one person should be able to use the same bank account, like a husband and wife with a shared account. 2 An option to verify the identify of the recepient - like sending a real-time ping or something. Last 4 digits of the phone number are okay, but wouldn't a real time ping verification be easier, especially for retail transactions?

This has been a lifesaver more than once, it's particularly a great app if you needed money in your bank account right now it's great!. That was then, this is now.it keeps telling me that my debit card can't be used for instant transfers. it worked fine with Wells Fargo but when I switch to chase now it's giving me misery up the ass.

This is the most useless app I have on my phone. When I first used it, it worked fine, but after the 3rd time of using it, it no longer would transfer my funds. Called card company, no problem there. Called venmo. they say I have to try again later or its a security reason. they cannot tell me what would cause the problem or can not lift the security restriction. STILL AFTER THIS, wanted to give it benifit, so ordered card. Now there's a "bug" in the system and cannot activated. Waited a month.

title: Bluecoins Finance: Budget, Money & Expense Manager
description:
Bluecoins is an incredibly simple finance app that is an excellent expense tracker, budget and money manager tool. It is the complete reporting and analysis app to manage money, expenses, income and budget. Use it for  personal finance, as family budget planner, or for small business! Generate reports of monthly expenses, manage family budget with your spouse, or export finance records into spreadsheets/pdf! It is easy and be amaze at how you can be a finance and budget expert in no time. Take control of your money right now!

Want to have peace of mind and make your money work for you? – DOWNLOAD NOW!

What makes us the best budget and finance app today?

"minimalist and efficient, with seamless syncing of data across devices. It helps users keep track of credit cards, bank accounts, loans, and debts through graph reports, and allows for customizable budgeting categories that can be viewed per week, month, quarter, and year, among others."
-CNN, July 2018

😉 Finance and budget made easy : don't get lost managing finance. Reconciling accounts with bank records and credit card statements is a breeze. Track transactions conveniently via bank notifications or SMS! You don’t have to be an accountant to use good money principles- you'll good at it while using this excellent finance app!

👩🏻‍🏫 Meaningful reports : easy to understand reports and charts that you easily generate within the app. All finance reports of your money, budget, expenses, income and more can be readily exported in pdf, excel, html. Send  reports directly to a printer for printing! The reporting feature of this money app is the best of its class!

👨‍👨‍👧 Manage your money everywhere : access data on multiple devices and with family members- securely! Anyone you share data with can enter their expenses or incomes on their device. Use Google Drive or Dropbox to synchronize and jointly track money, budget and finance. And with excellent multi-currency feature , manage your money, anytime, anywhere!

Bluecoins finance and budget is Google Editor’s Choice in 2018

Other key features : Password/fingerprint security, QIF/CSV import, bill reminders, cash flow & net worth analysis, cryptocurrencies support, future finance/expense/income projections, money currency exchange, multi-language support, multiple themes support- including AMOLED dark themes.

Permissions : all permissions will require user authorization and is detailed at our Privacy Policy link available in the Developer contact information.

Any feedback or concerns? Please email us at support@bluecoinsapp.com and we will be happy to assist.

comments: Loving this app so far. Very comprehensive! Plus with summaries of all sorts. Also looks very organized and there's a lot of options to personalize. Also nice to see that developer is Pinoy. Two thumbs up! :)
I think this was the app replacement I was looking for! I used to use expenseiq but its dead now and I think this is even better. Amazing. Going to comeback here after using it for a while

✔PROS⇨ ① One of the Best Personal Finance Manager Apps. ② Cloud Backup & Sync ③ SMS Banking Push ④ Android K to Q Compatible ⑤ Fingerprint Security ⑥ Nice, Pro, & Clean Design ⑦ Multiple Languages • ✖CONS⇨ ① No Debt Management feature -- a must today feature that is missing ② No Taxing ③ No direct connection to Bank Account's transactions; Push SMS Banking notif only (I do appreciate it anyway) ④ Too few & plain Icons ⑤ No Search Engine for transactions, etc ★ Thank You • Premium/Note9/Android.Q

Really like this app. It obviously takes more effort than automatic apps linked to your bank account. On the other hand, it's the most secure method second to using excel/physical paper. I have my phone set that if I double tap and swipe it opens toned a new transaction there and then, so I can take a picture of a receipt and enter the transaction as soon as it happens. Could use an interest festure for investment accounts and category icons should be coloured differently

Amazing app with excellent customizability. Normally can't get used to budget apps because I keep feeling like I can't enter transactions like I want to, however, that is absolutely not the case here. I haven't tried the pro version, but I don't feel like it's necessary either because you are given basically everything in the free version already.

title: Empower - Save, spend, track & manage your money
description:
Save and bank better with a financial expert in your pocket. Our budgeting tools, human coaches and expert tips let you master your money like a pro. 

Join the 650,000+ people who have downloaded Empower to prepare for the future, budget wisely, and crush their financial goals. Let’s break it down:

Automated saving 
Save $1,500 or more every year, without even trying. Set your weekly savings target, and Empower will study your income and spending and automatically knows when to save the right amount of money at the right time.

- Empower deposits are FDIC insured up to $250,000
- Access your money at anytime
- Unlimited withdrawals
- No account minimums

Painless budgeting and spend tracking
Whip up budgets that reflect your lifestyle and get notifications on how your bills and purchases are tracking to plan.

- Customizable budget categories
- Weekly or monthly spend limits
- 24/7 alerts on $ left to spend
- Monthly reports

Expert tips 
Empower keeps an eye on your money so you don’t have to. Sit back, relax, and we’ll tell you when and how to make better financial choices. We’ll notify you about these (and more):

- Account alerts – Empower notifies you about bank fees, bill increases, missed bills, credit utilization, new ways to save, and more
- Subscription management – Empower shows you all of your subscriptions and helps you cancel any you're not using anymore.
- Bill negotiation – Empower negotiates your phone, cable and internet bills to get you better deals.

Human coach
Our human coaches are always here to help you through any financial challenge. Think personalized tips to steer you in the right direction. 

Checking account
Enjoy a checking account with an APY that's higher than traditional banks. Make more money on your money — spend it, save it, you choose. We’ll make it grow.

- 0.25% APY on all your money
- Debit card with 24/7 alerts on all transactions
- 3 monthly ATM fee reimbursements
- Empower deposits are FDIC insured up to $250,000
- No account minimums
- No overdraft fees
- No insufficient funds fees
- Feature to lock/unlock your card in app

Data privacy and security
Your personal data belongs to you, and you alone. We would never share or sell your information to another party. And we keep your money safe and sound with the latest-and-greatest bank-grade security features and protections, like:

- AES 256-bit encryption
- Multi-factor authentication
- Touch/Face ID

Love for Empower.
Recognized by Apple in "New Apps We Love" and by Time Magazine in "Best Apps of the Year So Far." Featured in Forbes, The New York Times, Business Insider, TechCrunch, and USA Today.

For more information, visit empower.me.

Banking services for new accounts provided by nbkc bank, Member FDIC. 0.25% Annual Percentage Yield (APY) may change at any time. APY as of March 19, 2020. Empower charges an auto-recurring subscription fee of $6 for access to the full suite of money management features offered on the platform after your first 30 days.

Empower does not charge foreign transaction fees for the use of the Empower Visa Debit Card outside of the US. However, Visa charges a foreign transaction fee of 1%. Empower does not reimburse this 1% transaction fee on foreign ATM transactions or on any other foreign transactions or purchases.

Annual savings through our AutoSave feature may vary based on the customer’s savings selection and financial circumstances.

- 24/7 alerts on $ left to spend
- Monthly reports

Expert tips
Empower keeps an eye on your money so you don’t have to. Sit back, relax, and we’ll tell you when and how to make better financial choices. We’ll notify you about these (and more):

- Account alerts – Empower notifies you about bank fees, bill increases, missed bills, credit utilization, new ways to save, and more
- Subscription management – Empower shows you all of your subscriptions and helps you cancel any you're not using anymore.
- Bill negotiation – Empower negotiates your phone, cable and internet bills to get you better deals.

Human coach
Our human coaches are always here to help you through any financial challenge. Think personalized tips to steer you in the right direction.

Checking account
Enjoy a checking account with an APY that's higher than traditional banks. Make more money on your money — spend it, save it, you choose. We’ll make it grow.

- 0.25% APY on all your money
- Debit card with 24/7 alerts on all transactions
- 3 monthly ATM fee reimbursements
- Empower deposits are FDIC insured up to $250,000
- No account minimums
- No overdraft fees
- No insufficient funds fees
- Feature to lock/unlock your card in app

Data privacy and security
Your personal data belongs to you, and you alone. We would never share or sell your information to another party. And we keep your money safe and sound with the latest-and-greatest bank-grade security features and protections, like:

- AES 256-bit encryption
- Multi-factor authentication
- Touch/Face ID

Love for Empower.
Recognized by Apple in "New Apps We Love" and by Time Magazine in "Best Apps of the Year So Far." Featured in Forbes, The New York Times, Business Insider, TechCrunch, and USA Today.

For more information, visit empower.me.

Banking services for new accounts provided by nbkc bank, Member FDIC. 0.25% Annual Percentage Yield (APY) may change at any time. APY as of March 19, 2020. Empower charges an auto-recurring subscription fee of $6 for access to the full suite of money management features offered on the platform after your first 30 days.

Empower does not charge foreign transaction fees for the use of the Empower Visa Debit Card outside of the US. However, Visa charges a foreign transaction fee of 1%. Empower does not reimburse this 1% transaction fee on foreign ATM transactions or on any other foreign transactions or purchases.

Annual savings through our AutoSave feature may vary based on the customer’s savings selection and financial circumstances.

comments: Never use and/or quit now! Do not trust them with any amount of money. Empower without any notice or explanation froze my account multiple times. At first their only explanation has been that it was accidental. The latest freeze they simply say was a breach of their Terms of Service, without any explanation. Their customer support seems to be outsourced, has no real knowledge of anything, incompetent, and no ability to fix anything. My account was frozen for 4+ months, still with no resolve 👎👎

This started out as a great, high interest bank with attentive customer service that was fast and easy to use. All that has changed. Their interest rates have greatly decreased, their customer service has been outsourced and is not longer available via live chat and there's no number to call. To get a replacement card or dispute transactions is basically impossible.

My husband downloaded this app, set everything up and then he wasnt able to login at all. For a couple of months now random amount charges have came out of his other bank account to this company every other day. One day its 10 next its 40. He has attempted to call and get this matter fixed and there is no one available to speak. This app is stealing money from our family of 6.

It's getting a star as in 1. Why not 5 stars, I've only begun to delve into this app and honestly they're brand new as in they've just been able to get this on the play store they're still working out kinks in the loan portion so I'll actually look at this properly and use it then rewrite this whole thing, good luck Empower I mean that

I LOVE this app! It is so convenient to use and see what I am spending where and what I have left! Also they have many great tools to help you save! I have direct deposit and absolutely love this bank!

title: WalletHub - Free Credit Score, Report & Monitoring
description:
WalletHub is the first and only app to offer 100% free credit scores and full credit reports updated daily. Plus, get personalized tips for how to save money and improve your credit score. Download this award-winning app and reach top WalletFitness®.


Sign up for a free WalletHub account to get:
• Free credit scores, updated daily
• A clear plan for improving your score
• Free credit reports, updated daily
• 24/7 credit monitoring to warn you of identity theft and fraud
• Savings alerts so you can repay your debt faster and avoid overpaying on your credit cards and loans
• Your custom-built debt payoff plan


2,000+ News Mentions, Including:
• The Wall Street Journal
• The New York Times
• The Washington Post
• CNBC
• Yahoo Finance
• MSN Money
• Forbes


Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: Is WalletHub Really Free?

A: Yes, it’s 100% free, and we’ll never even ask you for a credit card number.


Q: Will Using WalletHub Hurt My Credit?

A: Not at all. It’s only a “soft” inquiry when you check your latest credit report and score through WalletHub. So WalletHub may only help your credit as a result.


Q: Why WalletHub?

A: While there are a number of places to get a free credit score and free credit report (or at least a free trial) – from Credit Karma to Capital One’s Credit Wise – WalletHub is the only free credit score app to offer daily updates and a clear action plan. We’ll also give you personalized credit-improvement tips and help you maximize your savings as well as minimize your debt.


Q: How Will WalletHub Save Me Money?

A: Whether you have excellent credit or bad credit, WalletHub will automatically hunt for better deals so you’ll never get taken advantage of. And if your credit isn’t perfect, we’ll also help you improve it, enabling you to save thousands each year on your credit cards, mortgage, auto loan, student loan, car insurance and more. A strong credit rating will help indirectly with potential employers and landlords, too.


Q: Can WalletHub Help Me Improve My Credit?

A: WalletHub analyzes your latest credit score and report to identify your credit strengths and weaknesses. We then run a number of simulations to determine how different actions will impact your credit standing. Finally, we present you with a customized credit-improvement plan, along with a comprehensive credit scorecard. You can check it out on your account’s Credit Analysis page.


As your credit score improves, WalletHub will also give you personalized tips about which credit cards offer the highest approval odds and the most savings.


Q: How Does 24/7 Credit Monitoring Work?

A: WalletHub’s free credit monitoring keeps a round-the-clock watch on your TransUnion credit report and will notify you whenever there is an important change. In addition to email alerts, you can also customize your WalletHub account to receive SMS alerts, which most credit monitoring services don’t provide. This will give you the chance to quickly confirm the accuracy of credit-report changes and, if necessary, start sorting out any problems before they really get out of hand.

comments: Too many ads too cute. You send me an alert that says, "hey, look at this!" And then when you open the app, you cant find the details of whatever the alert was about. Furthermore, I don't care about your "plan." Allow an opt out. Stop reminding me that I havent hooked you up to EVERY one of my accounts. No kidding-- it's on purpose, morons. I just cancelled my account with another service just like yours. Maybe if you fix this, I'll keep yours.

Awesome app, it's easy to use and it is pretty accurate in figuring out what financial course the user should take. I enjoy my app and information it provides me. Highly recommend this app for better control over your finances.

I think i have every app to help rebuild my credit and this is the only one that gives you all the advice needed PLUS daily updated credit scores. The first one i used updated my score monthly & charged if i didn't want to wait that long. Thanks wallet hub!
I haven't had it long, but they're absolutely updating daily, compared to others that I've had for a long time that are currently almost a month behind.

I was skeptical at 1st about downloading this app but I decided to give it a try and I'm glad I did it really is a great app to see your credit score on and they give good advice to help improve your credit so wallethub get 2 thumbs up

title: My Finances
description:
My Finances is a perfect tool for expense control and manage home budget. Home budget management will become easier from now. Thanks to carefully selected functions not only will you be able to save more money, but also analyze your expenses more precisely. You can say: From now my expenses will be classified, and there is more money in wallet.

An attractive and intuitive interface will help you to add easily new transactions and analyze the existent ones. With a few clicks you can attach the expense or income, check the current balance of employed accounts (defined by you in application). My Finances allows you to sum up all costs and gains including category and time period specification. Saving money has never been so nice and comfortable. Your expenses and incomes will be in one place. Get started today to control your spending!

Essential program functions: 
- Attaching incomes and outgoings in an intuitive way. With one move of the cursor you may pass to a new operation adding window. Then insert necessary information, save, and that’s all. Simplicity and utility are the main attributes of application.
- Category and subcategory creation at your discretion. You can assign the color to each category what makes the data clear.  
- Multi- account management – to operate your portfolio more accurately, you are free to create any number of accounts, however, it’s not everything… 
- The great advantage of the budget managing application is the filtering option of every operation within the accounts. Our application provides it for you, just select the accounts you wish to be visible in the operating area at the current moment.  
- Repeated operations option, to make your home budget management even easier. Define the operation, set its frequency and the application will do the rest for you! The example of such order is a phone bill, a flat rent or your salary.
- Planned operations which allow you to foresee the total of incomes and expenses in given months. It’s particularly useful if you realize an investments or you just like to plan and you want to estimate how much you would be able to save in following months.
- The history with developed filter let you follow your own earnings and payments. Everyone who decides to use this type of program, wants also to know the exact process of their finances. Thanks to My Finances you have access to this function, it’s possible to observe the home budget very precisely. 
- Operations review including categories and subcategories specification will reveal to you, what you spend mostly your money on. By making a proper analysis, you will be able to plan, how to save more.
- Statistics is a really handy function for resources managing. It allows you to make a comparison of incomes and payments.
- With charts you may analyze present and previous transactions according to given month, year and category specification. 
-  It was just a part of available functions. Additionally, for more flexibility, My Finances gives you the option of choosing the initial day of month (e.g. in case when you receive the salary every 10-th day). The program offers also csv files importing and exporting to analyze finances more precisely, or backup- for your security.
- More features coming soon - big money comes from smaller ones
My Finances is a smart assistant for home budget managing, it helps you to take full control over home finances. If you are still wondering why your funds are running out so quickly and for what- this application is just designed for you. My finances from now will help you maintain your expenses and home budget

If you have any idea to improve our product or you have noticed an error, we are looking forward to your message: info@7csolutions.com

Why we need specific permissions?
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE / READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - import / export / backup
RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED - starting standing orders service
ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE/INTERNET - ads
READ_LOGS - reporting bugs via ACRA

comments: The application is great. However, there are some minor bugs. There are a lot of infographics, which are not very informative though. Also, I would like to see different currencies for accounts. It would be nice to have more synchronization futures such as import and export to google sheets. Thank you so much for the application!

Great app, there is one big issue that has been there since the beginning and that is decimals calculations in expenses. Try this as an expenses "1.5+1.5-1.5= " and you will see that the calculator fails miserably. I mean it's a huge problem when a financing app calculator gives you wrong results on such a simple calculation.
App is easy to use, but plays video ads suddenly when I open the app at work. It's inconvenient. At least, play the add muted by default
Whenever I turn the screen horizontally, I can't press "ok" when I typed in the amount of money. I strongly prefer using my phone horizontally out of health problems with my hands.
I like it! I like that I can easily follow my account status. Would be great if you add the Transportation category by default.

title: LendingTree
description:
The LendingTree app is more than a way to check your credit score. The app provides insights to help you understand and plan for your long-term financial health. It considers a number of financial factors including savings, cash flow, budget and net worth to create a total financial outlook. From there it helps you:

+ Understand and monitor your credit score.  Plus tips to help you improve it.
+ Assess your financial health, then find savings so you can increase your money and cash flow.
+ Provide insights into your financial outlook and help plan your financial future.

The LendingTree app is free, doesn’t affect your credit, and doesn’t require a subscription. It’s built on LendingTree’s nationwide lender marketplace and decades of experience saving Americans millions. With your account you can access that network to shop rates across mortgage loans, personal loans, credit cards, business loans student loans and more.

Download it now and see what you can save.

comments: Lending tree offers everything you'd want all in one platform, and constantly updates itself so you get new loan offers based on credit score etc.
Love the mobile app. it is very informative and their recommendations are very helpful.
Easy to use and gives you options to help with your credit and purchases

Your user interface and servers are complete garbage. Just holding my phone the wrong way causes the app to abandon any process it's on. I cant make 2 button presses without seeing the "well this is embarrassing " error message. And to add insult to injury you're very good at pointing out flaws in my finances but just suck at providing help. Every tab you provided me you weren't able to help in a single one. Fix your app.

Keeps telling me I have a duplicate account. I reset my password and logged in and it loops back to the same info. Duplicate account, reset password, log in, and loop continues. Very annoying and not worth looking into the app. I would check it out but too tedious.

title: Betterment: Money Management and Financial Advisor
description:
Not sure what to do with your money? Betterment is built to help. From helping you save more on your cash to investing for the long term, Betterment helps you manage your money so that you can live better.

Save with Cash Reserve
• Earn one of the highest interest rates on the market
• Eligible for FDIC insurance up to $1M once at our program banks†
• Unlimited transfers in and out
Cash Reserve is provided by Betterment LLC, which is not a bank, and cash transfers to program banks are facilitated by Betterment Securities.

Invest with smart tech and expert advice
• Financial goals: We ask questions to help you figure out your investing goals and make recommendations to help you reach them
• Portfolio management: We build you a personalized investment portfolio of low-cost ETFs and manage it for you
• Financial advice: We provide ongoing advice through our platform. As your money grows, our guidance evolves to help you make smart decisions with your money
• Low, transparent fee of 0.25% annually

Betterment Cash Reserve
APY is variable. $10 minimum deposit. No minimum balance. Visit betterment.com/cash-management for full details.
†Cash Reserve (“CR”) offered by Betterment LLC. Betterment LLC clients may participate in CR through brokerage accounts held at Betterment Securities. Neither Betterment LLC nor any of its affiliates is a bank. Through CR clients' funds are deposited into one or more banks ("Program Banks") where funds earn a variable interest rate and are eligible for FDIC insurance. Through CR clients can earn interest on cash intended to purchase securities through Betterment LLC and Betterment Securities. CR is not a long-term investment option.
Funds held in your brokerage account are not FDIC-insured but are protected by SIPC. Funds in transit to or from Program Banks are generally not FDIC-insured but are protected by SIPC, except when those funds are held in a sweep account following a deposit or prior to a withdrawal, at which time funds are eligible for FDIC insurance but are not protected by SIPC. See Betterment Client Agreements at betterment.com/legal for details. Funds deposited into CR are eligible for up to $1M (or $2M for joint accounts) FDIC insurance once funds reach one or more Program Banks (up to $250k for each insurable capacity - e.g., individual or joint - at up to 4 Program Banks). Even if there are more than 4 Program Banks, clients will not necessarily have deposits allocated to provide FDIC insurance above $1M (or $2M for joint accounts). FDIC insurance limits based on all accounts held in the same insurable capacity at a bank. Excluding one or more Program Banks from receiving deposits may lower the amount of FDIC insurance available through CR. Clients are responsible for monitoring total assets at each Program Bank, including existing deposits at Program Banks outside of CR to ensure FDIC insurance limits are not exceeded.  For more info on FDIC insurance see www.FDIC.gov. Deposits held in Program Banks not protected by SIPC. For more info seebetterment.com/legal/everyday-savings and betterment.com/adv.
Advisory services provided by Betterment LLC, an SEC-registered investment adviser. Brokerage services provided to clients of Betterment LLC by Betterment Securities www.bettermentsecurities.com, an SEC-registered broker-dealer and member of FINRA/SIPC.
Investments in securities: Not FDIC Insured • No Bank Guarantee • May Lose Value. Investing in securities involves risks, and there is always the potential of losing money when you invest in securities. Before investing, consider your investment objectives and Betterment's charges and expenses. Not an offer, solicitation of an offer, or advice to buy or sell securities in jurisdictions where Betterment is not registered. All images and return figures shown are for illustrative purposes only and are not actual customer or model returns.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: Since the update, I can no longer reproduce the problem I had with the app, in which it would fail to unlock after the phone locked while the app was in use. I no longer have to close the app, and reopen. Good job, engineers. On a broader note, Betterment is a great service and platform. Just got my limited edition card! Also, reviews of Betterment that complain about lower than promised savings rates are bogus. Betterment is just as competitive as everyone else online.

I have put money into several different accounts and I liked this idea, but the only thing I don't like is that you can not change the amount of deposits like you can in Acorn. I will keep using, but will only put money into areas of where I can change the deposit amounts. Thanks for getting back to me and I did figured it out after playing with the app for a few hours. Still using and still putting money into it.

"clear" button no longer works to clear the suggested amount on 'some' of my accounts when making deposits. I now have to clear the suggested amount via the pop-up keyboard. Annoying. If I had the suggested amount I'd take a 10 week vacation and still have thousands left to invest. Reinstalled, cleared cache, deleted data, restarted, turned around, put my left foot in, put my left foot out and did all the typical tech support stuff.
Since the last update I haven't been able to set up recurring deposits. Otherwise useful tool, but I cant see the projections and what I should be depositing
App is easy to use and visually appealing. Very easy to transfer money into the account and to quickly view performance.

title: CreditWise from Capital One
description:
Know your credit score and much more
 
Capital One CreditWise® is a free tool to check and monitor your credit score and it’s AVAILABLE TO EVERYONE not just Capital One® customers. Use CreditWise to understand what makes up your score and find helpful ways to take action to improve it. If your score is where you want it to be, use CreditWise to keep an eye on your accounts and get alerts when something changes on your TransUnion® or Experian® credit report.
 
Used by millions of Capital One customers, CreditWise (formerly CreditTracker) is key for anyone who wants to know, improve, or monitor their credit score. Using CreditWise won’t hurt your score, and you won’t ever be asked to enter a credit card number.
 
All features are free:
● Weekly TransUnion® VantageScore 3.0 credit score.
● Review your credit report from TransUnion® to look for signs of error, theft, or fraud. Your credit report includes open/closed accounts, balances, hard inquiries, personal information, and public records that have been reported to TransUnion®.
● Use the Credit Simulator to see how everyday decisions affect your credit score.
● Learn about the key factors that make up your credit score and how you’re doing on each of them.
● See personalized suggestions to help improve your credit score.
● Get alerts letting you know about changes to your TransUnion or Experian credit report, if your Social Security Number or email address were found on the dark web, and if any new names or addresses were associated with your Social Security Number.
● Simple, everyday tips on how you can take control of your credit.
 
Prepare Before You Act
 
How could closing a credit card account affect your credit score? How much could your score change if you pay off half your credit card debt or all your debt? See how these decisions could impact your score before you act by using our Credit Simulator.
 
Frequently Asked Questions
 
Q: Can everyone access the CreditWise app?
A: Yes. You just have to be 18 or older.
 
Q: Does using CreditWise hurt my credit score?
A: No. You can utilize all of CreditWise’s free tools and features without hurting your score.
 
Q: How can I use my CreditWise credit score?
A: Your CreditWise score is a good measure of your credit health and its progress. And just like any score from any source, chances are your CreditWise score won’t be exactly the same as the one your lender uses. That’s because lending decisions are complex and consider a number of different factors and scoring models.
 
Q: I’m already enrolled in Capital One CreditTracker. Can I use the same username and password?
A: Yes. If you’ve already enrolled in CreditTracker, use the same username and password that you use to sign in to service your accounts on CapitalOne.com or to access the Capital One Mobile servicing app.

recentChanges:
Here is what's included in our latest update:
We made some performance improvements to make your experience better throughout the app.
comments: Best CC app I've ever used. And I would recommend Capital One/CreditWise to anyone trying to rebuild their credit. Don't fall for others charging annual fees. It will hurt you in the long run when you inevitably cancel the card. Who wants to pay annual fees in perpetuity? That's how the others make their money on the backs of people with bad credit, sometimes thru no fault of their own. GL.

I like this app because it shows all my credit reports and updates every 7 days which I think is very great in my book. Also, it tells me what I can do to improve my credit score even more. I just wish that I can pay all my bills at once and then my credit score will be going up the roof😂😉 Anyway, when I get a more secure job I will pay more amounts but definitely when I pay off Capital One off, I will go back to them! Keep up the good work!

Making payments is simple. It alerts me of any impact to my credit score and who and what is making the impact. This app also gives updates on your credit score, tells you when the next credit score update will take place, and gives you stats on areas that impact your credit good or bad. Informs you of ways to improve in areas that are not execellent. I log in with my fingerprint so I've not been having any log in issues like the others have mentioned in their reviews.

I wish there was 0 star ratings! First of all I cant sighn in for several month already even I have never change or sign up with new user name . That's what actually I see when trying to sign in every single time: "we're sorry, but it looks like you already have enrolled using another account. Please login with that username.W-190-3936 .read above I have never change or enroll with any other accounts!Support is Terrible! I Report this issue Logn time ago. Nothing changed! Have to report to BBB

Love this app it lets me know immediately if something on my credit was ran or used it also helps me keep track of my credit scorealso helps tell you what to do to improve your credit score within the last month and my credit score went up 71 points I was amazed! This app is the best with capital one

title: TD Ameritrade Mobile
description:
On the move? So is the market. Stay on top of it with the TD Ameritrade Mobile app. Monitor the markets and your positions, deposit funds with mobile check deposit, catch up on the latest news and research, or browse educational content—all from your mobile device. Trade with confidence everywhere you go, with the security and precision of your desktop right in the palm of your hand. 

All the features you need:

• Keep up on the market with price alerts, real-time streaming quotes, helpful charts, Level II quotes, and News

• Track and trade stocks, options (up to two-leg strategies), options chains, and exchange-traded funds (ETFs), and even check your order status when on the go

• Transfer funds to and from your account, and use mobile check deposit to deposit funds whenever you want

• Use fingerprint authentication to sign in and to authorize trades and transfers

• Take advantage of educational offerings and browse videos on investing strategies, stocks, options, and more—anytime, anywhere

• Access third-party research like on-demand video from Thomson Reuters and CNBC, plus stay up to date with the latest analyst reports, Social Signals, and Twitter integration

• Use alerts to spot potential trading opportunities, get notifications when certain price targets are met, and stay up to date when key news breaks or events occur. 

• Manage and monitor your account with real-time balances and positions, statements and tax documents, transaction history, and our secure Message Center—right at your fingertips

• Customize your experience by setting up your Positions and Watch List screens just the way you want

Don't miss a minute of the market. Download the TD Ameritrade Mobile app and take your portfolio with you, wherever you go.

recentChanges:
Cost basis info
From the Positions page, see your unrealized and realized gain/loss, detailed transaction history, and more.

Social Signals
We discontinued this feature to streamline our technology and provide you with better service.

Trade ticket upgrades
Get more detailed quote information with new data fields, including bid/ask size and volume.
comments: Awful lagging app. It takes forever to update figures, keeps saying I don't have enough buying power when and I do, and my limit orders seem to just hang in the wind. Moreover, it processes order limits as a duplicate request, doubling the amount of shares you're ordering. Awful.

To all those looking for a better MOBILE trading app, I promise you this is not it. This app is horrible and needs a lot of work...it may be better on computer but for a phone app it is ridiculous like for example the price/share is very inaccurate and takes forever to update, my limit orders NEVER get filled (had to use a market order in order to trade), and TD ameritrade offers 24/5 trading but I havent been able to trade in pre-marker...got no problem paying for trades as long as the app work

Can't believe I switched from Robin hood. Everything is so complicated! Can't find anything. Doesn't update on real time. Have to go looking for my accounts and orders.... There's got to be a better way to have more features without burying the basics.
Symbols freezing up in my watch list. Last 2 updates prevent me from getting accurate quotes. Should revert to old version until bugs are worked out!

Huge improvement since I last wrote a review 3 months ago. The dashboard is a huge plus and works smoothly compared to the initial release in November. If you run into issues, just uninstall and reinstall it but remember to save your WL to the servers. One major issue is when I place an order, it takes 5-30 seconds for the order to show up in the position tab so I can't update it in a fast moving market. I had to switch to thinkorswim app to update my order as it's faster. Already sent this bug

title: US Grants and Loans
description:
**US Grants and Loans app is owned by a private company not affiliated, endorsed, authorized, or licensed by The Federal Government of the United States or other government entity.

Learn. Search. Apply. for grants and loans. This app will help you find loans and government grants. Also you will be connected with lenders and receive your loan decision.

App sections:
- Free Credit Reports: Free Credit Reports by Phone, Online, classic mail
- Search for Government Loans: Browse by Category (Agriculture, Business, Disaster Relief, Education, General, Housing, Veteran)
- What is a Loan from the Government? 
Government loans serve a specific purpose such as paying for education, helping with housing or business needs, or responding to an emergency or crisis.
- Student Loans.
When you are exploring ways to pay for college, career, or technical schools, you may consider taking out a student loan.
- Loan Calculator:
Calculator for Paying Back a Fixed Amount Periodically
- Search and Apply for Government Grants
Use the federal government’s free, official website, Grants.gov rather than commercial sites 
- Who May Receive a Grant?
The federal government typically awards grants to state and local governments, universities, researchers, law enforcement, organizations, and institutions planning major projects that will benefit specific parts of the population or the community as a whole. 
- What is a Grant from the Government?
Most of the funding opportunities are for organizations, not individuals.
- Free Credit Reports: 
Free Credit Reports by Phone, Online, classic mail
- Grants Opportunities:
Receive a listing of grants opportunities from grants.gov
- Grant-Making Agencies: 
Federal Agencies Award Grants.

Sources of the information in the app: https://www.usa.gov; https://www.grants.gov

comments: The experience of this application is an exceptional service because the application allows me to browse the features necessary to search.
The worse app I have EVER downloaded. As soon as you open it it takes you to a bunch of infamershals for surveys and games that you cannot get out of. Horrible
As soon as I downloaded this app, I began receiving ungodly amounts of spam texts regarding gov funds.

Fast download, personal entrance through app, one-on-one contact, easy to use, sure way to find out if you qualify. Your own personal Western Union communication. What are you waiting for to enhance your life for better encounters?
I have not received anything!!! Maybe this is not real?

title: Schwab Mobile
description:
Take charge of your financial future with Schwab’s mobile app for Android™.  Monitor your accounts, trade, research investments, and follow today’s market news—whenever and wherever you want.

•	Manage your brokerage, Schwab Bank, 401(k) and other accounts
•	Trade/edit/cancel Stock, ETF, Mutual Fund and multi-leg option orders ¹
•	Login using your fingerprint or Passcode
•	Deposit Checks via Schwab Mobile Deposit™ ²
•	Protect yourself with the ability to quickly lock and unlock your Schwab Bank Visa® Platinum Debit Card  
•	Open new brokerage accounts and new Schwab Bank accounts
•	Get real-time Trade Notifications
•	Monitor your Schwab Visa Platinum® Debit card activity by setting custom alerts
•	Access Schwab Podcasts, videos, and more in Media Center 
•	Enjoy auto-updating Watchlists (synchronized with Schwab.com)
•	Add, edit, pay, or cancel Bill Pay payments for Schwab Bank
•	More enhancements are coming soon


Your input is important.  In the app, go to the Menu, select "Feedback" and share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.


BROKERAGE PRODUCTS: NOT FDIC INSURED • NO BANK GUARANTEE • MAY LOSE VALUE


¹ Options carry a high level of risk and are not suitable for all investors. Certain requirements must be met to trade options through Schwab. Please read the options disclosure document titled "Characteristics and Risks of Standardized Options"  [http://www.theocc.com/about/publications/character-risks.jsp] Supporting documentation for any claims or statistical information is available upon request, call 800-435-4000 for a copy.  Multiple leg options strategies will involve multiple commissions.  Spread trading must be done in a margin account.
Futures trading offered and positions held through Charles Schwab Futures, Inc., a separate but affiliated company of Charles Schwab & Co., Inc.  Both are subsidiaries of The Charles Schwab Corporation. Futures trading involves substantial risk and is not suitable for all investors.  Please read Risk Disclosure Statement for Futures and Options [https://www.streetsmartcentral.com/static/pdf/CSF_risks_futures_options.pdf].
² The Schwab Mobile Deposit service is subject to certain eligibility requirements, limitations, and other conditions. Enrollment is not guaranteed. Standard hold policies apply. Requires a wireless signal or mobile connection. Mobile carrier data charges may apply.
Requires a wireless signal or mobile connection. Access to Electronic Services may be limited or unavailable during periods of peak demand, market volatility, systems upgrade, maintenance, or for other reasons. Functionality may vary by operating system and/or device.
System availability and response times are subject to market conditions and mobile connection limitations.  Trade Orders received outside normal market hours will be entered the next business day.
Android, Google Play, and Google Pay are trademarks of Google Inc. Use of these trademarks are subject to Google Permissions.
Charles Schwab & Co., Inc., and Charles Schwab Bank are separate but affiliated companies and subsidiaries of The Charles Schwab Corporation. Brokerage products are offered by Charles Schwab & Co., Inc. (Member SIPC [www.sipc.org] ) ("Schwab"). Deposit and lending products and services are offered by Charles Schwab Bank, Member FDIC and an Equal Housing Lender.

Screenshots are for illustrative purposes only.

summary: Manage your money on the go.
recentChanges:
• Looking for your Schwab Tax Forms? They’re now available on your 1099 Dashboard
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements
comments: I've been using Schwab for 5 years now and have recommended it to many people. But lately, I'm getting frustrated with how inconvenient the mobile app for day traders. The account doesn't reflect what's been purchased today until after the market closes, no way to check the updated average, or new stocks etc. Because of how volatile the market is, I want to take advantage of it, but Schwab is holding me back. I'm looking at other options and going to switch soon.

Good for investing, unwieldy for checking. Seems to be designed for the older generation, which is fine, I don't need bubbles and cartoons, but somehow it doesn't flow like any other bank app would (e.g. find the "transfer" button and then pick an account, rather than selecting the account and having an option to transfer).

I deposit check electronically every week for 4 year straight. I have always had a hard time depositing the checks using the app. I have the Google Pixel phone which has a very nice camera. I don't know why it takes me sometimes 30 attempts to deposit the checks and sometimes I have to try for 3 to 4 days over and over again.

Interesting how it auto-logs me out everytime i want to view my positions on a day where the Dow is down 250 points. Edit 3/16. After failing to buy at a low price because the app crashed, this app has once again let me down. The app forcequits every time I attempt to view my positions or buy more stock. Absolute pathetic from such a large company. Don't trust them with your money!!!

While setting up an account I hit the back button to change preferences and it made me start over. It did save the account since the username was no longer available for a new account but when trying to sign in it said access denied. I had no option to finish setting up the account or login so screw it, I downloaded a different app.

title: Financial Times
description:
Get the international business news, analysis, market data and company information you need to stay well-informed.

FEATURES

• Breaking news alerts, direct to your lock screen 
• Read anywhere, even when you’re offline with automatic downloads of the latest edition
• Follow topics that matter to you and save articles with myFT
• See the latest comments on articles and share your opinions
• Monitor your Markets Data portfolio and browse securities 

HOW TO ACCESS

To gain full access to our award-winning content, please sign in using your Financial Times account.

FEEDBACK 

The FT app is supported for Android 5 and above.

If you have any feedback on our app, please email appfeedback@ft.com.

To get support, please chat with us at help.ft.com

summary: See the full perspective on world events with the Financial Times app
developerAddress: Bracken House, 1 Friday Street, London, EC4M 9BT
recentChanges:
myFT Instant Alerts
——
• Keep up to date with your myFT topics with myFT instant push notifications

Bug Fixes
——
• Android 6 - Sort comments no longer crashes the app

Contact us
——
• Contact us at appfeedback@ft.com or chat with us at https://help.ft.com with your feedback and suggestions
comments: This is a first-rate app, probably the best news app available. I've been reading (and now listening also) for years. The FT's world coverage is excellent and the design is clear and easy on the eye. The only thing is the old logo that still sits at the top of the Android version! Needs updating. Otherwise, hard to fault.

Six months later, still sends notifications even when disabled in the app, must be disabled in system settings. Content is great, subscription costly. Too bad they can't afford to pay developers enough to make an app that doesn't randomly embarrass me in important meetings with notifications. I've confirmed this problem on two different devices now as of 2019-11-15. Also still has ads after you're logged in with your subscription. And you cant click on the widget title to open the app

Financial Times (FT) is a terrific news app. It's the best news app Ive ever used. Kudos! FT is one of the best news organizations in the world. Reading FT in the app is sublime. The app has dark mode support, but I prefer the default sepia background which is easy on the eyes. Navigation within the app is intuitive. The app has many customization settings. Personalizing news content via "MyFT" provides a curated, personal news section the user can finetune granularly or broadly.
Very nice app. I give 5 stars but I still would like to see less background refresh like other news apps and the possibility to cancel my subscription directly on the app.
This app is so disappointing. Every time I am using Chrome or Twitter and click on a FT link, it sends me to a sign in page instead of redirecting to the app (where I am obviously logged in).

title: Investor's Business Daily
description:
Winning stock lists, real-time charts and up-to-the-minute market news: now available everywhere, thanks to the newly enhanced Investor’s Business Daily app. The IBD app is free to download.

IBD Digital members will also have access to their favorite premium features, IBD premium lists, charts and personal stock lists. Not an IBD member? You’ll still be able to keep up with market news, videos and information like you would on investors.com.

The IBD app features:
•	Callouts of recent chart action for stocks on IBD’s proprietary stock lists.
•	Your personal stock lists, now synced across all your devices
•	Access to premium features for all IBD Digital members
•	Exclusive stock lists like IBD 50, Sector Leaders, IPO Leaders and more
•	The latest daily market analysis with The Big Picture and Stock Market Today
•	Customizable stock list on the home screen
•	Personalized news pages with embedded videos to keep you up-to-date on stocks you’re watching
•	Tap stock symbols to see IBD’s exclusive Smart Select Ratings

The IBD app is free to download but IBD Digital subscribers get access to premium ratings and interactive tools. IBD Digital subscription gives you unlimited access to our stock research and analysis across multiple devices—mobile, Mac and PC.

You can purchase a monthly or annual subscription in the IBD app. Both subscriptions come with a one-month free trial and payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the end of the trial period. You may cancel a subscription at any time in your Google Play account settings. Subscriptions auto-renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

If you have any questions about how the app functions or how to access to your subscription on other devices, please contact us at (800) 831-2525 or outside the United States at (310) 448-6600.

If you have any questions about how the app functions or how to access to your subscription on other devices, please contact us at (800) 831-2525 or outside the United States at (310) 448-6600.
summary: Get real-time, actionable analysis with the IBD Stock & Market Analysis App.
recentChanges: The index ribbon at the top of the Market screen wasn't loading on some devices. Fixed!
comments: Very trustworthy and informative app. Gives you all the statistics and facts up front, and allows you to look for their opinion rather than advertising it. Only reason it's not 5 stars is it's a little difficult to navigate.

When I try logging in clicking the gmail link on the log in page the app crashes every single time and the IBD notifications I do get redirects me to chrome not the actual app. Had these issues since may 2019 without either of these issues being resolved.
Works well. Able to quickly look up Stock Ratings.
This application has a lot of varying "bugs". The most recent being the inability to delete stocks from watch lists. It has a delete button that doesn't work.
I love IBD been using it for 20 years since It was a newspaper now to see how far it's come to be able to use it on my phone and interact is amazing It's very easy to use and user friendly
